1b1(dkon brtsegs): bya bya bya/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ A sa/ d+huste/ dbyug su drug nam
1b3(dkon brtsegs): sAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa
1b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang
2a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
2a2(dkon brtsegs): na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
2a3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med/
2a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang
2b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su
2b2(dkon brtsegs): zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag
2b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
2b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag las gzhan pa gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
3a1(dkon brtsegs): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
3a2(dkon brtsegs): bltas te chos ston to// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa
3a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lja ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud
3a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan ma
3a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa gang gis/
3a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa'i sems
3b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa legs par bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis las
3b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag kyang bshad du gsol// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lha dang
3b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gyi spyod pa dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa yongs/
3b4(dkon brtsegs): su brjod pa dag kyang bshad du gsol// de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams
3b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur la/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang 'di ltar chos kyi sgron ma'i snang ba dang / 'di
3b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas kyi snang bas snang ba bgyis par 'gyur zhing spro ba stsal bar 'gyur ro// de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'
3b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag gi 'jug pa dang / sprod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag thos na/ de bzhin du slob cing
4a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar bslabs shing de ltar bsgrubs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing
4a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur nas kyang slar zhing gong nas gong du yon tan shin tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
4a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
4a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spro ba dang / sems
4a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la
4a6(dkon brtsegs): zung zhig dang 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan
4a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te da / bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten
4b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing gzhes te/ de byang
4b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'angag
4b3(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bgyi ba/
4b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te/ chos ston pa de phyogs gang na bzhugs shes don dang brtson gshegs pa dgra
4b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen
4b6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nis shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong tham pa na 'jig rten
4b7(dkon brtsegs): khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs zhing gzhes te/
5a1(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub sems shA sa dngab rgyun po rnams la 'di yang ba rlo tu byi pa drug las brtsams rnams sod s+ho/ shAr dwa tI nga ra kyi dusan
5a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhig stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
5a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
5a4(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ces
5a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong
5a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la dang sang bslab par shin tu dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la mi
5a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs par bya ba dang / gnod sems kyi sems mi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
5b1(dkon brtsegs): su chen po de la dge slong ngas 'di gad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dang sran chud 'di ltar gsom mchis pa dang sgyum mchis par med pa'i tshigs
5b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du mi bzla ba tshig gis dran med pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed padu bgyi/ zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bung chub bya sems bdud par gyi
5b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo bar yang bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
5b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste// bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par songs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te sems can
5b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' tsam la khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma bachis
5b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag du ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzas la chos kyang sto/
5b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar bams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin pa che 'di 'iskyed de/ de ltar nga na
6a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
6a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te gom pa 'dor ba re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/
6a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag du ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
6a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na
6a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te
6a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis
6a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
6b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bsred pa rin po che 'dir spyad de/ de ltar ba
6b2(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsdus shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mi rgyas kyi bar du
6b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'dod pa'i 'did chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grang snga ma mchis/
6b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
6b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med yang dag par
6b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par spangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa/
6b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am zhe sdang dang ldan pa 'am/ gti mug dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 'am/ gnyid dang ldan pa 'am/ rmugs pa dang ldan pa'am/ 'byed
7a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa 'am rgod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
7a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
7a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med
7a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tha
7a5(dkon brtsegs): tsom dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhal du ma mchis pa
7a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
7a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos lag bla na med
7b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gam te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur naka bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten
7b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis// bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
7b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di
7b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de// de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs
7b5(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ma byin par len pa dang ldan pa 'am/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa'am// phra ma dang ldan pa 'am gang ga rtsub po dang ldan
7b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'omatshig bkyil bar smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ brnab sems dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa'i malog par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis
7b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gnal du ma mchis pa thams cad na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pa das gang dag da ltar
8a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus pur gyur cig ces byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas
8a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid nas/ sems can thams cad la
8a3(dkon brtsegs): sems mi 'khrug cing / kun tu mi 'khrug pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma dge slong 'di ni mi 'khrugs po zhes bya bar 'gyur te legs so snyam mo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar dge
8a4(dkon brtsegs): slong de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong legs so legs so//
8a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na'ang ming de nyid du 'gyur la// dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
8a6(dkon brtsegs): nAbang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrug pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
8a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyed byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na'ang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/ dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag
8b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bu'i ming de la rjes su mi
8b2(dkon brtsegs): byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs par gra brtsam pa'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
8b3(dkon brtsegs): po me 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dri bskyed de/ de ltar blan
8b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du// gal te ji skad
8b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab// gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/
8b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa ba
8b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la
9a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tha na gom pa 'dor ba re re tsam dag la sangs rgyas yid la bgyid
9a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du
9a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
9a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing
9a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos le/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mo rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su khyim nas khyim mo mchis par yang dag par
9a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ma byung na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na
9a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
9b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ zlan
9b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur ten/ sa
9b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par ma gyur tam/ phyag dar khrod par ma gyur tam/ stan gcig par ma gyur tam/ zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam/ zas rnyed rnyed len par ma gyur tam/ dur khrod par ma
9b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ blo gab med par ma gyur tam// shing drung par ma gyur tam/ cog pu par ma gyur tam/ gzhi ji bzhin par ma gyur tam/ chos gos gsum par ma gyur tam/ phying
9b5(dkon brtsegs): paM par ma gyur tam/ 'dod pa chung bar ma gyur tem/ chog shes par ma gyur tam/ chos 'dod par ma gyur d+ham/ chos la dka' bar ma gyur tamA/ chos la gus par ma
9b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ chos la rton par ma gyur tam/ chos ston par gyur pa nas/ bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa'i yi dam yang dag par blangs pa
9b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag blangs te gnas par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma
10a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lhur bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
10a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs tshe rabs su rab tu
10a4(dkon brtsegs): byung nas kyang chos ston par ma gyur tam/ spongs pa chags pa med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun
10a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dgang
10a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gAzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen
10a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par
10b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ 'di ltar 'greng pa dang / mchis pa dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal bar gyur na
10b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b3(dkon brtsegs): gang drug da ltar bzhugs te/ 'ad+mo zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen
10b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
10b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa 'am/ rtsu ba'i ltung ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/ bud med
10b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ de las gzhan du smra ba brjod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod cing spa bkong ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyod par gyur na
10b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad no// sangs rgyas
11a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
11a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos rishing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na
11a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bud med la 'di ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa'i rnam pa 'am/ rnam pa gzhan dang / gzhan dag gis chos ston pa na/ yan lag las skyes pa'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan la bzang ba'i mtshan mar bzung nas/ so yi
11a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba ston tam/ dgod par bgyid dam/ lag pa g.yob par bgyid na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis
11a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab// gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
11b1(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ chos ston pa na gal te lag pa bsgyur zhing chos
11b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/
11b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan
11b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa 'du dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsdus la/ bla na meng
11b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su sna da kha spu bregs pa snod du gyur pa 'am/ snod du
11b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa 'dra mi bsngo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan chos gis drar smrig 'i tshul ba dag mthong na/ rA la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes s+ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa
11b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag giso phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du
12a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dri bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
12a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mthong na/
12a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa
12a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
12a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
12a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du// chos 'chad pa na chos ston pa dag la gal te mchis te chos mnyan par ma gyur na/
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ zangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12b2(dkon brtsegs): gang drug da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen
12b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de// de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la// bla na med pa yang reg par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
12b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol du gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang /
12b5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang / lha gzhan dag la phyag bgyis par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis// grangs ma mchis// bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma
12b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag du ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gA zhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
12b7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
13a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la
13a2(dkon brtsegs): ni stsal bar mi bgyi'o zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam
13a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab// gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang drug da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
13a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
13a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du// gal te 'di la ni yon dbul bar bgyi'o// 'di la ni yon/
13a6(dkon brtsegs): dbul bar mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal
13a7(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su
13b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi/ 'di la ni stsal bar
13b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
13b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan
13b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par
13b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bkum par 'os pa'i sems can la la shig khring de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag
13b7(dkon brtsegs): gi lus yongs su gtang ba ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na
14a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i
14a2(dkon brtsegs): bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gal te bkum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar pa ma bgyis kyi bar du/
14a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes smras so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas yang dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub
14a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me 'khrugs pa 'dis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dbang du gyur pa dang /
14a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa dang / gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de ni lha dang / mi dang / lnga
14a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro snyam mo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14a7(dkon brtsegs): spun chen po des dge slong de'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa de thugs kyis mkhyen nas// dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod rnam par rtog pa de bzhin
14b1(dkon brtsegs): the dge slong gang gis du na gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du skur ba dang / tshad mar gyur bar 'jog pade'ang ring por mi thogs par lnga dang / mi dang / lnga
14b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par gyur ro// dge slong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po de lta bus bla na
14b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/
14b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des
14b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i semaso bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
14b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
14b7(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ltung ba'i nongs pa byung ba dag mthong na/ khyod la ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung ngo zhes ltung ba glengs par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
15a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang
15a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du nyan thos kyi ltung ba'i snga
15a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam dag kyang mi grag cing me 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
15a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ngar bar 'gyur ba dang / yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa ji lta ba snyed pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtsal bar dgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
15a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos
15a7(dkon brtsegs): le/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tha na g.yar lam tsam du khu ba byung bar gyur na/ bdag gis
15b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ blangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang /
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla ni med pa yang
15b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theb pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
15b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar gyur pa dag tha na g.yar lam na'ang khu ba mi 'byin pa de lngar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o// btsun pa
15b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dri bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la
15b6(dkon brtsegs): tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
15b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ da ltar gyi bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon gang lags pa'i bud med dang / bud med kyi skyon de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa
16a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing / bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis
16a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
16a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
16a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis
16a5(dkon brtsegs): na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis// bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
16a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag
16a7(dkon brtsegs): ni ji lta ji ltar sems mngon par bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par 'grub cing/ de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol to//
16b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dmu bcas pa 'di ga la
16b2(dkon brtsegs): yang drag pa'i smon lam yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur yang dag pa yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis rkang pa g.yas
16b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun tu rab tu gso ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul
16b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kun tu rab tu 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu rab tu ldeg par byos shig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa des de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des// rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong
16b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'angadi rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg
16b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par byas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par gyur pa yin no/
17a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas
17a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i
17a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de 'dra ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
17a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
17a5(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na lha'i ris ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
17a6(dkon brtsegs): bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
17a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i
17b1(dkon brtsegs): bu ba snyed pa de ga thams cad 'dus nas bral mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing gi 'di skad ces kyi ma sngon ma bos pa'i seng ge'i sra chen po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i
17b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa 'dis bsgrags pa las thos so zhes smras so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas khwa mthun par 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa
17b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs
17b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so// sems can gang dag gis seng ge'i sgra chen po dang / khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs pa chen po dang /
17b5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan don dang ldan pa ma lags so zhes gsol to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
17b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i ko na chen po ci 'dre ba gang de bzhin
17b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yongs su brjod pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis par bdag gis sngan chad ma thos lags so// de skad
18a1(dkon brtsegs): nas sol pa dang / sam ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rAdwa tI'i rdul 'drin A dA kAd+hA sprul// shA radwa tI'i bu bzhin no// da
18a2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me 'khrugs pa des kau che chen po gang bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
18a3(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po ro dang go cha chen po de bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' delta
18a4(dkon brtsegs): bu ni byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
18a5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag nang po dag gi nang na'ang nyung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po mi 'khrugs pa de yon tan gang dag dang ldan pa'i yon tan de dag ni bskal pa bzang po
18a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
18a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
18b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lA dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis ngad ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur
18b3(dkon brtsegs): bar lung bstan pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po nges// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
18b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing
18b5(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab
18b6(dkon brtsegs): tu ldeg par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi
18b7(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i'i jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po 'di'i nga rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar gsos/ rab tu g.yas/ kun tu rab
19a1(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
19a2(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
19a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang shi gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa
19a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de legs su btud/ rab tu btud// mngon par rab tu btud par gyur te/
19a5(dkon brtsegs): shA rA dwa ti'i bu dper na dasra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pan
19a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs su btud/
19a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bdud mngon par rab tu btud par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b1(dkon brtsegs): spyanananu po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsnun pa na/ stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i'i dzin
19b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams ngan lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mI dang / mi ma yin pa'i
19b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
19b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur to// shU ra dwa ti'i bu dper na dras bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te// thams cad mkhyen
19b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
19b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rjen gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ phyag
19b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
20a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
20a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de na bud med snum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur to// sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar
20a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// sems can spros pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur to// sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang
20a4(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes
20a5(dkon brtsegs): pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur// sems can long ba rnams
20a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur// sems can smos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur/ sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba
20a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po
20b1(dkon brtsegs): des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20b2(dkon brtsegs): de na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam yang ka shis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
20b3(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshis ngan du 'ching ni
20b4(dkon brtsegs): dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub
20b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsnun pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lha'i
20b6(dkon brtsegs): dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag kyang byung bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
20b7(dkon brtsegs): shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i dri bsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
21a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nan po mi 'chugs
21a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni de ltar lung bstan pa nyid na yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur pa las na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan
21a3(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de
21a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na yon tan+da brgya
21a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag nyi tser yang ma zad de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa'ang yin no//
21a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
21a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang / mi dang /
21b1(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems nyams bde bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa tI'i bu dper nA ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pani
21b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lnga dang / mi dang /
21b3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan dang de bzhin
21b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mI 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
21b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de'i phyi bzhin
21b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'brang bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed
21b7(dkon brtsegs): paM na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnod sbyin bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad nga'i phyi bzhin du bzang bar gyur pa
22a1(dkon brtsegs): / bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub
22a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang /
22a3(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su gtor
22a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i/
22a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi spong chen bro'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / kru dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ma dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cu dang /
22a7(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / 'dug pa dag gis nga ga la ba de logs su gtor
22b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ snong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten
22b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams de na mi bye ba phrag nyi shu dang / lha bye ba phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin
22b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad me tog ut+pa la dang / pA dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis kun tu khebs par
22b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ shA ra rA ti'i bu dper na ras bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed pa na/ me tog
23a1(dkon brtsegs): ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis byang chub kyi snying po kun tu khebs par gyur pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
23a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
23a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba
23a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de legs su bor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces
23a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me 'khrugs pa 'di myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras /
23a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya
23a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lnga'i gos bye ba khrag mogi brgya stong phrag du ma dag ga la ba de legs su bor ba bzhin no//
23b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de
23b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa nu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams de'i lha dang / mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar
23b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
23b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pa ma dag bu la dga'
23b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa bzhin no// / bam po gnyis pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ 'di ltar sangs
23b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lnga dang mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jug
24a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de lung bstan pa thos par gyur to// de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can+da klung yin pa de dag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag kyang
24a2(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dgra sbyin pa byin par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba bzhi po blon zla ba chung kyi
24a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba ny+tsa la ku mu dra'i 'du sngon gyi tshe na 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa
24a4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa gtong bar byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa'
24a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i
24a6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa byed par gyur to// lha bye
24a7(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyong lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu dkrol nas a la la zhes ca co dang gzha'i sgra dag kyang phyung bar gyur te/
24b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang ldan par gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
24b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
24b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos 'di ltar legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ gru rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi rnam
24b5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nyid nas yon tan
24b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyad par de lta bu dag yongs su zing cing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa yon tan dre lta bu dang ldan pa de'i lung bstan pa
24b7(dkon brtsegs): de'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
25a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
25a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lung bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa
25a3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig mdor
25a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdus te gsungs par zad kyi/ rgya cher bstan pa ni ma yin no// de skad ces smras pa dor/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//
25a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de de bzhin te// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su
25a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
25a7(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'khrugs pa de ni dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyir te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te nyon cig dang / bcom
25b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan dang phran yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lags na/ btsun
25b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag shin tu legs par bstan cing rgya cher bshad du gsol/
25b5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs
25b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan par byas/ de legs par rab tu nyon la tshul
25b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcon
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis// de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di snyam du rnam
26a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gis dam bcas pa ni gzhan du mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed de// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni go cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ri ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pas go cha chen po bgos
26a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de lta bu'i go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dus bskul pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su mu mthong ngo
26a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog gi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa'i cha
26a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'gro ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos par gyur pa'i go cha chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
26a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag
26b1(dkon brtsegs): la'ang med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des// de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag par blangs pas bla na myed pa dang
26b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi
26b3(dkon brtsegs): khams mngon par dka' ba zhes bya ba na da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan pa das de bzhin
26b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gis lag pa 'a ma rkang pa 'am/ mgo 'am/
26b5(dkon brtsegs): mig gam yan lag dang / nying lag gang yang rung ba dag bslangs pa na ma byin pa gang yang med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
26b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
26b7(dkon brtsegs): yang zad pa na bar ma gyur/ rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mthos pa las gyur pa 'am bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur te
27a1(dkon brtsegs): shA rA dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di'i nga byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub
27a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing
27a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du'ang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas// de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
27a5(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo na sa dbang bzlar ba khang bzangs kyi steng nas yang bzangs kyi
27a6(dkon brtsegs): steng du 'gro'ang / rkang mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do// de khang bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod cing
27a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe zad par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
27b1(dkon brtsegs): ba spyod pa na'ang / des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas s+ho// thams cad du'ang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing ga thams cad
27b2(dkon brtsegs): du'ong 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing gdu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a das dag mngon
27b3(dkon brtsegs): sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do// de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las
27b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te chos ston gyi nyon thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston pa ni nyung ngo // gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na'ang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
27b5(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te chos ston to// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na'ang // de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to// des
27b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pas sems can rnams byang chub la btul cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
27b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsams nas de dag la yang dag par ston// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag par rab dga' bar byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom
28a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson
28a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/ kye ma
28a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
28a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa 'di nyan par gyur cig/ zos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang // 'chang
28a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing // gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang drag par rab tu ston par gyur cig/ tshe rabs brjes nas kyang chos de dag mi brjed par
28a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du/ der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / sangs
28a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
28b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ klang drug dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
28b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe nu/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni chos nyid de/ byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma
28b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ lus thams mu'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu grang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
28b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa dag skye ba nas chen po'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po srid pa zam pa'i rnam pa ni 'di
28b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag yin// rtags ni 'di dag yon/ mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ shU ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni ma'i mngal du zhugs pa na mi
28b6(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba dri dra bas gos par mi 'gyur// der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang cher bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na'ang nam mkha' la gnas so//
28b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ deper na rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad mor zhugs nas bar snang gi
29a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa la na par 'gags pa'i spyo sa kyis nas par rgyu / 'du bas kAstsu bar ga ga pa bya / klu du 'i dUr dwa
29a2(dkon brtsegs): raba' sring pa tham pa ma'i mang la na banas pa na// nam mkha' lo mngon par 'phags nas gnas/ mdul gyi dris dang mi gtsang ba ni de bas migs par gnas shing / der 'du pa
29a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu mi 'khrugs pa
29a4(dkon brtsegs): de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di snyam du sems ti/ ji ltar bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par
29a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/
29a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa na/ rnam bla na rnyed pa 'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
29a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par rangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdud dang 'drid kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thams cad kyi rnams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi sems cad du grags mi rnyed par gyur
29b1(dkon brtsegs): 'asong dbyung na du sem pa dang 'a de dag gis smra spyan sum tshogs pa du dgamongs su sa par mamyur bu bring du ngas nga rgyu rlu kyi mying do par byur smi
29b2(dkon brtsegs): shAr dwa ti'i bum du sa na 'das dang mi gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngas rgyas mi'i drugasu kyang nubasem sa dnga'i skyed da
29b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa 'am// rnas ma po'i cha na 'ga' dang de'i lus la dam pa 'as/ sanas lta bar sgyur ba da b+h+ri d+d+he// shA radwa tISh+T+ri bu 'di lta
29b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnyes dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos kyi sku rab tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de
29b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing chos nyan pa na 'du snyam du sems te
29b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa bzhin du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na// sems can
29b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis chos mi 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing chos 'dod par gyur cig snyam mo// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las
30a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dazugs pa'i bkod pa yongs su brjod pa zhes byu ba sde le nu dang po rtogs so// de nas ban na dus lag rgya nga
30a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i dus 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa nga
30a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag ni logs par bka' stsal lags na btsun pa bcom
30a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis da yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon ta
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa mchis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis
30a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa zos nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu sim pa dang dag par rdzogs pa'i
30a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'jugs pa de la'ang bas pa dang phyag 'gyi ba dang / mchod pa byi dang / banyen par bgyi ba dang / mnyes par dbye ba'i srid du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
30b1(dkon brtsegs): smos kyi brag par sa kyi sa / gas kyi sun rgyun sa makyis byang sa zhugs pa dag sun du / rgyas de sbyin ky-i bu da pa smra
30b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i stongs rgyas mi 'grubs pa la ban+d+ha ba dang // rgyug dargya ba dang mchod pa byung dang / bdun dgyu nga
30b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i slang du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dril 'di skad ces
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de
30b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab
30b6(dkon brtsegs): tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang // 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na
30b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa bshad par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ni zhes gsol te// bcom ldan
31a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
31a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can thams cad kyis deng nas zhag bdun na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag
31a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ sems can de dag thams cad kha zas kyi 'du shes kun tu byung bar ma gyur to// bkres pa'i 'du shes ma byung /
31a4(dkon brtsegs): skom pa'i 'du shes ma byung // mal du nyal ba'i 'du shes ma byung // lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes ma byung gi/ gzhan du na sems can de dag thams cad bde ba'i 'du shes
31a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur te// dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i 'du shes dang // sems rangs pa dang // sems kyi nyams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na// shA ra
31a6(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i ston lam
31a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyad par gyis de dag thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i yon tan dag yongs su zin par gyur pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi
31b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis deng nas zhag bdun na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
31b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyus mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ de dag 'khrig pa spyod pa'i 'du shes kun tu 'byung bar gyur ro//
31b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir na nu/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
31b4(dkon brtsegs): pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rag+na bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
31b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyed pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong
