87b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na de dag ni kun nas bsrungs pa dang / bskyabs pa dang / sbas pa yin par shes par bya'o// gang gi tshe de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na 'ang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
87b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dka' ba zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro// shAr dwa pon
87b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni thag ring po na 'dug kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la snang bar byed do// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngaH
87b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ye shes kyi snang ba mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong lha'i mig dang ldan pa ni thag ring po na gnas kyang gzugs kyi kha dog
88a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dag mthong ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
88a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa de 'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs dag
88a3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ni/ thag ring po na gnas kyang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi
88a4(dkon brtsegs): sems yang dag par shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrubs pa de'ang thag ring po na
88a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems yang dag par mkhyen to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ba ri lta ste
88a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni thag ring po na gnas kyang rna bas sgra dag thos so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
88a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma'i khrugs pa de'ang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag cag kyang sangs
88b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dka' ba der skye bar bya'o zhes smra ba dag gsan cing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
88b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi ming dang rus ci yin pa'ang mkhyen to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i/
88b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klob pa dang / kun rngub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de
88b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des gzigs so// de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des mkhyen to// de dag ni nam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i bar du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
88b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa des dgongs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan pa das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
88b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su gzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde ga
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bkan sul to
89a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin
89a3(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su bzung bas/ sems can thams cad kyang shin tu yongs su
89a4(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhig la/ 'di lta ste/ 'azas sA lu 'am/ 'bru 'am/ nas sam/ gro ma
89a5(dkon brtsegs): til lam/ mon san ze'u 'a ma/ sran chung ngam/ 'bru'i rnam pa gzhan gang yang rung bas gang ba'i bang ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi nam/ lnga 'am/ bcu
89a6(dkon brtsegs): Sha ma/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu ba ma/ bzhi bcu ba ma/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'a ma/ stong ngam/ 'bum mAm/ shin tu mang po dag cig bdog par gyur na/ de bdi snyam du 'di dag ni mu
89a7(dkon brtsegs): ge byung ba 'am/ 'phongs par gyur pa na 'di dag gis lo legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu ge byung bar gyur pa na/ sems
89b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi gsos su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
89b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
89b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nas kyang / dam pa'i chos kyi mu ger gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos bshad pas/ dam pa'i chos kyi lo legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lo legs par 'gyur
89b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
89b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gad+ma la la dgra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
89b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog ca
89b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang
90a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang 'debs par byed pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas
90a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
90a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed 'chang bar byed klog par byed/ kun
90a4(dkon brtsegs): chub par byed cing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong
90a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
90a6(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam ma btab kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
90a7(dkon brtsegs): tu lungo bstan par rig par bya ste/ de dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
90b1(dkon brtsegs): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'jug
90b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan mongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing zos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ theg par byed kun nub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang tu rtse
90b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston la/ bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas te/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan nas srog chags brgya phrag
90b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po drang srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag
90b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed la/ de dag ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de lta
90b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
90b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya// kun chub par bya ste/
91a1(dkon brtsegs): bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas nas srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong drag
91a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang dag par bshad bar bya/ yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i
91a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur te/ de dag
91a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis zag pa zad pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
91a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan
91a6(dkon brtsegs): cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed 'chang bar byed/ thog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag
91a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par
91b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dir du 'jug ci 'jud de rab tu bkod pa de dag thams cad kyang lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis
91b2(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur na'ang/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na nyan thos
91b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
91b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya zhing / thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya// bklag par
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bya kun chub par bya gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya zhing / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags
91b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ gzung bar bya/ rab tu dgod
91b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
92a1(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ban/
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la dus dus su yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba gnyis pa las 'da' par ni mi 'gyur
92a3(dkon brtsegs): ro// shwa ra dwa tI'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan pa das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
92a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ji ltar 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya
92a5(dkon brtsegs): cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur zhing sogs par 'gyur ro// de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags
92a6(dkon brtsegs): pa des lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur nang du/ yang
92a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis kyang / don gyi dbang 'di
92b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya zhing rnal 'byor du bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ngas pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
92b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs da
92b3(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bsnun par bya'o// shwa ra dwa 'i'i bu yang nyan thos kyi theb
92b4(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dgra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod
92b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab
92b6(dkon brtsegs): tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag
92b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'bod la/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bsgrub cing rtsol 'bad de slob cing mos na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu na/
93a1(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theb pa pa'i rigs kyi bu sam rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni srid pa tha ma la gnas pa 'am/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'am/ skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa 'ag
93a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gsum gyis thobs pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
93a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam mangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi nus te
93a4(dkon brtsegs): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ba zhig gi rna lam du zag par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des kyang sgyu ba myur bar
93a5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
93a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can 'ga' zhig gi don gyi phyir/ kye ma sems can pa des bcom ldan pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
93a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur cig ces 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dbyig dang gser gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin la yongs su btang bar gyur kyang /
93b1(dkon brtsegs): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sor ngan mongs
93b2(dkon brtsegs): su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed cing / rigs
93b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
93b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'tshal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag ni gnas par mi 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan du na chos kyi
93b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi rag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa
93b6(dkon brtsegs): dang lus la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che rin thang med par rin che ba gang yang rung ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas
93b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer te 'ongs par gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che de dang po'o nar su 'i lag tu song bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rin po che de ni dang /
94a1(dkon brtsegs): lo nar rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu rnams sam/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po rnams kyi sdug par mchi bar 'gyur lags so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
94a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang byang chub sems
94a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lag tu gnas par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
94a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la'ang
94a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid du rnal 'byor du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de skad ces
94a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
94a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su
94b1(dkon brtsegs): rjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi zhing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags
94b2(dkon brtsegs): so de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob
94b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i srad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/
94b4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
94b5(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par/
94b6(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun po dag ni las kyi rnam
94b7(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa las byung ba yin no// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ngas 'khor bzhi po rnams la yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan
95a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang bcom ldan pa ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
95a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i
95a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs padi thos pa dang than par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'a das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de
95a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang bskam
95a5(dkon brtsegs): pre bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa drug gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang dper na ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi po dag la bshad
95a6(dkon brtsegs): cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bsnun pa bzhin du lhag chad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
95a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam zangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du
95b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
95b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par bya ba la la zhig gis bcom ldan pa das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
95b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun tu
95b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par byar mi rnyed par gyur la/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas
95b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par byung ba de la gal te la la zhig gis 'di skad du/ gal te rigs kyi bu khyod khyim gyi gnas na gnas shing / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed na/ de lta na ngas khyod la/
95b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de de sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na
96a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir/ gal te chos kyi rnam
96a2(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di mnyan pa 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ bcang ba 'am/ bklag pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba 'am/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par byar rnyed na khyim gyi gnas
96a3(dkon brtsegs): su song ste/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhing kun chub par byas te/ yang phyir mngon par byung yang byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa pa'i gang zas khyim
96a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par ngas rjes su gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
96a5(dkon brtsegs): zag de 'das ne' nga/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub
96a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ thag ring por gyur pa gang zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
96a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon nyin yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam zangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngos der yang 'azod par
96b1(dkon brtsegs): bya lding der byin nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs
96b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mu 'tsho/ rigs kyi bu mo la la mig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'grubs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos
96b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes sems bskyed
96b5(dkon brtsegs): skar dwa ti'i dugs tu rigs kyi su rnam dmas kyi gyibacom ldan pangs de dun gshegs par bcos pa dang dag par rdzogs pa'i song pa rgyas mi bcugs pa
96b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod par ni mi nus kyi// glegs bam du byas pa zhig lag na bsrel bar gyur na/ des glegs bam de brnyas te phyir log nus bdag gi glegs
96b7(dkon brtsegs): bam rje bar bya'o// gal te rdzogs pas bskur du mi snang nabang de nyid du bri bar bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mod 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod zan bcang
97a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'di 'od na de lta na ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su
97a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod du'i chos kyi rnam zangs 'dri sbyin par bya'o zhes be nadang / des zen bcad de 'dug la dri bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di skang du 'chab cing ris cig ces der nabang des dacag cing rje
97a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di srid du 'greng sde ris shig ces der na'ang des 'greng ste bri bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di skad du 'dug ste ris shig ces zer na'ang des 'dug ste bri bar bya'o//
97a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ grong ngam/ grong khyer du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'di dag
97a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma rnyed par gyur na/ de nas rgyal khams gzhan nam/ yul gzhan dag tu'ang bgrod cing /
97a7(dkon brtsegs): gang du thos par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o// der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs
97b1(dkon brtsegs): su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam drangs 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// shwar
97b2(dkon brtsegs): rA ti'i bu de ltar gang du thos par 'gyur ba der phyin nas/ kal te mi rnyeng na'ang des 'di snyam du/ gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
97b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i ming thos par gyur pas na/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jig
97b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med la/ gang gis de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i
97b5(dkon brtsegs): ming bstan pa de'ang bdag la phan par 'dod pa/ bde bar 'dod pa/ don du 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'a das
97b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
97b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas bshad de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis thos pa dang / gang dag gis thos par
98a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das li/ tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra/
98a2(dkon brtsegs): d+hU ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
98a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i mthus thos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i dung 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das
98a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan pa das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
98a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi mthus thos par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar dam pa'i chos smra ba dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sme bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang spro ba skye bar
98a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan par 'gyur pa de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pas kyang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin spro ba skye bar
98b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'a das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan pa das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
98b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tron yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni// yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de skad
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/
98b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ yon tan gyi chos chen po dang
98b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dag med par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te phyogs
98b7(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig tu 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba bab par 'gyur na/ de 'bab pa na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ bcom ldan pa das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
99a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
99a2(dkon brtsegs): de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis klu brgya phrag mang po dang / gru stong phrag mang po dang / klu brgya stong phrag mang po dang / klu bye ba khrag khrig
99a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag mang po sdug bsngal bar gyur ba dag thar bar mdzad cing / thar bar mdzad nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngos te/ dge pa'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla ni med pa yang dag
99a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu klu khro bo dag gis 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bengs par byed
99a5(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de na sems can gang dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mtshan nas brjod par 'gyur zhing / der yang bdag gi mthus 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar
99a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces yongs su bsdus pa'i bden pa dang // bden pa'i chog des bdag tsug la 'khor le draka pa ste bu'i sa nga 'bab pa 'di dag ni bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis nA// klu rnam
99a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu ka nan
99b1(dkon brtsegs): yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu so ga 'jigs pa'asmra/ sdug pa 'am/ bams kyi nang dam// gnod pa byung bar gyur ba na/ som ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dang pa/
99b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'jugs pade rjes su dran par bya zhing bcom ldan padas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ston byang chub sems
99b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang / tshig brjod pa gang yin pa'i dam bcas pa dang / tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur
99b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ dam bcas pa dang tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / sems kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'di dag
99b5(dkon brtsegs): nub par gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jibs pa de dag dang / skrag pa de dag dang / yams kyi nang de dag dang / gnod pa de drug nub par 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon
99b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
99b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi/ gnyis ni ma lags pas/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
100a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
100a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
100a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
100a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrubs
100a6(dkon brtsegs): bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na ming ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// shA ra dwa tiH
100a7(dkon brtsegs): du ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su byungs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba de ltar gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu drang
100b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
100b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pa nyid kyang mtshungs// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs/ kha dog kyang mtshungs/ rtags kyang mtshungs/ rigs kyang mtshungs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang
100b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'dus pa'ang mtshungs/ de dag gi rnam par grol ba'ang mtshungs mod kyi/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
100b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa tha dad par 'gyur ba dang / seng ge'i khri tha dad pa dang / pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lnga rnams dang / tshangs
100b6(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lnga rnams shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyug
100b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i bcom
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dir bag/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrangs
101a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
101a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs ris kyi lnga de dag gis lnga'i me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+dar ba chen po dang / lha'i spos ngag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
101a5(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor ro// mngon par gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang / spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi
101a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen por gnas par gyur to// gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
101a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de las/
101b1(dkon brtsegs): su me togadag gis gtor bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po 'di dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di ga
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / cangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
101b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis yongs su rtog
101b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang
101b5(dkon brtsegs): steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / tshangs ris kyi lnga de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha'
101b6(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'phags nas par snang la 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
101b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
102a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas
102a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang steng gi bar snang la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
102a3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan pa dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
102a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ci/ sum cu rtsa gsum
102a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi lnga'i ris nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
102a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i lha rnams yin nam 'on te 'di dag mi yin snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni lha yin te/ dam pa'i/
102b1(dkon brtsegs): chos mthun pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang nags 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug go
102b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang / dpal dang / skal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dag lanu 'gar yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro snyas so//
102b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
102b4(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lnga'i bu de dag the tsom dang bcas// yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su chud nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
102b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa'i mi 'di dag ni lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dgu dang ldan pa
102b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ mi gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyang mthong la lha'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag ni lnga'i
102b7(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'dod par bya ba yin no// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das
103a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
103a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'ang mthong
103a4(dkon brtsegs): bas na/ ko'u shi ka gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ ko'u shi ka gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos
103a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam bu sems te/ gang dag gi rna ba'i lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs
103a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka byang chub
103a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa/
103b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar sems bskyed na/ de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'
103b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ltar gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba shad pa na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam na len pa med bur zag pa rnams
103b3(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong brgya stong gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge
103b4(dkon brtsegs): slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen brgyang stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btas
103b5(dkon brtsegs): go/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen ma khris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon las btang po// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sde'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
103b6(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to// gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de nyid du
104a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung ston par 'gyur te/ lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro//
104a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
104a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/
104a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur bu ra/ kun tu rab tu bur 'u ra/ chem nem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem zhing /
104a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
104a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
104a7(dkon brtsegs): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/
104b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug pa rdzogs so// / srog stong lnga brgya bzhi bcu ste/ bas po lnga'o// rgya bar gyi mkhan po ni na mi tra dang / su renA d+ha po des
104b2(dkon brtsegs): gu chen gyi lo tsab ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
104b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha'i dkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
104b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'a tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan pa das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'od ma'i tshal na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
104b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stug dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas
104b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing gus pas rim gro dang bkur sti byas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'dus
104b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ spyi bo btud de phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka
105a1(dkon brtsegs): la ba de logs su thal po sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom cung zad cig mchis te// de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'tshas na/ thugs rjes gnang bar snadang
105a2(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag la bshang du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpa' chen skyes bu chen
105a3(dkon brtsegs): po ste// 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag ni sems can dag gi slad// the tshom cung zad zhu ba lags// seng ge'i gdan la ma bzhengs par// sku ni phyogs bcu kun tu rtsub// tha dad
105a4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba thams cad kyis// gang yang bskul bar mi 'gyur bar// mkhyen pa'i gter ni mtha' mi mnga'/ stobs rnams kyang ni tshad ma mchis// bcom ldan stobs ni re res kyang // 'jig rten ma lus
105a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar mdzad// thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas shing // stobs bcu la ni gang gnas pa// mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste// rgyal ba bla na med pa'i gtso// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad
105a6(dkon brtsegs): dgu/ de bzhin gshegs la mnga' bas na// 'jig rten rnams ni gsal mdzad cing // mu stegs rnams ni pham par mdzad// chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas// de skad mtha' med
105a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog ces bgyi// nyams mi mnga' ba'i 'dren pa la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// dri med mkhyen pa mtha' med pa// mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin// mkhyen pa yul la thogs mi mnga'/
105b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan legs par bsgoms pas na// lam la the tshom yong mi mda'// bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// chu bo dag ni rab
105b2(dkon brtsegs): brgal cing // mtshams sbyor 'ching ba yongs bcad pa// gdug pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing // nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ga/
105b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bsil la rang gnas la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// 'jigs med ye shes bla med dang // ye shes chags dang thogs med pa// chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mkhyen pa rnams// de bzhin
105b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas mngon sum brnyes// sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas// mngon sum mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs// zag bcas thams cad bang gyur cing // nyon mongs lta ba rab bcom pa//
105b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa// mang po dag ni rab tu bsags// bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la// bad ba ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mchog gi mkhyen pa yis// 'jig rten kun
105b6(dkon brtsegs): ni gsal bar mdzad// chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'// 'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten kun tu gsal bar mdzad// de srad 'jig
105b7(dkon brtsegs): rten sangs rgyas kyi// chos kyi 'od zer snang ba lags// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen// spobs pa dag ni bla na med// brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab cing // rnam dag lta ba rab
106a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med pas// mkhyen pa'i yul yang mtha' mi mnga'// 'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba
106a2(dkon brtsegs): legs// chos rgyal rngub pa chen po yis// sems can the tshom gcod par mdzad// 'dren pa la ni bdag zhun// mos pa ji bzhin bkas bshad gsol// lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun/
106a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag gis rab brtags na// de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas// thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad// yon tan rnams la rab gnas shing // rgyun dang ldan pa'i
106a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes chen lags// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal// drang srong nang na gsal ba po// dper na grangs ri chen po ni// rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas// bcom ldan chos gangan
106a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa yi// bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no// rab dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po yis// yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pas// sems can gang dag thos gyur na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam
106a6(dkon brtsegs): dag gyur// bcom ldan mi yi mchog lags pas// chos kyi snang ba ston par mdzad// des na sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin blo ni bde bar 'gyur// dus dang 'khor ni rab
106a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing // gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis// chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas// dus mkhyen pa yi blo ldan lags// tshangs skad brtson 'grus chen po yis// rnam dag gsung ni bkas
106b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad gsol// chur chen sa la babs pa ltar// chos kyi rlan gyis khyab par mdzod// bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te// kun tu chos kyi char rab nas// chos 'di la ni gang re ba/
106b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni rnam par mdzod// mchog tu bde la rab gnas pas// rgyal po ri rab ji lta bzhin// sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing // mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod// dpa' chen
106b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyis gtse dag gi/ spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyad pas// sems can dag ni thams cad kyis// gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis// 'khor 'dus 'thun par/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dag/ thub pa che la badzin nas ni// sangs rgyas spyod yul tshol ba lags// bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la// gzhol ba'i srad du 'dir mchis na// 'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mang ba/
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar myur du dbye mi mdzad// bdag ni de yis mos pa bzhin// zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na// bcom ldan thugs rje rab phye nas// the tsom rnams ni gcad du gsol// bu med chos ni thos
106b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na// sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lus ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas// the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs mi mngag// thams
106b7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la// the tshom cung zad yongs mi mnga'// rab brtson madren pa chen po la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba
107a1(dkon brtsegs): lags// bla med the tsom chad pa po// chos la the tsom mi mnga' ba// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// snang ba chen po dpag med dang // yon tan chen/
107a2(dkon brtsegs): po dpag med dang // rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang // spyod yul mkhyen pa dpag med dang // phan 'dogs mkhyen pa dpas
107a3(dkon brtsegs): med la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang // mtha' dang mtha' med rab tu spangs// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/
107a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal// thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol// gnang bar mdzad na bdag zhun/ thub pa chen pos bshang du gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso// grags chen la ni
107a5(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba lags// gal te thugs rjes gnang 'gyur na// the tsomra dra ba gcang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas
107a6(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros mtha' yas// deng khyed kyis nga'i zhal du bltas nas sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dris/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/ gul te
107a7(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba yod nangs bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ blo zos mtha' yas khyod kyis ni// nga la ci zhig /
107b1(dkon brtsegs): bar sems// de bzhin du ni zhus shig dang // ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// khyod kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin// re re nas ni gsal phye nas// ji ltar mos dang 'dun pa bzhin// b+hur du phyes
107b2(dkon brtsegs): rab bshad // ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyis// thams cad the tshom med par byos// ji ltar khyod kyis 'dod pa bzhin// khyod kyis zhus dang 'tsham par bshad// deng khyod dus bzhin du
107b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis// dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin// dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir// ngas ni nges par rab bshad do// ji ltar khyod kyis mos pa bzhin// zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang // ngas ni thams
107b4(dkon brtsegs): cad rjes 'thun par// khyod la rab tu bshad par bya// deng khyod dus su zhus shig dang // ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya// the tshom dra ba gcad pas na// the tshom med pa 'thob par 'gyur//
107b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ni chos kyi rjer gyur pas// don ni mthar phyin thugs su chud// chos rnams thams cad dag la yang // the tshom med pa brnyes pa yin// nga ni chos rnams thams cad las// mngon sangs rgyas
107b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bsam dka' yin// sems can mos pa ji bzhin du// zhus pa dag ni ston par mdzad// nga ni chos rnams thams cad la// thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bag/ dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la// b+hur/
107b7(dkon brtsegs): du bshad pa mdzad pa yin// ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing // the tshom dag ni mi mnga' bas// de yis mos pa ji lta bar// de mi the tshom gcod par mdzad// nga ni nag tu dus rnams dang /
108a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang // sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// bsam pa tha dad mkhyen pa yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// 'dod pa dang ni 'dod med
108a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ so sor rab tu brtags nas ni// de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin// gal te blo dang ldan pa rnams// legs pa nyid du bsgrubs byas na// nga yi dus dang sbyar nas ni// yang dag chos ston
108a3(dkon brtsegs): go bar mdzad// blo dang mi ldan de dag ni// gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs shing // de dag shes rab snang med pas// yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur// gal te gus pa med gyur na//
108a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag chos ni chol mi byed// chos 'di thob par gyur kyang ni// snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye// gang zhig chos la mkhas 'gyur ba// chos la mos shing tshol bar byed// gal te chos 'di thos
108a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na// rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// theg chen dag la mos pa ni// mi yi gtso bo tshol byed pas// rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag
108a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes la// gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni// thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// thogs med ye shes la mos dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag/ des ni chos 'di
108a7(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur na// bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur// sems can dag ni la la zhig/ byang chub snying po tshol ba dang // bla med 'khor lo bskor 'dod pa// chos 'di thos nas dga' bar 'gyur/
108b1(dkon brtsegs): mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang // chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa// dri med chos ni thos gyur na// mos shing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems can la la dag/ legs par bsgrubs
108b2(dkon brtsegs): par mos gyur pa// chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi// bla med chos 'di bstan par bya// khur lci rnams ni khyer ba dang // nan tan bsgrub la gang mos pa// des ni chos pa di thos gyur na
108b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas kun tu khyab par 'gyur// gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis// dge ba'i chos ni sems byed na// de la snying brtse bsam bzhag nas// rab tu phye nas bstan par bya// khyod la
108b4(dkon brtsegs): sogs la thugs brtse'i phyir// khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin// ngas kyang yang dag nges par ni// khyod kyi the tshom gcad par bya// ngas ni lo mang stong phrag tu// thabs mkhas dag ni
108b5(dkon brtsegs): rab bsgoms shing // the tshom dag ni bsal bas na// khyod kyi mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gal te the tshom yod gyur na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// khyod la rab tu bstan pas na/
108b6(dkon brtsegs): the tshom rnams ni chad par bya// gal te the tshom yod gyur na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ni// ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// gal te the tshom yong gyur na/
108b7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'dong bzhin zhu bar gyis// nga ni chos la rab gnas pas// g.yo ba med pa brnyes pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
109a1(dkon brtsegs): #chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag byang chub
109a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa las the tshom cung zad cig mchis pa deng zhu ba lags na/ ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jigs pa spangs nas/ yang dag par sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du ge rtsa
109a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po bgos nas/ go rgya chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang / mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang / bag sod pa dang bcas pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas/ shin tu rnam par dag
109a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho dman dang / gyo mo dang / gsag ma dang / mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/ grub rngu gdug pa'i sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs
109a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/ 'ching ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / bar chang ma mchis pa// drang zhing gya gyu ma mchis pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang / thogs pa ma mchis
109a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shul du zhugs nas/ lta ba'i thibs po rnams gcad pa dang / dra ba thams cad dral ba dang / mun nag rnams bsal ba dang / sred pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang ba dag 'du 'phro rnams
109a7(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i slad du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b1(dkon brtsegs): la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu ba gsor ba lags so// skyes bu dam pa rdzi lta bus bon chen po rdo lta bu bgos na/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'dis theb pa chen po la 'chal nas/ lam chen po 'dis
109b2(dkon brtsegs): gnos zhing yang dag pa 'dzub par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod pa gang lags pa dang / lam la gnas pa/
109b3(dkon brtsegs): dang chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags pa bkas rashad du gsol// chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni/ chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i
109b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba bskyed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni go cha mi spong bar theb pa chen po la 'tshal nas/ nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / brjed ngas pa ma mchis pa'i dbang
109b5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / rgyun chad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis sbyar du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor
109b6(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang / ji ltar gzhol ba bzhin du 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lags
109b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'dis sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di
110a1(dkon brtsegs): zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa lags na/ chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
110a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na ma mchis pa
110a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs shing / sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman rab tu mkhyen pa lags pas/ dege slad du bdag zhu ba gsol lags so//
110a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slad// sangs rgyas chos don zab mo das/
110a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po// rkang gnyis gcol bdag zhu lags// theg pa chen po rnal 'byor pa// ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa// sems can rnams la sman srad du// deng ba
110a7(dkon brtsegs): nu ba gsol ba lags// ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis// go cha dpag med bge bar 'gyur// de ltar go cha bgos nas kyang // ji ltar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dun pa spong bar 'gyur//
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur// ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur// ji ltar bag yod ldan par 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// theg cen 'di la gzhol bar bgyid//
110b2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'tshal ni ci bgyid pa// dngos po 'di yang bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar theg rjen bteg nas ni// byang chub sems la gnol 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i thugs rje mis/
110b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyur du bdag la bkas bshang gsol// ji ltar yang dag mnam lam gyis// mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur// lta ba rnams kyi thibs pa dag/ gcod par bgyid la skyon mi 'gyur// spyod
110b4(dkon brtsegs): yul dag ni thams cad las// ji ltar bgyid na 'da' bar 'gyur// ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis// 'dod chags dra ba dral bar 'gyur// ji ltar mun nag rab bsal nas// ye shes snang
110b5(dkon brtsegs): chen thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis// ji ltar bgyis na gzhol bar 'gyur// ji ltar so sor rab brtags pas// 'ching ba mang po spong bar 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub
110b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams// 'ching ba spangs nas bde bar gnas// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'jigs pa che las 'dad par 'gyur// chos kyi den la mkhas gyur nas// bla med la ni
110b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'i// dpag med go cha bgo bar bgyid// go cha de dag bgos nas kyang // theg chen la ni 'tshal bar bgyid// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
111a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams// mnyam nyid lam la gzhol bar bgyid// bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/
111a2(dkon brtsegs): go cha bkod pa thob 'gyur dang // bla med theg pa rab brgyan pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshang gsol// lam 'di la ni gnas pa dang // las de'i bkod pa gang lags dang // chos
111a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni mkhas gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rnams dang // chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba dag/ ji lta bur ni rtogs 'gyur pa// bcom
111a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi snang ba de thob nas// chos rnams thams cad mthar phyin pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad
111a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi snang ba thob gyur nas// go cha chen po mi spong zhing // de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//
111a6(dkon brtsegs): theg chen 'di sa 'tshal nas ni// brtson 'grus ldog par mi 'gyur zhing // de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam pa dag ni rab brtan cing // ji ltar
111a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab stobs dag gis// shin tu dul po cheb 'gyur lags// ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi// tshul la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po bsam mi khyab// bcom ldan 'das
111b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkas pa shang gsol// ji ltar sbyar ba lto nar ni// byang chub snying por bzod gyur nas// su yang bskor bar mi 'gyur ba// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor 'gyur lags// ji ltar ba
111b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis par// sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bzhin// sems can thams cad kun la ni// chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags// chos rnams yang dag bstan pas ni// 'khor ba las ni rlo
111b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags// ji ltar bgyis na sems can rnams// gtan du bde ba thob 'gyur lags// sems can rnams la sman slad du// 'jig rten 'dren la bdag zhun// thams cad mkhyen cing bags
111b4(dkon brtsegs): pa pos// thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol// chos ni gang dang gang dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' smin bgyid pa// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// ting 'dzin phyag rgya mdzad
111b5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// sangs rgyas chos la rab mos shing // byang chub che ba gang lta ba/ chos kyi sgra 'di thos gyur na// lus kun khyab par dga' bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
111b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/ blo zos mtha' yas khyod sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim po byas pa dang / dge bu'i rtse ba rnams
111b7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed cing yon tan gzhal du med pa bsags pas na/ chos zab mo 'di la rab tu gdung bas mos par gyur pa dang / bsam pa rgya chen pos sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po
112a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so// khyod legs par nyen la shin tu yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems
112a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar gyur pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du
112a3(dkon brtsegs): thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang
112a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/ go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//
112a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems
112a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can
112a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams shes rab rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams
112b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir po che chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dring po che chen po bgo bar bya'o//
112b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen po bya ba'i phyir gro cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// yon tan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir
112b3(dkon brtsegs): go tshwa chen po bzo bar bya'o// bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bor bya'o// sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bsgrub
112b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par rab tu bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir po cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen
112b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi pho nya dang / bdud kyi las la gnas pa dang / lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dang / lam la yang dag par zhugs pa'i bu
112b6(dkon brtsegs): stegs can gyi bstan pa las rab tu byung ba thams cad dang / 'jig rten rgyung 'phen dang / mu stegs can dang 'thun pa ji snyed pa dag dang 'thab pa'i phyir ko cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// byang chub sems
112b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar go cha chen po bgo zhing / go cha mi spong bar brtson 'grus chen po ri skyed nas sems can gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/ bzod pa la gnas nas 'jigs
113a1(dkon brtsegs): b.ras smras te/ mi zlas kyi spang su migs sa 'arlags par byas nas kon dpag tu rang bdug bag par bya'o// de'adi ltas/ ma na bams pa po du
113a2(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa'i ko tsa dang / lta ba'i thibs po thams cad gtsang pa'i kon dang / bdud kyi dpung rnams rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i kon dang / shes rang yang dag par len pa'i ko dang tshogs
113a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa bsngags pa'i go cha dang / khur lci rnams sgrol ba'i kau Na dang mngon par yid ches bu 'phel bar byed pa'i kon dang tshul khrims la gnas pa'i kaun dang /
113a4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi kun gzhi yongs su sbyong ba'i blo cha dang / thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i stongs kyi gter gyi ko cha dang / thabs mkhas pa'i gter gyi ko cha dang / mngon par
113a5(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i ko Na dang / ldog pa dang 'gyes pa med pa'i shes rab kyi sa cha gang yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sa
113a6(dkon brtsegs): ca chen po de lta du bgos nas/ 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de'i ngar du shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo ba med pa mi spong dar/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
113a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka yul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams// bsdu phyir go cha mas
113b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// sems can rnams ni tshad med phyir// go cha dgos pa tshad med do// sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed/ sems can la ni ngan
113b2(dkon brtsegs): gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha'ang
113b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bgo bar bya// bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir// dar zhing bde la gnas par byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// brtson 'grus rnams
113b4(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa'i phyir// phyir mi ldog par 'grub par byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir// spyod yul
113b5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang de bzhin no// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// shes rab rnam par dag pa'i phyir// zag med bla na med pa yin// sems can rnams la pha ni gdags
113b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// sems can dag ni thams cad la// bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas// don de legs par shes pa'i phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// byang chub sems
113b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can rnams// phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos pas// bsdu ba rnam dag bzhi po yis// srid pa kun tu 'jug par byed// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nad// gnyen po dag ni bsten pa'i phyir/
114a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can la ni sman gtong bas// nad rnams rab tu sel bar byed// des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams// go cha legs par bgos nas ni// yon tan rnams kyi tshogs
114a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la// mkhas pa dpag med thob pa yin// sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// nyam thag shin tu mi bde bas// bdag gis yongs su bskyab snyam nas// go cha dpag med mgro bar bya//
114a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med rnams// bdag gis rnam par dgrol snyam pas// sred lha'i dra bas blags pa dag/ thams cad yongs su bcad par bya// gang gis nyon mongs dra ba 'di// thams
114a4(dkon brtsegs): cad gcod par gang nus pa// brtan pa'i brtson 'grus stobs ngag gis// dpa' bo go cha bgo ba yin// sems can dag ni thams cad kun// bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing // mya ngan 'das la
114a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhol ba dang // bla med bde la dpyod par bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs// go cha 'di ni bgo byed pa// bdud rnams thams cad dag dang ni// rtag tu 'thab kyang ngal mi 'gyur/
114a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig lta la rab banas nas// thibs po dag tu gang zhugs dang // 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dag la// ko cha bgos na phan gdags bya// gzhan yang 'khor ni tshad med pa// lam gol dag tu zhugs
114a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// de dag la ni phan gdags phyir// gau cha dpag med bgo bar bya// de ltar po cha dgos nas ni// go cha chen po mo spong bar// rtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed na// gong gos rab brnags
114b1(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'phags// sems can khams la rab zhugs te// bzod pa la ni gnas gyur nas// brtan pa'i bzod pa sgrub byed pa// go dgos gong na med pa yin// 'jigs pa dag ni rab spangs shing /
114b2(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa dag ni mang par yang // go cha dpag med bkris nas ni// thams cad rab brtson 'grus par bya// gang zhig go cha rang gnas pa// rtag tu yang dag rdogs 'gyur zhing // rab dben g.yo ba med pas na/
114b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de lha'i go cha rab bgos nas// blo dang ldan pas gzhan yang ni// sems can skyob pa'i go bgos te// bdud kyi go cha gzhom par bya// yon tan dpag med do/
114b4(dkon brtsegs): dag/ thams cad rab tu bgo bar bya// dbang po shes mchog gang zag gis// dgos na dade ba thod par 'gyur// khur lci rab tu spang ba'i phyir// bla med go cha bgos nas su// sems can
114b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs bzlas nas// sdug bsngal khur las thar par bya// rnam dag dad pa 'phel byed cing // dbang po drug ni rab sdom pa// tshul khrims gang dag ldan pa ni// go bgos
114b6(dkon brtsegs): gong na med pa yin// dpa' bo ye shes sgrub pa la// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas pas// spyod lam tshul khrims ldan pas na// go bgos g.yo ba med pa yin// sngon gyi rgyar ba
114b7(dkon brtsegs): mang po las// rnam ngag las ni bsgrubs pas na// de'i phyir go cha rab bgos nas// rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa yin// sems can la ni sred pa'i blos// 'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs pa/
115a1(dkon brtsegs): thabs ni rab tu rtogs pas na// go bgos legs par gnas pa yin// thabs mkhas ye shes gang yin pa// byang chub sems dpa' rab rtogs pas// de ltar ro/
115a2(dkon brtsegs): cha gos nas ni// 'acing ba mtha' dag gcod par byed// mngon zhen thams cad rab spong zhing // yid ches rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa// gro dgos blo dang ldan pa ni// bu med byang chub bzod par
115a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' nges par ni// bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs gang // brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas pas// brtan zhing phyir ldog mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
115a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskal pa tshad med pa nas khur chen po khyer zhing / go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu de ni bdud ngam bdud kyi
115a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ram/ bdud kyi po nya'am/ log par lta ba'i thibs po dgon dung ma rungs par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med cing bstun
115a6(dkon brtsegs): du med pa dang / ltos pa med cing mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan ma spangs pas mtshan ma dang bral ba dang / ming dang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro// blo zos mthan yas gal te la la zhig mda'i tshad
115a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na'ang phog par mi 'gyur la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad bdud kyi rgyal por gyur la/ re re la'ang bdud kyi dmag rnam pa sna tshogs
115b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas par gyur pa de dag dus gcig tu mda' rnon po tshang ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na'ang / nams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos pa la rnam
115b2(dkon brtsegs): par gzhig pa 'am/ tha na spu nags gcig tsam yang nyams par byed mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sems kyis kyang tha dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi nus na
115b3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis gnod pa bya ba ni lta smos kyang ci dgos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems rtse gcig tu de dag 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdud mang po pham par byed cing
115b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar yang byed la go cha de lta bu la gnas shing g.yo ba med pas/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 'jig par byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mtshan ma med
115b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams kyis blta bar bya ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing shes par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
