203a2(dkon brtsegs): gling bzhi las gling gsum gyis tshad mnyam pa ste/ dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do// gling re re na'ang grong khyer nyi bri nyi bri yod de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod/
203a3(dkon brtsegs): do// 'dzam bu gling gi tshad ni dpag tshad bye ba yod do/ de na grong khyer brgyad khri yod de grong khyer de re re'i tshad kyang dpags nyi shu nyi shu yod do// de dag kyang gzhal med khang brtsegs
203a4(dkon brtsegs): mA dang / ra bas 'khor bar bskor ba/ gos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / ro sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dang // rin po che'i
203a5(dkon brtsegs): shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa yul bde zhing mis rab tu gang bar gyur to// de na grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgyas 'khor ba yod de/ de'ang skyed mos tshal nyi khris
203a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bar bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal de kun tu'ang 'bab chu dag rab tu 'bab cing / me tog dang 'bras bu dag rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dam pa'i ngang ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa/
203a7(dkon brtsegs): bya dang ri dgas rnams sgra ston pa 'byin pas rab tu gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de skyed mos tshal de gcig tu bzhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos
203b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan par gyur to// blo gros mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'ong las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po'i sku tshwa'i tshad ni bskal pa chung ngu bcu thub par gyur to// yongs su sungan
203b2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa chung ngu gcig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa nges 'khor 'dus pa la lan bzhir chos bstan du/
203b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa re re la'ang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga lnga yod do// dgra bcom pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do//
203b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i sde zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i stobs shes bya ste/ byang chub sems
203b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de gnyis kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig gis
203b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
203b7(dkon brtsegs): nges tshig gi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos kyis bzod pa thob par gyur
204a1(dkon brtsegs): to/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur to//
204a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nams mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang /
204a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer chen po bkye ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos bstan cing yongs su smin par byas pas/ srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad
204a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du khyed bskal pa brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par
204a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa de re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dus bar mar gsungs pa'i
204a6(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang / dus tha mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par yongs su bzung nas/ sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro//
204a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa re re la'ang sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing / rnam par g.yeng ba med pas skye ba thams cad du'ang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin las ldog par mi
204b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pas sems can mang po rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlos par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu
204b2(dkon brtsegs): mang ba zhes bya ba la mchong ba dang rim blo byas pas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa tshad meng pa rnams la rnam par rtsen par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan du
204b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ gcig gi ming ni mya ngan med pa zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/
204b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams btul te/ theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas/ de'i tshe de bzhin
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa des kyang 'di skad du/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
204b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rab tu gnas pa 'di blan med pa yang dag pa
204b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag pa
205a1(dkon brtsegs): sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa bsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no zhes lung bstan to//
205a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa thob pas/ rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya pa gyur to//
205a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'thob par 'dod par rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po
205a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas/ lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med pa dang / bag yod pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa
205a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
205a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa 'thob par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par bgyi ba'i slad du
205a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
205b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams thob par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la thangs mkhas pa thob nas/ sbyar du byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur bas/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu
205b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing nan tan gyis chos yang dag par mngon par
205b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'da' ba
205b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// de bzhin/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du don gyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na/ yon tan
205b6(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par gyur na/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
205b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thabs mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// don gyi blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni
206a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs las mngon par grub pas rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so//
206a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'dis legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad mngon par 'phags nas/
206a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / bla na med pa'i gnas pas mchog tu gsal bar gnas so// gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar
206a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu
206a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar gnas so// don gyi blo gros khyod kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na/ 'di la su'ang mi dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba 'am/ brtson 'grus mi bskyed pa 'am/ bag yod pa dang bcas
206a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med par blta bar bya ste/ sems can bsod nams chung zhing / dman pa la mos pa ni ma gtogs so// sems can gang shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dag gis
206a7(dkon brtsegs): chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par sgrub par byed la/ chos rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar
206b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ ngas ji skad du gang gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing rim gro byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
206b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa lta bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems
206b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan
206b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis sgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed cing / the tshom thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / mdud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang / ngag chags rnams spong
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnams gcod pa dang / sred pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sring pa'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par rgal ba dang / mun nag rnams gtan du bsal ba dang
206b6(dkon brtsegs): skrag cing 'jig pa rnams rab tu spyod pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyis sems rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
206b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas/ 'od zer nges 'jig rten gyi khams grangs meng pa gsal bar mdzad cing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to//
207a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer bkye nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing / 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par byed pas/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das shing / snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ de dang ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci'ang med
207a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
207a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob par 'gyur bar
207a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o// gzhan yang phyag sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po
207a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g.yo bar mdzad pas/ sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang // gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
207b1(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams lha'i me tog dam pa dang / lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon par gtor nas// dus gcig tu lha'i rol
207b2(dkon brtsegs): mo rnams byas so// lha ched med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas/ nam mkha' kun tu gang bar gyur to// skad 'thun par 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas rnams
207b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyug bya ba'i 'os su gyur par rig par bya
207b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras so// cha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// yang byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mthar yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo zos mtha' yas mo 'ongs pa'i dus na/
207b5(dkon brtsegs): gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni go cha'i bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang dag thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / tshogs chen
207b6(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su sdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos par 'gyur ro// chos 'di la gang gis nan tan du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
207b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la sogs pa la yongs su gtang ngo //
208a1(dkon brtsegs): ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas// bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa
208a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu spangs te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag
208a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang /
208a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdagra ma smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams
208a5(dkon brtsegs): mthu ci mchis pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongs su bzung nas skud ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems
208a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus kyi gos mchog dam pa phud de/ mchod pa byas nas 'di
208a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo ste/ sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa 'thob
208b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dung / sbyang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su
208b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur bar sngon lam 'dabs lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu
208b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad kun la ni// phan pa chen po bya ba'i phyir/ nga yis byang chub chos bzung nas// chos rgyal seng ge'i sgra sgrogs she
208b4(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// gang zhig chos 'di yongs tshol ba// rgya chen chos 'di thos gyur na/ thams cad bdi ba zab par 'gyur// dus ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// gang gis theg pa 'di
208b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing // mdo sde chos 'di thos gyur na// ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba thob/ blo dang ldan pa gang zhig gis// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te// chos mchog 'din thos gyur na/
208b6(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sems ni rab padir 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa// nga yis mngon sum bshad mthong dang / chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni rab tu dag ba gang bskyed pa/
208b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'o// phung po dag ni rab skyed cing // 'khor ba mtha' med sgrol bar 'gyur/ ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ chos rjes
209a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gsungs pa yi// chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs tha ma'i dus kyi tshe// nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa/
209a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// tha ma'i dus kyi chos 'dzin 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na// byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyis bzod pa
209a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa snyed ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
209a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
209a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste// 'dus pa bdun
209a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rdzogs so// lo tsa ba mgos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur ba'o// rgyu bar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma d+hA d+ha pra dr-i ti/
209a7(dkon brtsegs): a sam b+he da ni de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po
209b1(dkon brtsegs): dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
209b2(dkon brtsegs): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa khri nyis
209b3(dkon brtsegs): stong dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sum khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'ja
209b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan
209b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos bstan par bskul ba mdzad de/ bskul nas kyang bshang la ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar 'gyur ba dang /
209b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can yi chad par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur ba
209b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad
210a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par bsgrub pa'i byang chub 'di'ang yun ring
210a2(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ chos bstan pa de gang dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag thag pa gang la mos
210a3(dkon brtsegs): pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis
210a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos mnyan pa thos par 'dod kyis 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs
210a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos
210a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ bcom ldan
210a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni brjod pa 'am/ mnyan par cung zad kyang rngo mi thogs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las brtsams te bstan par
210b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ gang zag mngon pa'i ngargyal can dag ni skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/
210b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni skrag par mi 'gyur lags so//
210b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dus// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/ chos kyi
210b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba ci las 'byung
210b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bskrad cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa
210b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ngo // bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la gnas pa de dag la ni/ dge ba'i dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/
210b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing / de dag la rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid
211a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis ji tsam du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba yongs su bzung ba de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa
211a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang
211a3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni de la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci'ang med do// 'jam dpal
211a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par bgang rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
211a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
211a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbying ni khyod las phyed par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur la dgrol ba zhig yin snyam mam/
211a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni sngon bcings par gyur pa'ang ma yin la/ dgrol ba'ang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na dge slong de dag gi
211b1(dkon brtsegs): sems ci zhig las rnam par grol ka smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/ de dag gi sems ni len pa med par zag nyams las sems rnam par gro
211b2(dkon brtsegs): lo/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
211b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par grol lo/ smras pa
211b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems 'das pa rnam par grol lam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par grol btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni zad pa'i mtshan nyid
211b5(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ sems da ltar byung ba ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/
211b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems 'das pa'adi rnam par grol ba ma yin la/ ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
211b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi/ don dam par ni 'di la gang
212a1(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa 'am/ grol ba'i sems dmigs su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin kun rdzob dang don dam pa yod par/
212a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dmigs su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob/
212a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam pa krol bar ston/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam yang sems rnam par grol ba ci'ang med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te sems
212a4(dkon brtsegs): shig nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka'i bar na dmigs su yod na ni sems rnam par grol bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni nang ngam/ phyi rol lam// gnyis
212a5(dkon brtsegs): ka med par dmigs su med pas/ de la bcings pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba ci'ang med do// de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
212a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / stan las langs te dong nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ gal te 'di la su'ang rnam par grol ba med cing / su'ang rnam par mi 'grol na 'o bu cag gi rab tu/
212a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ gal te nges par 'byung ba ci'ang med na lam sgom pa la ci yod ces de ltar dge slong de dag smod cing yi chad nas 'khor de nas
212b1(dkon brtsegs): dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag gdul ba'i dbang du rig nas/ lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong ba'i lam de'i mdun du sprul pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to//
212b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ga las 'ongs// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/
212b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos/ yid ma ches nas kho bo 'khor nga na/
212b4(dkon brtsegs): dong ngo // de nas dge slong nyis brgya po de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes/ ma mos
212b5(dkon brtsegs): yid ma ches nas kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong nges/ dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'jam dpal
212b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos na khyed cag 'khor de nas dong // de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'di la su la'ang thob pa/
212b7(dkon brtsegs): med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med par ston pas/ kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di la su la'ang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/
213a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba med na/ 'o bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge sbyong gi dngos po la don ci yod// 'o 'u cag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la don
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ci yod/ gal te 'di la nges par 'byung ba ci'ang med na/ lam bsgom pa la don ci yod snyam du bsam nas/ kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge sbyong doso/ dge slong de dag la
213a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma mos nas dong bar zad dam/ 'on te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni ma mos nas dong bar
213a4(dkon brtsegs): zad kyi/ kho bo cag gis spangs pa'ang med la// mi snyan par brjod pa'ang med do// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas// 'di skad ces kyang smras
213a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa med pa ni gre sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas/ mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/ brtsad par mi bya'i/ re zhig je 'gro bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sams
213a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di sngon po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dmar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ btsod ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig gam// yang dag pa
213a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag zhes bya ba zhig gam// mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can zhes bya ba zhig gam// gzugs can ma yin
213b1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba zhig gam zhes rtogs shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa// thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa
213b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dge la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag cigazugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa
213b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnas so zhes bya ba 'am/ phyi rol na gnas so zhes bya ba 'am/ gnyis ka'i bar na gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs su
213b4(dkon brtsegs): yod snyam mam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems de gzugs can ma yin/ bstan du med/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ rnam par rig
213b5(dkon brtsegs): byed ma yin pa/ nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka na med par yang dmigs su med na/ ci de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa yod snyam mam/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yin no/
213b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing yongs su grub pa ma yin pa de la ci rnam par grol ba yod snyam mam/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag
213b7(dkon brtsegs): las bsams nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang meng la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes bstan to//
214a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gis bslang ba rnams la ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga mir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'byung ngo // ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yor 'dzin pa
214a2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas te/ rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing / gnas pa de dag ni dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems 'byung ste/ dmigs pa zang na zad par 'gyur la/ byung nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa med do//
214a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dmigs pa gang gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam sgom par byed pa'i sems de ni// rang bzhin gyis med pa dang / yang dag pa ma
214a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / 'byung ba ma yin pa'o// med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de la ni skye ba'ang med/ 'jig pa'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med do// gang la skye ba med
214a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'jig pa meng pa dang / gnas pa med pa de la ni bcings pa'ang med/ rnam par grol ba'ang med do// de la ni thob parang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las
214a6(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang med de/ 'di la ni su
214a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ang thob pa med / mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba mang ngo zhes sa so// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong ngas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa
214b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams las sems rnam par rtsol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der rang ste phyin pa dang / rang rang gi bla gos 'jas dpal gnon du gyur ba la man
214b2(dkon brtsegs): par bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ni kho bo cag yongs su bskyabs so// 'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam pa'i chos spong bar ma khrugs pas// dbyin nang
214b3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dul ba rab mo la 'jug pa las phyi rol tu gyur pa ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis// dge slong dag la 'di skang ces smras so// ra dang ldan pa dag gis
214b4(dkon brtsegs): cizhig thob cing zhig mngon par rtogs na/ rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la mngon par bkab// rangag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag gis ni ci seng thob pa med
214b5(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas/ de phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab zo// btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe kho bo cag la thob pa'i 'du
214b6(dkon brtsegs): shes yod par gyur pa de'i tshe ni kho bo cag stan las langs te 'khor de nas dong ngo // gang gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe sngar lhags so// rab 'byor gyis rnas pa
214b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dag khring ci las bsams te skad smra/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thob pa zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba yin no// de ni rlom sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang
215a1(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med pa la ni/ thob pa rang cing mngon par rtogs pa med do// btsun parab 'byor gang la thob pa mang cing mngon par rtogs par dra ba ni ma
215a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin no// tshe dang ldan parab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag byed cag sus btul de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang thob pa du dang /
215a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs pa med pa dang / gang skye ba med pa deng / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa dang / gang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med pa des
215a4(dkon brtsegs): btul to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam de dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// 'jam
215a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag sus btul/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo grang la phung po rnams med pa dang /
215a6(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / gang so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang / slob pa ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
215a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / gang lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ngag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs pa dang ldan pa ma yin
215b1(dkon brtsegs): su su sa
215b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ban pa chen zamacis thams zed sprum pa'i ba cad byin nas rdzu gA/ 'a mang bal dang basbyin no// 'ang me pa la gyis smrasmras/ ba pa na da
215b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sprul pas btul ba yin te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba skye 'dra bar can zlos thams cad kyi 'dul ba 'ang dang 'dra'o// btsun du phran dga'i bo gang dab dri ltar btul bar dag ni// nga
215b4(dkon brtsegs): bar dul ba yin no// gang dag chos 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'a
215b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'dri skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras phye/ btsun pa kun dga' po
215b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la dge slong tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
216a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes
216a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// bdag gis thob bo// bdag gis mngon sum du byas so snyam du sems shing rlom sems su byed pa dang / yongs su rtog par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o//
216a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta bas skrag cing bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid gang gis 'jig tshogs la
216a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba stong pa'i stong pa nyid nges bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o//
216a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa/
216a6(dkon brtsegs): nilhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang
216a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin la/ lam yang gzhan ma yin te/ lam nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pas 'jigs shing ma rig
216b1(dkon brtsegs): ba las rnam par grol bar ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rtsal can du shes par bya'o// da ci'i phyir zhen/ gang la gnyis su 'du shes 'jug pa dang / rnam par rtsol ba ma yin par phyir ro//
216b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / byin ci 'od
216b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin skrag cing 'du shes bzhi'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / sgrib pa lngas skrag cing dbang po lnga'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / skye mched drug gis skrag cing mngon par shes pa drug gi ro myang bar byed pa dang /
216b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun gyis skrag cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ro myang bar byed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyis skrag cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ro myang bar byed pa
216b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dus byas kyi dngos po dgus skrag cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis skrag cing mi slob pa'i chos bcu'i ro myang
216b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyis skrag cing 'dus ma byas kyi khams ngag gi ro myong bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo nga
216b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji tsam du g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa dang / sems mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
217a1(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / rten pa dang / lhag par zhon pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin pa'i phyir te
217a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge slong ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dus byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa
217a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa dang / stong pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du mi 'jug pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
217a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
217a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing / mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ma rig
217a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dmigs pa shes bya ba 'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam
217a7(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par mi byed/ gnyis su 'byed par mi byed/ gcig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / chos
217b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pas mnyam par bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam pa
217b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ mngon par zhen
217b3(dkon brtsegs): par yang mi byed/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya bas rlom sems su byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas med do// btsun pa kun dga' bo de ltar na
217b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing / gnyen po med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / rang gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / tshor ba dang tshor
217b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa thams cad dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'ching ba med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang // zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba
217b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / du yir 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la'ang spang ba 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag pa
217b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar zhugs pa'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// des ni nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas
218a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la'ang dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas
218a2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar
218a3(dkon brtsegs): sgro 'dogs par mi byed do// de ni sgro 'dogs pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des
218a4(dkon brtsegs): ni chos thams cad sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gang de ltar mos pa'i dge slong ni yang
218a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de las dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ ji ltar nam mkha' lag mthil la mi
218a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa ltar dge sbyong gi chos kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/
218a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag pa'i shes
218b1(dkon brtsegs): ba brda sprod par byed pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems// 'jig rten
218b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas par yang mi mthong / phyi rol na'
218b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa'i bar na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol gyi yul la rgyu zhing gnas par yang mi mthong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i
218b4(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la rjod par byed la/ sems de'ang yang dag pa'i
218b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ngo bo nyid du rtogs par gyur to/ dris na sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo tha~Md kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs
218b6(dkon brtsegs): la/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda sprod par byed pa de ni
218b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda spong bar byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin pa na gang gtong bar byed pa dang /
219a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongs su sngo bar byed pa de dag shin tu gtong bas/ gtong bar byed cing rten
219a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed/ re bar mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/ dris na shin tu gtong ba nyid dang / shin tu dmigs pa
219a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag nyid gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs shing / gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos
219a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs te/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda
219a5(dkon brtsegs): sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa sbyin pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas lus nye bar zhi
219a6(dkon brtsegs): bas tshul khrims nyid bar zhi bar rtogs te/ ngag nye bar zhi ba dang sems nye bar zhi bas tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing lus dang / ngag dang / sems nye bar zhi bas byang chub nye bar zhi bar
219a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs la// byang chub nye bar zhi bas sems can nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ sems can nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas yang dag pa'i mtha'
219b1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba zhes bya bar rtogs la/ de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar gyur pas/ dris na chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba nyid du brda sprod par byed du/
219b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa tshul khrims kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas shin tu
219b3(dkon brtsegs): zab pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma brla'i chos nyid du rig nas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa'ang bzod cing / gang gis byi nang gi sems
219b4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas mi stong bar bzed pa dang / gang gis khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa phyi rol tu mi gtong zhing sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa bzod pa dang / sems can de dag gi ngo
219b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
219b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin par rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo ba nyid du gtogs te/ dris na shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu la
219b7(dkon brtsegs): ma brla'i chos nyid du rtogs pas rgyur ba med pa nyid kyis bzod pa brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bzod pas yongs su dag pa yin
220a1(dkon brtsegs): no// lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid la byed pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i chos rtogs shing sgro 'dogs pa med la/ btang stongs dang
220a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas brtsam pa gang rtsom pa de dben pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / de nang dben pas phyi rol tu rgyu ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
220a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgyu zhing / brtson 'grus dben pas sems can dben par rtogs pa dang / sems can dben pas byang chub dben par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dben pas chos thams cad dben par
220a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad dben pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dben par rtogs pas/ dris na brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin dben pa ji lta ba bzhin du dben par brda sprod par byed
220a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe// byang chub sems
220a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas chos thams cad mnyam zhing bye brag med par 'gyur bar bsam gtan byed de/ bsam gtan de la sems gnas par 'jug cing gnas de la'ang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi
220a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang // des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang //
220b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pas/ de ltar
220b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya bar rig la/ dris na rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda sprod par byed de/ lce'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa
220b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bsam gtan gyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyang ba'i
220b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi chos thams cad mthong ste/ ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing / gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe ci'ang ma
220b5(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'ang ma yin pa'i shes pa thob pas mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu/ rnam par mi rgyu'o// des rgyu ba dang / rab tu rgyu ba dang / rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par rgyun bcad
220b6(dkon brtsegs): pas mi 'khor ro// rnam par mi khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / smon pa'i rgyun bcad
220b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ de 'dod pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang /
221a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du skye ba rnams su rgyu bar byed de/ de ni rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis
221a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu bar byed cing chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed de/ de ni de'i shes rab yin pas degs sa kyi sa na ni byang chub rab tu shes pa dang / byang chub
221a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing // chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin du rab tu shes
221a4(dkon brtsegs): te dris na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa shes rab kyi mig gis yongs su dag pa
221a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa na/ de sngon gyi mtha'i lus ni ma skyes
221a6(dkon brtsegs): bar rab tu shes so// phyi ma'i mtha' lus ni 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i lus la ni rtsa dang / shing dang / rlig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid lta
221a7(dkon brtsegs): bur so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par rig nas/ lus kyi rnam par rig pa dang ldan pa'i yod la byed pa kun
221b1(dkon brtsegs): nas slong bar mi byed do// yid la byed pa kun nas sbyong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni lhag par byed pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ de lhag par byed pa dang bral zhing rnam par shes pa mi
221b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos gang la'ang sgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'dzag par mi byed do// de chos thams cad dngos po med
221b3(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ sems gang gis de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i sems de'ang sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang brag cha'i chos nyid
221b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bur rab tu shes so// de ltar rab tu shes pas bde ba'i tshor ba la'ang rjes su chags pa med la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la'ang khong khro bo med cing / sdug bsngal yang ma yin
221b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la'ang rmongs pa med pas// ma rig pa bag la nyal bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi che tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa de ni// de'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i
221b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// de de ltar tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu ba dag gi sems mi rgyu bas de chos thams cad la sems
221b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems kyang spong bar mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ yongs su gtong bar mi byed de/ de ni de'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar
222a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa yin no// de chos shes pa mngon sum du gyur pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na// dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas chos nyid la 'jug
222a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams la 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa dang / blta ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni de'i chos la chos
222a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// des chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung zhing dngos po med pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur rtogs pas/ dris na dran pa med pa dang
222a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su dag pa yin/
222a5(dkon brtsegs): no// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpe'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la kun shes par byed/ rnam par rig par byed// gnas par
222a6(dkon brtsegs): byed// mi spong bar byed/ rnam par mi g.yeng bar byed/ mi brjed par byed pa dang / dang por dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis thog mar 'gro ba dang / ser sna'i sems la mi 'jug pa dang / bdog pa
222a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rtsod pa
222b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi ma mi 'byon pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / theg pa chen po'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mi dge pa'i chos
222b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams yid la mi byed cing mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas par sgom pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad
222b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'phro bar mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul rnams la mi rgyu ba dang // 'phags pa'i
222b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ma smad pa dang / bag yod pa lhur len cing / sangs rgyas
222b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang / bstang mi dgos par dgos pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul
222b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims la skyon med pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / log par zhugs pa rnams dang ma 'brel ba dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas
222b7(dkon brtsegs): kha gsag med pa dang / rang gi rnyed pas chog shes pas tshol ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pas rnam par g.yo ba med pa/
223a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams gsum la 'dun pa dang bral bas 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang / 'jig
223a2(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i spyod pa spangs pas don nyung ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcad pas spros pa med pa dang / 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug dang bral bas 'gro ba med pa dang /
223a3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po kun tu srung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang /
223a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rogs mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la dam bcas pa ma nyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad don du
223a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pha rol dag gi ngor byed pa med pa dang / gzhan kun tu srung ba'i phyir bdag rjes su srung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang /
223a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims legs par bsdams pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / slob dpon gyi dpe ma khyud med pas chos kyi bgo ba shar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams
223a7(dkon brtsegs): rjes su srung ba dang / dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pas spyod pa tha dad pa med pa dang / rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pas rlom
223b1(dkon brtsegs): sems med pa dang // skye ba med par yang dag par so sor rtog la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba'ang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas
223b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid du'ang so sor rtog la// lta ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par yang byed la/ mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems
223b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la'ang lta ba dang / smon pa'i shes pa'ang med la// thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir smon lam thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med
223b4(dkon brtsegs): par yang so sor rtog la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms mi myong ba dang / dngos po ni dngos po med par snang bas dngos po dang dngos po med pa la rtog pa dang / lhag par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir
223b5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa med pa dang / sems can bdag med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su bting ba dang / sems can yongs su ma btang bas btang ba dang gam btang ba dang //
223b6(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang / shes rab bsgoms pas ma zhi zhing zhi la nye bor zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / bdud kyi lam las yang dag par
223b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pas lam ma yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dres pas spyod pa pa yi 'i spyod pang/ chos thams cad la rtog pas gdegs pa med cing gzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan la
224a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag par sems su mi byed pas bdag mi sgrog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shes pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang
224a2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags par bzod pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// lha'i bu mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i
224a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi//
224a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin
224a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ skye bar mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yongs su gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chags pa ni byang chub sems
224a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe 'gras pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// khams gsum du mtsham
224a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bar mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// rang gi
224b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa ni sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// bdag gi phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems
224b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yal bar 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/
224b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma
224b4(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'gog pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
224b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yongs su 'dris par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// zag pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa 'bri
224b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes pa yin no// rnam par thar pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa gsum la yongs su 'dris par byed
224b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// phung po lnga'i khur 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi khur 'dor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
225a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// dbang po drug 'gog par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni byang chub
225a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// skye ba zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// nyan thos dang rang
225a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpe'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying por rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bus sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa
225a4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa'i le'u bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
225a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems
225a6(dkon brtsegs): dpar rnams kyi shes pa brda sprod pa de legs par smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda sprod pa bstan pa 'di thos na mos par 'gyur zhing / mi skrag mi dang la dngang
225a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur
225b1(dkon brtsegs): ro// / bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// / de nas lnga'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
225b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci khyod shes pa brda sprod par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bos chos 'ga' zhig thob bam/ spangs par gyur na ni khe bos shes pa brda sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig/
225b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kho bos ni chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing spangs pa med pas ni/ kho bos ci zhig shes pa brda sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
225b4(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag las thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir/
225b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par mi mdzad do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar chos ston par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
225b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang /
225b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir chos ston par ni mi mdzad de//
226a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin
226a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa dang / sring po'i sred pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu/
226a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ni 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i don du
226a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi
226a6(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba med pa de la ni 'a
226a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta na sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos pa
226b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi go cha ni bgos pa med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/
226b2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa gang gis rab tu bye ba yin snyam mam// smras pa/ 'jam dpal phan+d+ha pa ni mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la man
226b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin pas/ nga na 'dus ma byas pa brnyes pa dang
226b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas shing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod kyis dam bcas pa de nyid kyis na mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni phan pa dang gnod par darig
226b5(dkon brtsegs): su mang ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di ni las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos na skrag par 'gyur zhing skrag nas kyang phyir ldog par
226b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa
226b7(dkon brtsegs): yon no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te gang snga/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
227a1(dkon brtsegs): sas skragatsang / ser sna dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dag las phyir ldog pa de//
227a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar gnas na yang dag par gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu mnyam par gnas shing mi mnyam par gnas pa
227a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin na/ de'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i
227a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa de lta bu ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no// smras pa/
227a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid nas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa
227a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la mos pa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas sbyad ba yin
227a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/ de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
227b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spyad pa srung ba yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spyang ba la spyod kyang / 'dod rags
227b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// zhe sdang gi spyod pa la spyod kyang // zhe sdang gi
227b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gti mug gi spung pa la spyod kyang / gti mug gi spyod pa dang ldan cig mi gnas pa dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod
227b4(dkon brtsegs): po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ cha mnyam pa'i spyad pa la spyod kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dong ldan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// lha'i
227b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yongs su smon par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid
227b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed na/ de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin// 'jam
227b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed 'chags par mi byed la/ chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med cing / chags pa med par
228a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa dang 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
228a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams su'ang ldog la/ bsams gtan rnams la 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
228a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe byang chub sems dpas ma rtogs pa rtogs shing mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi khams dang / chos
228a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams dang / bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas/ chos thams cad la'ang phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
228a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gzhan gyi drang mi gzhog cing / nem mur med la the tsom med cing som nyi dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas dag cing dri ma med la nyon mongs pa med cing / shes rab kyi snang ba gsal bar gyur pa
228a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba
228a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis thogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing ka sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i
228b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar phyir/ skye ba thams cad du skye ba ston cing len pa med par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par byed ba dang / skye ba dang ma rangs thams cad du lan par
228b2(dkon brtsegs): bral bas 'chi ba dang skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mnyem pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing yang dag par 'bar ba dang / d+hU dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs pa dang /
228b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dang lus mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang ngag mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang yul mnyam
228b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba shes pa
228b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dus la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin no//
228b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing /
228b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du dpyas med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe
229a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi che byang chub sems dpar byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pam/
229a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / yi dam thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no//
229a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang brnab sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni
229a5(dkon brtsegs): dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang le lo dang lhan cig mi gnas pa
229a6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas
229a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba thos pa yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas
229b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// gang gi tshe rma phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang rma byung yang rma mi phyin pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba de lta/
229b2(dkon brtsegs): bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe nang nye bar zhi ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang phyi rol gyi yul
229b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang theg pa dman
229b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bdud kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bdud kyi las rnams bzlog pa de lta bu ni dpyas
229b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// gang gi tshe 'jig rten na snang ba thob pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bya ba
229b6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / snyoms pa thams na
229b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi
230a1(dkon brtsegs): tshed ma bcas pa brtan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang dam bcas pa rnams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe rten cing
230a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun par byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas
230a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab dang ye shes kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang thabs shes pas dge ba'i
230a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang rtsom pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par
230a5(dkon brtsegs): thar par gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang dmigs pa'i lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa de lta ba
230a6(dkon brtsegs): ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor zhing chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du mi
230a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings stong pa zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba
230b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// mang po ma khams gsum dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni khan ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir yongs su sru lag/
230b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dara' ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang ji tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang / tshig gis rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshig gis rtog par byed pa dang / tshig la mngon par zhen par/
