258b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa dang de ltar mi blta'o// skyes su dam pa ma yin pa lhas byin ni yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gzugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / da bor gyur ba yin no zhes
258b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i zong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi
258b3(dkon brtsegs): blta'o// bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab bo zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi bas+t+ra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyon
258b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs med kyi ljongs su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi nas dge gsol to zhes gsungs pa'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de skad ces bkur stsal pa dang /
258b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das labyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
258b6(dkon brtsegs): bas nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu ngas nyan
258b7(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa de ni rigs las brtags te lung bsten to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das can thos zag pa nga /
259a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par rgyun ched pa dag la rigs mchis su lags kyang // ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
259a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
259a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig la bu zhig bdeg par gyur la/ de'ang bzo'i gnas thams cad slob par byed cing de dbang po rtul la dbang po mi rno ba zhig yin pas/ de phyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngar slob par
259a4(dkon brtsegs): byed la sngar bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni phyis slob par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// de gzhi des rgyal po'i bu ma yin no zhes brjod par bya ba yin snyam mem/ gsol
259a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags te/ de ni rgyal po'i bu zhes bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de
259a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rigs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rtul po'ang bsgom pa'i lam gyis sngar nyon mongs pa rnams zad par byed cing / phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang ma/
259a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzhi des mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bya snyam ma ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis gang 'dod chen po ma gtogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes de gang mchi ba'i sems can de ni lnga dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram
259b2(dkon brtsegs): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na yang dag par rjes su ma mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' stsal po// rigs
259b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dpe gzhan yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zang nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pamatha'on
259b4(dkon brtsegs): te ma zad pas 'dug snyam mas/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das pas nas mchis lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bas nas mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
259b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzhi des mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya snyam mam// gsol phra/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so//
259b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'di la 'ang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//
259b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kun dga' bo nga ni ro rgyab na'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas phyi ma'i skye bo de/
260a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rdo rje ltar sra ba'ang sku ro rgyab spyad na// gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la
260a2(dkon brtsegs): mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ro rgyab sbyang zhe'o zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag ni rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin te
260a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas de skad ces gsungs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga ni rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa yin gyis/ nga'i bsnyen bkur ba tshol
260a4(dkon brtsegs): cig ces gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtse bas nga'i nyan thos rgas 'khogs
260a5(dkon brtsegs): te gtugs pa gang dag gi lus la bsnyen bkur ba dgos pa dge 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su ma go nang ngo zhes 'bengs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de ska
260a6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin na// de la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa bgres 'khogs te gdug go zhes sgra rdo bzhin
260a7(dkon brtsegs): nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das moru 'gal gyi bu khyod song la
260b1(dkon brtsegs): sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gan nas sman long zhig dang bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'ang
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dus phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtse bas/ nga'i nyan thos gang dag la sman dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes 'phongs par
260b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas dri skad gsungs pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge
260b4(dkon brtsegs): slong me'u 'gal gyi bu la zhes med pa dang // gus par bsgrim pa med pa ma yin par bstan cing dris nA'ang rings pa rings pa kho nar sbyin gsos sman bstan pa las na/ de bzhin
260b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni sku la spun mnga' ba yin no snyam pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pas sku de la 'dra nyes dmigs dag snang ste/ chos mthong ba rnams la'ang de lta bu'i bag med pa dag 'byung
260b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur na/ so so'i skye bo dag la lnga smos kyang ci dgos shes sgra ji bzhin khro nar 'dzin par byed de/ de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la/ gzhan yang nyams par byed pa
260b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshig gis rtsod par byed do zhes
261a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
261a2(dkon brtsegs): la rang dgra bo dang phyir rgol ba dgra yod na/ bdag cag la lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa dag la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na// de la mi blun po de dag de bzhin
261a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la'ang dgra bo dang phyir rgol ba dag yod do zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa la'ang dgra bo
261a4(dkon brtsegs): dang phyir rgol ba dag med na// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi chu bo chen po dang ldan pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
261a5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zug go zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' srung lapa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni las bdag gir bya ba
261a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ston par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la'ang sngon byas pa'i las dag yod na// gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos shes rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des sdig pa'i las la mi
261a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa las bdag gir bya ba nyid ston par mdzad pa yin na// de la mi blun po de dag de bzhin gshegs
261b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshul bas zug go zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed do// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa lngas byin ni yun ring po nas/
261b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'o gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur pa yin no gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal ba/
261b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gal te skyes bu dam pa lha sbyin med par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gcig kyang yod par mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir skyes bu
261b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa lngas byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la brtsod pa dang / bsgrin pa dang / phyir brgal ba dag bstan pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid dag
261b5(dkon brtsegs): yod par mngon no// rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i tshig gis skyes bu dam pa lha sbyin gyis 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'jom par bya'o snyam nas grong bar gyi dbus nas/ de bzhin gshegs
261b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la glang po che nor skyong rbad par gyur pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas btul cing rnam par btul nas dul bar mdzad de/ skye bo phal po ches de mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing
261b7(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung bar 'dzin pas dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su dong ste/ de'ang skyes bu
262a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa lha sbyin gyi skyes bu'i rtsa la yin par blta bar bya'o// de la mi blun po de dag ni kye ma lha sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang / gcugs can dang / phyir rgol
262a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshe rabs lnga brgyar skyes bu dam pa lha sbyin gyis gnod pa byas pa gang yin
262a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir byas pa yin na/ de la mi blun po kha cig kye ma lha sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed maM dang / gcugs can dang / phyir/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba yin no zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin te/ de dag ni gzhi des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
262a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa lhas byin ni tshegs shin tu bsags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/ rgyal ba du ma la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po la yang
262a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa/ byang chub chen po la gzhol ba/ byang chub chen po la 'bab pa/ byang chub chen po la bab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin pas na/ de la
262a7(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'o skye gnas dang / yi dgas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
262b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir// bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung ngo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags
262b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'ang ngas phyi ma'o skye bo rnams la bltas te de lta bu bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa
262b3(dkon brtsegs): cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyi ma'i skyo bo rnams la bltas nas du lta bu bstan te/ dge slong bsod snyoms pa kha cig bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ zong dang / slong
262b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer dang / zong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa nade dag de'i tshe de
262b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas nas/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de nyid kyang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin
262b6(dkon brtsegs): du phyir byung na/ bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa'i rnams lta smos kyang TI dgros te/ bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa 'dis bdag cag yongs su gdung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par
262b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang 'di gzigs pas/ de bzhin gsheg pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ bram ze'i grong sA la can du ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung bar
263a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// gzhan yang bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams byin gyis brlabs pas nA/ de ltar bsod snyoms mi ster to zhes zer na// de 'dra de ltar
263a2(dkon brtsegs): mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms kyi bar chad byed par mi nus pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
263a3(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kun tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med de/ sems can
263a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu ston par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pas zhal zas bcad cing chad pa de na/ bdud/
263a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang / lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang / nyan thos dag yid mi bde bar mi 'dug gam zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
263a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems par bar byed de// de dag nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems kyis sems par byed pa na/ thugs
263a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas gcig tsam la'ang mtho ba med cing dma' ba med la/ sngon ji lta ba bzhin du byis kyang de bzhin/ phyis ji lta ba bzhin du sngon yang de bzhin te/ yid mi bde ba med par yang dag
263b1(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mthong nas/ de'i tshe na lha'i bu bdun khri 'dus par gyur pa dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu btud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang
263b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad de/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs pa yin gyi/ de bzhin
263b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa yod pa ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i bu mo dregs mas shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs
263b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la skur pa btab po zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa
263b5(dkon brtsegs): med de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang bar yang spyod mod kyi// de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas las
263b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bya ba bstan te/ nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba la skur pa btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur bar 'gyur bas/ de dag 'gyod pa can du gyur pa'i tshe
263b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag skur pa btab pa na 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'o chos thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang re zhig mngon sum du skur pa brnyes par gyur na/ bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir mi
264a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed ces zer zhing ga de dag de'i tshe na skur pa de zil gyis mnan nas/ tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa / yongs su byung ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang klu nyams par mi
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro// bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma ni re zhig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyas pa yin pas/ rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa'i debs par byed pa yin te gshi 'phos
264a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de kun tu bsrung bar spyod do zhes mkhyen par gyur na ni// de kun tu bsrung bar yang mdzad de/
264a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma gtang ba'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongs
264a5(dkon brtsegs): su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/ zla ba gsum du rta chas kyi nas dag gsol to zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
264a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu ngas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag de bzhin gsheg pa spyan drang bar mi sems par shes te/ shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa der dbyar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
264a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par zla ba gsum kyi bar du gang dag gi rta chas stsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen
264b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas pa sha stag yin te/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song nas ka sdig pa'i lus byas pas// las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ rnga lnga brgya po de dag gi na
264b2(dkon brtsegs): narta cang shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/ rnga lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems
264b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/ de de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir der skyes te/ rta nang shes de nyid kyi mthus rnga lnga brgya po de dag
264b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing / de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rta
264b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur cing / de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rta lnga
264b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya po de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dbyer der gnas so// de na rta cang shos kyis chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo// rta lnga brgya po de dag gi chas
264b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul zhing / rta cang shes des rta'i skad des rta lnga brgya po de dag sdig pa 'chags su bcug cing / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
265a1(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya po dag la phyag 'tshal du'ang bcug go// rigs kyi bu de nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas rta lnga brgya po de dag shi 'phos te/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam
265a2(dkon brtsegs): par skyes nas// lhar gyur pa de dag gis yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas// bla mar byas// ri mor byas// mchod par byas pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med
265a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul zhing 'tshe bar byed pa'i rta rje gang yin pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs
265a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gang yin pa de la ni mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med de/ rigs kyi bu/
265a5(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa yongs su longs spyad par gyur na'ang shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo la sogs pa
265a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi ro de lta bu dang / ro bro ba'i mchog gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs/
265a7(dkon brtsegs): pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba brnyes pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas
265b1(dkon brtsegs): thams pad ni bsod pa son par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bra gzhan yang dge slong ban dpa' 'di byum du de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor los dUr ba'i rnal sring spangs nas/ d+ha nas kyi nas dag gso
265b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad pa lta zhes snying rje bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas/ kun dga' bo 'ang tsa ra yin shes sam zhes nas kyo 'bru gcig byin pa dang / des de dros
265b3(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ gang la 'ang skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal por khyim du skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyas pa lags na// bdag gis ro 'di lta bu ni sngan chad
265b4(dkon brtsegs): ma myong lags so zhes zer te/ de'i byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zas mi za bar dga' ba dang bde bas zhag bdun 'das par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang khyod
265b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di ltar blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la 'di las kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba yin par rig par bya ste/ sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag mgron du
265b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer la zas 'bul bar mi byed pa de dag gis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir// las kyi rgyud de lta bu dag nye bar ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin
265b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa spyan drangs la zhal zas ma gsol ba de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe
266a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par la ltos/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang
266a2(dkon brtsegs): dag yin pa de dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang / sdug pa'i mtshan ma la spyod pa yin pas/ gal te de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zos par gyur na 'dod chags
266a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na// de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag srab mor gyur nas/ de dag gis
266a4(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa nges par rtogs pa des ni legs pa kho nar nges par rtogs pa
266a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
266a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag/ bkri don gsungs pa gang yin dang // nges don gsungs pa gang yin pa// legs pa kho nar rtogs par byed// brtan pa dgongs la mkhas
266a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// nying mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa rnams// / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan gyis// gsungs pa khong du chud pa yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
266b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
266b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gam/ dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dag gam/ yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis kun tu gdungs shing tsha bar gyur kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas mya ngan las
266b3(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'dod pa mi skyed cing e ma ro kye ma bdag len pa med par zag pa nAm+ba las sems rnam par grol bar gyur cig ces don nyung ngur mi byed de/ bya ba nyung ngur mi byed cing // don nyung banying
266b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bya ba nyung ba nyid la brtson par mi byed kyi/ de ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i las bya ba dag la grogs su 'gyur zhing // sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
266b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg
266b6(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// snying rje'i bdag nyid can dag ni// ri 'dra
266b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis spyod byed la// sems can don la mi skyo zhing / byang chub las ni phyir mi ldog/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la/ phan par 'dod pas skyo mi byed// sems can
267a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// bag med pa yang mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag
267a2(dkon brtsegs): rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos gang dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags pa'i chos bcu po
267a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la lags na/ don gang gis na theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma su la lags so//
267a4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis// khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan 'ag
267a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang lhan cig tu lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de ji skad brjod par bya snyam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rgyal po'i gshegs shul zhes brjod par bgyi lags so// shul po/
267a7(dkon brtsegs): che zhes brjod par bgyi shul bde ba zhes brjod par bgyi/ shul bzang po zhes brjod par bgyi/ zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i shul zhes brjod par bgyi// 'khrug long ma mchis pa'i
267b1(dkon brtsegs): shul zhes brjod par 'gyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
267b2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gang gis gshegs pa'i theg pa de la'ang theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// theg pa mchog ces bya// theg pa rab ces bya// theg pa rab mchog ces bya// theg pa thu bo zhes bya// theg pa
267b3(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo zhes bya// theg pa bla na med pa zhes bya / theg pa gong na med pa zhes bya/ theg pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa mi mnyam pa med pa zhes bya// theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
267b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni bzang ba lags so// bde bar gshegs pa theg
267b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po ni bzang ba lags so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go ru ta ma ni bdag gi bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das shing // gzhan dag kyang
267b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yin gyis / bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u ta ma de dang chos kyi rnam grangs de la mtho ba tsam du 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo//
267b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa go gyon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi zong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba de logs su song ba dang byang chub
268a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos/ bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das/
268a2(dkon brtsegs): la mtho ba tsam pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par bya ba re bsam pas 'ong bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par byas te/ ji lta
268a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya bas/ bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas// lam po che
268a4(dkon brtsegs): dang // lam srang gi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu skra sgrogs par byed// dbyangs rjod par byed cing 'di skad ces rgyal po'i khab kyi mi khyed cag shes par gyis shig/ de bzhin
268a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni bya rgod kyi phung po'o ri la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang // dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams
268a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams la tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa
268a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba'i chos ston par mdzad// rab tu ston par mdzad kyis// de'i phyir khyed cag kyang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar deng zhig dang / des khyed
268b1(dkon brtsegs): nAg la yun ring po'i don dang / ban pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang rjes su bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang yul
268b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mi rnams bdud sdig can gyis bskul ba ra/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tob 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phyi ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs
268b3(dkon brtsegs): te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas// bya rgod kyi phung po'i ra ba la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
268b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas// bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bdud sdig can yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas par rgyal po'i khang
268b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po nas byang nas/ bye rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang // lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
268b6(dkon brtsegs): gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu
268b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos// bdud sdig can phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa la
268'a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci la 'ongs/ bdud gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la
268'a2(dkon brtsegs): mtho btsam pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad la bar chad bya ba'i bsam pas 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos smras pa// sdig can khyod de
268'a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la mtho ba tsam pa dang // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bar chad byas pas khyod la ci bya// sdig can khyod la des yun ring por don med pa dang // gnod pa dang // sdug bsngal
268'a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur bar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri
268'a5(dkon brtsegs): med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po las rjes su 'thun pa'i gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa de thos nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
268'a6(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar// bcom ldan 'das byis pa/ rmongs pa/ mi gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa bdag gi tshed ma 'tshal ba dag
268'a7(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa dang // mdo sde nga 'di lta bu la bar chad bgyi bar brtsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das nongs pa la nongs par bshags par 'tshal lo//
268'b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa nongs pa la nongs par bshags par 'tshal zhing snyan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa
268'b2(dkon brtsegs): de legs par rjes su gzung bar gsol zhes/ nyes pa la nyes pa'i sgo nas bshags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// sdig can 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs
268'b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo nyes pa byung na rnam par dag par lta ba dang / nyes pa la nyes par lta ba na 'chags par byed/ sbyong bar byed cing / phyin chad kyang sdom par byed na 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i
268'b4(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dul ba 'di 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
268'b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag rtsub po ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du gdags pam mdzad lagra sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
268'b6(dkon brtsegs): spel pa/ sdig ce na de de bzhin no// bdud kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi mnga' bdag ci'i slad du bdag la sdig can zhes bgyi ba'i sgras
268'b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rjod par mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba / sdig can de'i phyir 'di na skyes bu mekhas pa la la bshad pa'i don dpes kun shes par 'gyur ba dag yod pas dpe
269a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon cig/ sdig can 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag phyug po nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig la bu sdug pa// 'dod pa/ dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba/
269a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong na mi mthun pa med pa gcig pu zhig bdog par gyur cing // de'ang de dang 'brel pa'i 'tshe bar gyur la// de'i bu gcig pa de'ang gdul dka' ba dang / bcos dka' ba dang / g.yo sgyu
269a3(dkon brtsegs): can zhig yin par gyur nas/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag des bu gcig pa de 'di lta ste/ nyes pa de las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir lag pas kyang rdeg par byed/ dbyig pa dang / khu tshur dang /
269a4(dkon brtsegs): brdeg pa gang yang rung ba dag gis kyang rdeg par byed cing / ngag rtsub po dag gis kyang sdigs par byed na/ sdig can 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag de bu gcig pa de
269a5(dkon brtsegs): la khro ba dang / 'khrug pa dang // 'thab pa dang / brngam pa'i bsam pas rdeg par byed pa yin snyam mam/ bdud kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bde bar gshes
269a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'das de ni de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du rdeg lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sdig can de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
269a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal mkhyen pa'ang sems can dag rtsub pos 'dul ba rnams ni ngag rtsub pos 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can sma dbab pas 'dul ba
269b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni sma dbab pas 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can bsdu bas 'dul ba rnams ni bsdu bas 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams ni gzugs kyis
269b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar mdzad do// sems can sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang // chos kyis 'dul ba rnams ni s+tha dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad
269b3(dkon brtsegs): do// de nas bdud sdig can dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang // yi rangs pa dang // mchog tu yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas//
269b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grong ngam// grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam
269b5(dkon brtsegs): ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog gam// 'chad pa der ba dag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang /
269b6(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba de la'ang sman gdags pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi lags so// de la snga ltas ni 'di dag lags par rig par bgyi ste/ de'i 'khor zhi ba dang // gnyid dang rmugs pa dang bral
269b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de la chos nyan pa rgya chen po rgya chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dag gis de'i lus dub par mi 'gyur ba dang /
270a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems kyang ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang / ston pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de lta de ltar
270a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i sems dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang // gzeng mtho ba nyid du'ang 'gyur lags so// de nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu gang dag 'khor der 'dus par gyur
270a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gis bdud kyis bshad pa 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
270a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa la gzhan mu stegs
270a5(dkon brtsegs): can spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu 'di dag gis dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun+da dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das
270a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa
270a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhig byung bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bshad do// des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na'ang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu mtho btsam pa'i bsam pa can
270b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag lhags te/ lhags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas legs so legs par gsungs so bya ba'i tshig ni rjod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems dang ba dang / dga'
270b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba ni ma thob bo// de dag rgyu de dang rkyen des bskal pa drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du lha dang mi rnams su skyes pa ma gtogs par/ nam yang sems can dmyal ba
270b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams dang // yi dgas rnams su ma skyes so// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba ma thob pas ni tshe rabs
270b4(dkon brtsegs): gzan de dang de dag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur to// na dga' pa de tshe de'i dus na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu gyur pa de dag gzhan dag gcig yin snyam du khyod
270b5(dkon brtsegs): nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom za bar gyur na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhan mu stegs
270b6(dkon brtsegs): can spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu de dag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo 'di dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang ba skyes shing / dga' ba'ang skyes / mchog tu dga' ba'ang
270b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pas/ de de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang mdzad do// de nas gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu de
271a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag lung bstan pa'i mod la skyes pa'i ngang ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
271a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par
271a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
271a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang // gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
271a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la bkod pa de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher
271a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par byed pa de bsod nams ches grangs med par ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
271b1(dkon brtsegs): shes 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang chos smra ba de la sdang ba
271b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ma lags pa ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/
271b3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur pa de bson// rigs kyi 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam
271b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di dang chos smra ba de la sdang ba'i sems skyed par byed pa de bsod nams ma yin pa ches grangs med par ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar
271b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ma dad pa rnams mdun du
271b6(dkon brtsegs): brjod par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i sug las bgyis nas// lus zhig ste gum pa'i 'og tu
271b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur bar rjes su bsrung bar bgyi 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de dag
272a1(dkon brtsegs): gi mdun du brjod par bya ba kho na yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur
272a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yin par phyir ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos kyi nam mangs 'di'i ming tsa lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga'
272a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos bcu pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig
272a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal
272a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / dge slong de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
272a6(dkon brtsegs): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dekon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las / chos bcu pa'i
272a7(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste dgu pa rdzogaso// sh+lo ka lnga brgya sum cu mchis te bam po gnyis so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang su ren dra bo d+hi dang gzhu chen gyi lo tsa ba
272b1(dkon brtsegs): ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa man ta mu kha pa ri brta nA ma mahA yAn sku
272b2(dkon brtsegs): tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun nas sgro'o le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
272b3(dkon brtsegs): dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong brgyad brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis snong dang thabs
272b4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu de bzhin
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa nas// 'jig rten gyi
272b6(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'di'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song
272b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun
273a1(dkon brtsegs): du bdur nas/ nam mkha' las 'ong bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems
273a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pas kun nas sgo'i le'u'o chos kyi
273a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyira'adir 'ong bar gnang ste gtang gis// ngas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag bsdu bar byar des so snyam du dgongs so//
273a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa de lta bu dgongs nas des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
273a5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'khod pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
273a6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs
273a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad kyang 'dus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma
273b1(dkon brtsegs): stong dang ldan pa thogs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
273b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshale te/ pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de phul nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa nas
273b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam// nyam nga ba chung ngam// bskyod pa yang ngam/
273b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe 'am// stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol zhing 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
273b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa kun nas sgo'i le'u bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
273b6(dkon brtsegs): ston tam zhes kyang gsung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa de dag gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
273b7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang lhan cig tu 'khor dang bcas te/ nam mkha' la skyil mo gung bcas nas 'dug go yang de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te
274a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
274a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
274a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas kun nas sgo'i le'u bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ 'das pa'i dus na
274a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba'i sgron ma las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bskyed par gyur// gzungs bsgrub pa'i sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun yang rtogs par gyur to// de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'
274a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams rjes su gzung ba'i skud du legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
274a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' sbal to// de'i phyir 'jam dpal khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// 'jam dpel gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol
274b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
274b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ting nge 'dzin tu rtogs par bya'o// sgra ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// dri ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// ro ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// reg bya ting nge
274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// yid kyi khams ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// bud med kyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// skyes pa'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs
274b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// khye'u'i gzug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// bu mo'i bzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// lha'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// klu'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du
274b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// dri za'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// lha ma yin gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// nam mkha'
274b6(dkon brtsegs): lding gi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// sems can dmyal ba'i
274b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// dud 'gro'o skye gnas kyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//
275a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// gti mug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// dge ba thams cad ting
275a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// mi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'dus byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'dus ma byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du/
275a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par bya'o// de ltar chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
275a4(dkon brtsegs): po ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i blo dang ldan pa yin la/ kun nas sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la'ang bslabs pa yin no// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang
275a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur gsungs// de la snying po mi rnyed do// snying po med phyir gzung med phyir// des na ting
275a6(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal da ltar na gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas sgra ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya/
275a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ sgra ni brag cha lta bu ste// de la dngos po yod ma yin// tha dad dbye ba med shes shing // mtshan nyid med pa bye brag med// mtshan nyid med cing byung ba med// ya ma brla dang //
275b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas// brag cha lta bur shes pas na// des ni ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na sgra ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang
275b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas dri ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i gting dag ni// nams kyang cis kyang gang med ltar// bskal pa bye bar bsdams byas kyang // sA ni
275b3(dkon brtsegs): tshim par 'gyur med// sna yi rnam rig gzung med de// slu ba'i chos de yod ma yin// gal te yang dag yin gyur na// de las myur du tshim par 'gyur// gzung ba med cing yang
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag min// sna yang yod min gsog tu shes// gsob dang stong par shes pas na// des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// / 'jam dpal de ltar na dri ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//
275b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas ro ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ lce ni tsha dang kha ba'ang min// skyur dang lan tshwa'ang ma yin te// ci 'dra'i rkyen dang ldan pa las// /
275b6(dkon brtsegs): lce yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ro 'di rgyu las byung ba dang / rkyen la rag las shes gyur cing / bsam gyis mi khyab shes pas na// des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal de
275b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar na ro ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas reg bya ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// rnam rig las byung reg bya ni//
276a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis yod ma yin// 'jam pa dang ni rtsub pa nyid// rkyen rnams las ni byung ba yin// reg bya gnas pa med pa ste// bdag nyid nye bar gnas pa yin//
276a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams sbyor ba shes pas na// des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na reg bya ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sem
276a3(dkon brtsegs): dpas yid kyi khams ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ gang dag stong gsum sems can rnams// de dag gnas gcig gnas gyur te// yid khams rnam par shes byed cing /
276a4(dkon brtsegs): de yi dngos po rnyed mi 'gyur// bsags pa dang ni gong bu yang // rnam par rig la gnas pa med// kha dog sna tshogs rnams ston kyang / phyi dang nang na gnas ma yin//
276a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med cing gnas kyang med// sgyu ma lta bur dngos po med// med cing ya ma brlar shes pas// des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na yid kyi khams ting nge 'dzin
276a6(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas bud med kyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag/ de la bud med yod
276a7(dkon brtsegs): min yang // byis pa rnams ni rmongs pa'i blos// 'dod pa'i gsog la spyod par byed// sgyu ma'i bud med mtshan med kyang // bud med gzugs su snang ba las// gang dag mur
276b1(dkon brtsegs): pas bsgribs pa'i mi// de la kun tu chags pa skyed// ji ltar sgyu ma'i bud med la// 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems bskyed kyang // de la bud med yod ma yin// phyin ci log gi sems kyis
276b2(dkon brtsegs): ni/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// blo gros chung rnams 'khor bar byed// des na dngos po med shis na// bud med thams cad mtshan nyid med// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// bud med
276b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyis rab tu bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na bud med kyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas skyes pa'i gzugs ting nge
276b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'di ni bud med bdag skyed par// ji ltar skyes pas brjod pa las// de yi tshe na de yi sems// 'dod chags ldan pa brdzun pa 'byung // sems ni gzugs
276b5(dkon brtsegs): med gzung ba med// bud med skyes par bstan pa med// kun tu rtog pas sgro btags na/ skyes pa'i 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni bud med bdag dpa' zhes// 'du shes
276b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rnam brtags pa// de ngos smig rgyu 'drar gsungs te// de la skyes pa yod ma yin// skyes pa nyid ni brdzun pas na// de ni med las byung ba yin// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa
276b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo'i gzugs kyis rab tu bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na skyes pa'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
277a1(dkon brtsegs): dpas khye'u'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// ljon pa'i myu gu yod min na// me tog 'byung bar ga la 'gyur// me tog yod pa ma yin na// 'bras bu
277a2(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'ang med pa ltarabud med yod pa ma yin pas// khye'u yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te// brtags pa'i dbang du song rnams kyang // khye'u zhes bya bar brtags pa yin// bud med
277a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med shes na// khye'u yang 'byung ba yod min te// dngos po thams cad med rtogs pas// des na khye'u ni ting 'dzin bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na khye'u'i gzugs ting nge
277a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas bu mo'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ ji ltar ta la'i mgo bcad pa// de ni nam yang mi
277a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ste// mkhas pas shes nas de la ni// 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa med// de bzhin mkhas pas bud med kyang // rnam kun skye ba med shes pas// brtan pa bu mo skyes so zhes/
277a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin chad rtog par mi byed do// sa bon bskams par gyur pa la// rnam kun skye ba med shes pas// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// bu mo'i gzugs kyis rab tu bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar/
277a7(dkon brtsegs): na bu mo'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// rnam rtog dge las byung ba
277b1(dkon brtsegs): yi/ las dge 'bras bu lta rnams te// rab tu dang bu'i yid kyis ni// mdzes pa'i lha rnams mngon par grub// gsal med khang pa nyams dga' ba// de dag gzhan sus byas
277b2(dkon brtsegs): pa min// me tog man+ta ra ba yang // de dag gzhan sus bskyed pa min// sgyu ma'i las las kun 'byung bas// byung ba rnams kyang bsam du med// bzang por snang ba'i bai r+d+han+tu/
277b3(dkon brtsegs): log par grub pa rnams kyang brdzun// yang dgra min pas kun bskyed pas// lha rnams brdzun par shes pas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// lha yi gzugs kyis bstan yin/
277b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ltar na lha'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dbras glu'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// mi bzod
277b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa byas nas ni// yod min sprin gyi gzugs bstan cing // char pa'i rgyun dag rab 'bebs pa// de dag nang na mi gnas kyang // 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya mtsho dang // klung dang du/
277b6(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su 'gengs// sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar// chu ni 'byung ba yod ma yin// de dang mtshungs pa'i sems can kun// rtsom pa sna tshogs bslab pa rnams// las rnams
277b7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs ston byed kyang // las de 'byung ba yod ma yin// mkhas pas byis pa rmongs byed pa'i// sgyu 'di ma byung shes pas na// bden pa ma yin bden snang bas// klu ni ting nge 'dzin
278a1(dkon brtsegs): du bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na klu'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs ting
278a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin du rtogs par b+ha zhe na/ sems ni rnam par gyur pa las// 'jigs pa'i gzugs ni mngon grub pa// lus kyi bong tshad che ba yang // sems gcig gis ni kun tu bskyed//
278a3(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'jigs pa yod min te// tshogs pa dag las 'jigs pa skye// yod pa min pa'i las rnams las// mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas ltos// mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas pa/
278a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu stong par shes pas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// gnod sbyin gzugs kyis bstan pa yin// 'jam dpal de ltar na gnod sbyin gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par
278a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas dri za'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// chos de shin tu 'gro med kyang // 'gro ba'i sgrar ni brjod pas na//
278a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas 'gro ba med shes pas// dri zas ting 'dzin bstan pa yin// 'jam dpal de ltar na dri za'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub
278a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lha ma yin gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// a yi rgyas btab lha min te// skye ba med las yang dag byung // 'gag med 'byung ba yod min pas/
278b1(dkon brtsegs): ldum smin gyis nga 'dzin bstas// 'jam dpal de ltar na lha ma yin gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nam mngar
278b2(dkon brtsegs): lding gi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// 'dzin pa med la 'dzin byas nas// brjod pas ming du btags pas na// ming dang gzugs ni yod min pas// ya mkha'
278b3(dkon brtsegs): lding gis ting 'dzin bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na nas mkha' lding gi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas mi 'am ci'i gzugs
278b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ byas min byas pa'i las rnams kyis// mi 'am ci nyid kun tu bskyed// 'di dag skye ba med shes pas// mi 'am ci yos ting 'dzin bstan// 'jam dpal
278b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na mi 'am ci'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dngapal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ ming
278b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis ni chos 'di dag/ 'jig rten dag tu sna tshogs bzhag/ chos de 'di la yod ma yin// med las thams cad kun tu btags// kun tu btags par kun shes na/
278b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid kyis kun rtog med// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//
279a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// rdul dang bral zhing rdul med gsog/ de la
279a2(dkon brtsegs): byed po 'ga' yang med// rang gi rtog pas kun bskyed do// rtog pa de yang yod ma yin// dmyal ba dri med dri bral zhing // dag dang yang dag 'od gsal dang // mtshan nyid med cing mtshan
279a3(dkon brtsegs): med par// byang chub snying por rangs shes te// mtshan nyid med cing byung med de// nam mkha' 'dra bar shes pas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs
279a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi gzugs
279a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ dper na ji ltar sprin gyi gzugs// kha dog sna tshogs byung ba dag/ de la kha dog yod min yang / mi mkhas pa dag rmongs par byed// de bzhin sems kyang
279a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i bIr// sprin gyi gzugs dang mtshungs 'dra yang // dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su ni// rnam pa sna tshogs lus kyang sngon// lus kyi sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang // byung med mtshan nyid
279a7(dkon brtsegs): med par shes// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// dud 'gro'i gzugs kyis bstan pa yin// 'jam dpal de ltar na dud 'gror skye gnas kyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam
279b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// nag po dang ni dkar po yi// sdig dang khan ma mtho dang // kha na mtho med
279b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las// rab 'bring thams 'dren byas pas// gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal zhing // tshol par kun tu 'khor ba yin// de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten med// de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong//
279b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na ni myong ba bzhin// 'jug pa med cing grub pa med// gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod med pas// des na ting nge 'dzin du bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi
279b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dod chags ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// yongs su rtog las 'dod chags
279b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // rtog pa de yang 'byung ba med// 'byung ba med la gnas pa med// de yi gnas kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// gnas med gnas pa yod min pas// 'dod chags nam mkha' 'dra ba
279b6(dkon brtsegs): yin// byis pa bslad par gyur rnams kyis// kun nas nyon mongs yongs su brtags// kun nas nyon mongs med chos de// 'dod chags shes bya'i ming gis brjod// phyogs bcu
279b7(dkon brtsegs): dag tu btsal byas kyang // de yi dngos po rnyed mi 'gyur// 'dod chags dngos po med pa la// byis pa rmongs pa 'jigs byed de// 'jigs med 'jigs pa'i 'du shes can/
280a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni bde ba med/ ji ltar skyes bu la la dag/ mkha' la 'jigs par 'du shes nas// skrag cing bdag gis nam mkha' ni// mi mthong bya zhes 'bros byed cang //
280a2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkhas kun tu khyab pas na// su yang de las ma thar te/ byis pa bsad par gyur rnams kyis/ phyin ci log tu rnam par btags// de ltar chos rnams mkha' 'dra bar// shes
280a3(dkon brtsegs): par mgyur byis pa rnams// dngos po med pa'i 'dod chags la// yongs su spang bar mngon par 'dod// 'dod chags nam mkha' 'dra bas na// su yang de las 'grol ba med//
280a4(dkon brtsegs): grol zhing rnam grol phun sum tshogs// chos rnams mya ngan 'das dang 'dra// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // 'dren pa gang dag bzhugs pa dang // gang dag 'byung 'gyur
280a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas// de kun spyod yul 'dod chags yin// 'dod chags stong par shes gyur na// chags las grol ba gang yang med// gang dag chags la 'jigs 'du 'gas/
280a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag chags las grol byar sems// ci yang med pa'i mtha' 'di ni// 'dod chags mtha' ste 'od gsal zhing // mtshan ma med la brtag mnyam par/ byang chub snying por/
280a7(dkon brtsegs): nga yis mthong // dngos por 'du shes sems can gang // de dag 'dod chags 'bri bar 'gyur// yod pa min pa yongs btags pas// de dag gis ni spong ba btags// bdag gis
280b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags spang bya zhes// de 'dra'i 'du shes skyes nas ni// de la spangs shes brjod par bya// 'gro ba 'di dag 'du shes tsam// 'dod chags mtha' ni bsam yas te// mtha' de 'dzin
280b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pas na// yang dag mtha' dang don mnyam pas// de las grol bar ma rtog cig/ gal te chags las grol 'gyur na// stong pa nyid las grol bar 'gyur// 'dod
280b3(dkon brtsegs): chags dang ni stong pa nyid// de gnyis gnyis su yod ma yin// 'di ltar skye ba med pa la// de dag skye bar rnam btags pas// byis pa gnyis su shes rnams la// ngas
280b4(dkon brtsegs): ni spong ba rab tu bstan// 'dod chags de ni skye med na// 'dod chags shes bya'i ming du brjod// ming rnams kun du chags med pas// ming la su yang chags pa med//
280b5(dkon brtsegs): 'did chags chags pa med shes shing // mtha' las 'das pa'i stong mthong na// 'dod chags rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// thar pa mkhas pas mi mthong ngo // 'dod chags
280b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos mtshungs shing // mya ngan 'das pa 'drar shes nas// rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin// 'dod chags smras ni ngas bstan to// zhi ba'i dbyings la rten pa
280b7(dkon brtsegs): yin// 'dod chags rab tu zhi shes nas// mkhas pa rnams la nga yis ni// ting 'dzin 'dod chags slar bstan to// 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'don
281a1(dkon brtsegs): chags ti nge 'dzin du rdzogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la dza ltar na byang chub sems dpas kyi sdad dI de bzhi du rtos dA b+hU we nu/ snod las zhe
281a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'byung // nyon mongs pa yang rkyen las skyes// bdag med pa las byung ba'i bdag/ mang po'i tshogs las skyes pa yin// rna ba pa'i sbru las zhe sdang ni// dug non
281a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu kun tu byung // sgra ni nga ro'i rang bzhin pas// shin tu yod pa ma yin no// ji ltar tshogs pas gnub shing dang // gtsub stan las ni me 'byung ste// tshogs dang bral
281a4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na no// de na mo yang yod man ltar// de bzhin yid du mi 'ong ba'i// sgra las zhe sdang gsog byung zhing // gsog gi sgra la yongs brtags na// de la zhe sdang rnyed mi
281a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// zhe sdang sgra las ma byung zhing // nang na gnas pa'ang ma yin la// zhe sdang phyi rol nas 'ongs te/ byung ba med pas gsog yin no// rgyu rnams phan tshun 'dus pa
281a6(dkon brtsegs): las/ zhe sdang kun tu byung ba yin// phan tshun bral bar gyur na nA~M// de la zhe sdang rnyed mi 'gyur// ji ltar zho dang 'o mya la// skyes bus btsal te srub shing gis// bsrub
281a7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pas rkyen rnams las// mar ni kun tu 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin yid du mi 'thad pa'o// sgra las zhe sdang gsog 'byung zhing // yongs su brtags pas de'i gnas la//
281b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas pa dag rab tu 'bar// kun tu brtags pas zhe sdang ni// shin+da tu dngos med shes pas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// zhe sdang skams rab tu bstan// 9 sngu
281b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' mnyam dang // de bzhin nyid la rten pa yin// chos kyi dbyings dang 'drar shes pas// des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin
281b3(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas gti mug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// ma rig pa las gti mug byung // ma rig pa yang yod
281b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin// gang na gti mug yod min pa// de na gang yang rmongs pa med// rmongs med sems can rmongs gyur cing / chags med chags par 'du shes pa// ji ltar byis pa rnam mnga'
281b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ mdud pa bor ba gsog bzhin no// yod pa ma yin chos rnams la// kun nas can mongs rnam btags pa// byis pa rnams kyi 'di mtshar te// mchog tu shin tu bya bar dpa'
281b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar skyes bu la la shig/ ral mapa' la ni 'jal byed cing // bskal pa bye bar gzhal byas kyang // de la phung po mo rnyed ltar// de bzhin nongs pas byis pa 'o// sngon gyi rdza'adi
281b7(dkon brtsegs): bsal mo khyag gti mug phung por 'byung med de// des ni ci yang bkang ba yod/ ji ltar nam mkha' bzhal byas kyang // de la sngon gyi mtha' med cing // de na ci yang bka' ba med/
282a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal ba rus pa med pa ltar// de bzhin bskal pa stong rnams su// kun tu rmongs pas dgang byas kyang // de la bkang ba ci yang med// ngoms pa'ang cung zad/
282a2(dkon brtsegs): yong ma yin// ji ltar skyes bu la la yis// spyad pa stong pa bud byas shing // bzhag nas sdud pa rnyongs pa na// de yi nang na rnyed min ltar// de bzhin 'dod pa spyad 'dra ba/
282a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rmongs pas spyod par byed// de ni ngoms par mi 'gyur te/ phyir zhing 'dod pa tshol bar byed// gti mug yod pa med shes brjod// rtsa ba chad cing dngos po med// rtsa ba
282a4(dkon brtsegs): med cing gnas kyang med// de sa na gti mug zad pa med// 'di ltar gti mug mi zad pas// de yi mtha' ma rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir sems can thams cad la// zad par bya bar ngas
282a5(dkon brtsegs): mi nu sa// gal te dpe tsam brjod bya na// bskal pa bye ba bas ma yas su// nga yi tshe ni gnas gyur la// nyin gcig bzhin du nyin re la// stong gsum sems can ji snyed pa//
282a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mya ngan bzla byas shing // thams cad de ltar byas kyang ni// sems can khams la zad pa med// gti mug gis ni bskyed pa'i khams// sems can khams la
282a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med// gti mug de ni sgyu ma 'dra// des ni de yi mtha' mi rnyed// sangs rgyas gti mug mnyam pas na// de dag gnyis su med par bstan// rmongs gyur byis pa de
282b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis// 'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam par btags// thams cad mkhyen cid gti mug mnyam// gti mug thams cad yod ma yin/ bat+ti mag sems can kun dang pal+h+wam/
282b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun kyang bsam mi khyab/ bsam mi khyab dang gti mug ni// sems bskyed pa yis rnam par brtags// sems kun bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de yi tshad ni yod ma
282b3(dkon brtsegs): yin// gti mug de la tshad med pas// de yi 'byung ba rnyed mi 'gyur// 'byung ba yod pa mo yin na// skye ba yod par ga la 'gyur// gti mug skyes pa ma yin na// de yi rmongs byed
282b4(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas kun kyang de dang 'dra// tha dad dbye ba med shes na// chos rnams thams cad gnyis su med// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// gti mug sgra yis rab tu
282b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan// gang tsheng nga yis mnyam nyid shes// de na de dang gti mug mnyam// de dag thams cad mnyam shes nas// ting 'dzin de ltar shes par gyis// 'jam dpal de ltar na gti mug
282b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas mi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na// 'dod chags spyod pa'i rtags gang dang /
282b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa'i g.yo ba dang // gti mug spyod pa gang yin pa// thams cad ting 'dzin shes par gyis// nyon mongs kun gyi sgrub pa ni// ting 'dzin yin par mos par gyis// brdzun dang /
283a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma yin par// thams cad de bzhin sgom par gyis// 'jam dpal de ltar na mi dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na
283a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ sems can rnams kyi ji snyed dge/ sems dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba// spyod pa thams cad spyod gcig ste// de ltar
283a3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin shes par gyis// sems can kun gyi spyod pa dag/ bsgrub pa gcig tu shes pas na// ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni// kun gyi sgra yis bstan pa yin// 'jam dpal de ltar
283a4(dkon brtsegs): na dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ 'du byed thams cad 'du byed
283a5(dkon brtsegs): min// de dag bgrang bas gzhal byas na// gzhal du med cing dpag tu med// de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis// dpag tu med par shes na ni// lus med dngos po yod min pas// ting 'dzin
283a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba brjod pa ni// 'du byed kun gyis bstan pa yin// 'jam dpal de ltar na 'dus byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dus
283a7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ chos 'di rang bzhin zhi bas na// de la grangs ni yod ma yin// ma rig pa yis bsgrub zhi ga/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgrub par bstan/
283b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kun la brjod med cing // bsgrub pa skyed par shes nas ni// sems can gang dag brjod la chags// de dag rnams la de ltar bstan// 'jam dpal de ltar na 'dus ma byas
283b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong
283b3(dkon brtsegs): gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong sum
283b4(dkon brtsegs): khri drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma drug stong nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
283b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen sa ya brgyad 'bum gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag bzhi dang nyis 'bum gyis kyang bla na med pa yang
283b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'
283b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnon po gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mang thos na// chos thams cad la snang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang gang zag dmigs/
284a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lta ba can rnams kyis thul bar dka' ba dang / yi ge gcig gis yi ge thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig rtogs par 'gyur
284a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can thams cad la chos stong pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa pa thams cad mtshan nyid
284a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu rtogs shing / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ming bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa/
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyen la yid la zung zhig dang bshad de/
284a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la
284a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal mtha' yas dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs thams cad yongs su dag par ston to// 'jam dpal
284a7(dkon brtsegs): mgyogs par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal 'od zer 'byung
284b1(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid zil gyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal yul ston
284b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus po thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug zho bar byed do// 'jam dpal 'od zer
284b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byed do// 'jam dpal chos thams
284b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa thams cad 'dzin cing gzhan la'ang ston par byed do// 'jam
284b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal seng ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rjes su skyugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du
284b6(dkon brtsegs): sgras mngon par go bar byed do// 'jam dpal dga' ba dang // mgu ba dang / tshom pa thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa'
284b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs yang dag par mgu bar byed do// 'jam dpal blta bas chog mi shes shing mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang mnyan pas chog mi shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas shes rab kyi yul
285a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i 'byung khung rgyun gcig pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul bstan pa thams cad ston pa dang sems can rnams
285a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar byed do// 'jam dpal sgra skad thams cad kyi brda zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa' sgra skad dang brjod pa dang brda thams cad rtogs shing yi/
285a4(dkon brtsegs): ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig ston pa dang / yi ge gcig gis yi ge thams cad ston par byed do// 'jam dpal las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sogs
285a5(dkon brtsegs): shing ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang mi smra bar snyoms par zhugs te/ yi ge gcig tsam yang mi rjod par sems can thams cad
285a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / nyan thos kyi sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thos par byed do//
285a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzungs thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa/
285b1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na// byang chub sems dpa' yi ge thams cad la spobs shing
285b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra skad thams cad dang / dbyangs thams cad dang / brjod pa thams cad la rang spobs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
285b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan brjod pa'i khyad par la spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod spobs
285b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nem nur ma mchis pa dang / the tsom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
285b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ston pa dang // 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang // gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi 'tshal bar
285b6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa 'thob par re bar bgyi ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa rgya che ba dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / mi brjed pa'i spobs pa dang / spobs pa sna tshogs 'thob par re bar/
285b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// de ni sems can thams cad la zhe 'gris pa ma mchis pa'i sems su 'gyur bar re bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
286a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa de ni spyod pa 'di nyid dang rjes su 'brel ba lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba
286a2(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po 'thob par slu ba med do// tshul khrims
286a3(dkon brtsegs): ni mtho ris su skye bar slu ba med do// thos pa ni shes rab chen por 'gyur bar sgrub med do// sgom pa ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar slu ba med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir
286a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa skye bar slu ba med do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar bas ni mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam
