286a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'ang bstan ma thag tu spobs pa skye bar re bar bya'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag
286a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu 'don
286a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang the tsom med par nges par tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par
286b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas rnam nur med pa dang / the tsom med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi namazangs 'di bzung bar bya// bcang bar bya/ kha ton du bya bzag par bya/ ban chub par bya/ gzhan drug la rje cher
286b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
286b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nem nur ma mchis pa dang / the tsom ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
286b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang // klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de la spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//
286b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdud sdig can du zhing smre sngags 'don bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
286b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thugs rje dang ldan zhing // sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba rab tu stsol ba lags ni/ bcom ldan 'das
286b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag gi yid mi bde ba de legs par bsal ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slar zhing byin gyis mi brlab par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
287a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa dang / da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ bdag 'dir shin tu cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang / mya ngan gyi zug
287a2(dkon brtsegs): rngus gzir bar gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
287a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags ni/ gang dag gis thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
287a4(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs
287a5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag gi bdud kyi gnas stongs par 'gyur lags na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
287a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ni thugs rje dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal ba rnams la ni bde bskul ba lags na// bcom ldan 'das bdag dbugs dbyung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag dbugs dbyung
287a7(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las
287b1(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar mi 'gyur la/ sdig can da'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed kyis/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs dbyung
287b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad pas/ bdud sdig can tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
287b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci las dgongs te 'di skad du nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do zhes
287b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can la bka' stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs
287b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang byin gyi rlabs med pas byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir ngas bdud sdig can la/ 'di skad du nga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed
287b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras so// 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs med pas byir gyis brlabs pa dang / tha dad du dbyer med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang /
287b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid med pa dang / bsnyad du med pa dang / smar med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa dang de bzhin nyid du
288a1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i glang na rab tu spyod par gyur cig
288a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs de mdzad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gang yin pa
288a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang yin pa de dag ni mnyam pa'i phyir khyod kyis kun nas sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par
288a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas sgo'i chos kyi dbyings 'di legs
288a5(dkon brtsegs): par thugs su chud nas/ sems can rnams la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bsrung
288a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang legs par gzung ba dang legs par kun chub par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
288a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po ni ma med pa'i snying po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas
288b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ kun nas
288b2(dkon brtsegs): sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa rdzogs so// sh+lo kanyis brgya drug cu'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa bawa
288b3(dkon brtsegs): ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra b+ha sA d+ha na ma nA ma mahA sA na sU trabod skad du/
288b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
288b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ril dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang rang dbang chen po thob
288b6(dkon brtsegs): balnga brgya dang gzhan yang tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang / gzhan yang yang byang
288b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
289a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas
289a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
289a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngon 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ 'di ltar rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer dang / yongs su sdud pa'i 'od zer dang / kun nas slong ba'i 'od zer dang
289a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa'i 'od zer dang / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog 'dres pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / rgya chung ngu'i 'od zer dang // rgya chen po'i 'od zer dang / rnam par dag
289a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu dri ma ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od zer dang / rim gyis
289a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba'i 'od zer dang / gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang // tshad ma
289a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / grangs kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu grangs kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / myur ba'i 'od
289b1(dkon brtsegs): zer dang / shin tu myur ba'i 'od zer dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer drang / rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer dang snang bar bgyid/
289b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'od zer dang / mos par bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / pha rol tu phyin par bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang // thogs pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i 'od zer
289b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rlung po'i 'od zer dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa la gnas pa'i 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan gyi 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang
289b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog le brgan gyi mtshan nyid
289b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer dang / chu shel gyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / nam mkha'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang // 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od zer ro
289b6(dkon brtsegs): re kun kyang / kha dog rnam pa lnga'i 'od zer 'dres par gyur pa ston par mdzad pa nas/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i dngos po re re kun kyang 'od zer ba/
289b7(dkon brtsegs): dog rnam pa sna tshogs tshad ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dag dang 'dres par gyur pa rab tu ston par mdzad pa'i bar du brnyes par gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/
290a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de bkar stsal ba/ da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// dge ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen gyis// rmongs pa rnams ni rab spangs pas/
290a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer sna tshogs grub pa yin// gzhan yang spyod pa sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas lam la rab gnas shing // stong pa byed med shes rab kyis// 'dres pa'i 'od zer bstan pa yin// ji ltar phyi
290a3(dkon brtsegs): rol chos dag la// mtshan nyid bye brag sna tshogs snang // de ni stong zhing bdag kyang med// byed pa med cing sems yid med// gzhan yang ji ltar nang gi lus// stong zhing bdag med byed
290a4(dkon brtsegs): med kyang // de las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sgra skad dgA ni rab tu ston// de ltar byed med dbang gis na// kha dog dpag med 'od bstan nas// mos padag ni ji bzhin du// re ba
290a5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni skong bar mdzad// res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis bskyed nas// so sor rab 'bring tha ma yi// bye brag yod pa rab tu ston// res 'ga' 'od
290a6(dkon brtsegs): zer gcig las ni// kha dog rnam pa gsum bskyed nas// so sor rab 'bring tha ma yi// bye brag yod pa rab tu ston// res 'gar 'od zer gcig las ni// kha dog rnam

297a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhes bya yod// sems can sangs rgyas lam la gnas par mdzad// da la 'od zer chos shes bya ba yod// shin tu nam dag gsal byed dri ma med// nga la 'od zer dge
297a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun zhes bya yod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// nga la 'od zer rnam dag ces bya yod// 'od zer de ni khyad 'phags rnyed par dka'// nga la 'od zer bal+la/
297a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya yod// sems can phan 'dogs yongs su smin par byed// nga la 'od zer tshangs pa zhes bya yod// kha cig brgya byin yang na lha zhes bya// zla ba glu dang gnod sbyin zhes kyang bya//
297a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding zhes bya// kha cig rgyal po bud med ces kyang bya// kha cig bu mo kha cig khye'u zhes kyang bya// de ltar 'od zer sna tshogs mang po rnams// so sor dge chos
297b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis skal mtshungs 'dul// 'khor ni tshad med bye ba snyed dag kyang // thams cad byang chub yongs su smin par byed// nga la 'od zer shes rab ces bya yod// kha cig tshul khrims
297b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ming byams pa// kha cig snying rje dga' dang snron zhes bya// kha cig byug spos kha cig rol mo sba// 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams// sngon gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'thun par ni/
297b3(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu'i rnam pa tshad med yongs bsdus pas// des na 'od zer 'di dag rdzogs pa yin// nga la 'od zer gtso bo zhes bya yod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// sangs
297b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bstan pa rnams la rtag gus pas// des na 'od zer 'di ni rdzogs pa yin// sangs rgyas spyan gyis sems can grangs gzigs nas// spu khung kun nas 'od zer sna tshogs gtong /
297b5(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer mang po de dag re re yang // so sor 'khor mang dag gis rab tu bskor// sems can rnams kyis mos pa ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas 'od zer gtong zhing smin par mdzad// gang
297b6(dkon brtsegs): gis 'od zer bstan pa 'di thos nas// rab tu dga' zhing mos par gang byed pa// de sngon sangs rgyas mang po dag las ni// mdo sde 'di ni thos par gyur pa yin// nga la 'ong
297b7(dkon brtsegs): zer khyad par 'phags pa yod// 'khor ni bye ba brgyad cu grangs snyed yod// sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la tshogs bcad gcig/ bsngags pas de phyir 'od zer 'di 'grub bo//
298a1(dkon brtsegs): nga la 'od zer mya ngan med pa yod// 'khor ni khrag khrig brgyad cu snyed yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig bzung bas// de phyir 'od zer 'di ni grub pa yin/
298a2(dkon brtsegs): ngal 'od zer rnam dag mchog yod de// 'khor ni bye ba brgyad cu grangs snyed yod// ting 'dzin gcig ni yongs su bzung bas na// de phyir 'od zer 'di ni grub pa yin// 'das pa'i dus kyi
298a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan// khyad par 'phags pa zhes bya byung // sangs rgyas de ni 'jig rten na// sku tshe tshad ni med par bzhugs// dang po mngon par sangs rgyas tshe/ chos bstan
298a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du 'dus pa yi// grangs mi drag khrig brgyad cu stod// de nyid du ni 'dus par 'gyur// de yi tshen 'dzam bu yi// gling chen dag ni 'di dag tu// yul gyi rgyal po de yi ming // sgra la
298a5(dkon brtsegs): mos shes bya ba byung // rgyal po chen po de la ni// bu pho dag ni lnga brgya yod// byang bzhin dag ni sdug mdzes pas// mthong ba dag ni dga' bar 'gyur// de yi tshe na rgyal po'i yig/
298a6(dkon brtsegs): gzi byin rang dbang rab ldan zhing // dkon mchog dag ni gsum po la// shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// rgyal po de la skyed mos tshal// mchog tu gyur pa ji snyed pa// de dag
298a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gus pas ni// bcom ldan de la rab tu phul// skyed mos tshal ni de dag tu// 'chag sa dag ni ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad kun tu ni// ljon shing tsam pa ka dag dang /
298b1(dkon brtsegs): ljon shing d+ha gro d+ha dag dang // ljon shing keng shu ka dang ni// ljon shing u dus wa ra dang // ljon shing pa la sarba dang // ljon shing shi ri sha dag dang // ljon shing mya ngan 'chang la
298b2(dkon brtsegs): sogs// de dag grangs ni so sor yang // bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu yod// ljon shing mang po de dag kyang // dbyar dang dgun ni 'dra bar yang // me tog 'bras bu yal ga dag/ kha dog dag ni
298b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal zhing rgyas// dri mchog dam pa rab 'byung zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'phrul// dge slong dag ni ji snyed pa// lus kyi kha dog gser dang 'dra// de dag thams cad
298b4(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang ni// ljon shing dag ni de drung du// 'dug nas rab tu brtson pas na// gzungs ni rab tu thob par 'gyur// de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de// rgyal po yab dang sras rnams dang /
298b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'khor ni mang po la// shin tu thugs ni brtse ba'i phyir// rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer mdo// de dag la ni rab tu bstan// rgyal po des ni thos gyur nas// sems ni rab
298b6(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa tshad med pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod// gzhan yang rgyal po chen po des// rin po che yi gdugs dam pa//
298b7(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag ni brgyad cu smad// bcom ldan de la rab tu phul// rin chen gdugs ni re re la// yid bzhin nor bu'i dra ba dag/ mtha' ma 'khor bar rab tu brgyan// yid bzhin nor
299a1(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po che// de dag re re'i rin tang yang // 'dzam bu'i gser na bcom dag/ srang ni bye ba brgyad cu ri// rin chen gdugs nI re re yang // yid bzhin nor bu
299a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che// bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed// 'phreng ba dag tu byas par 'gyur// yid bzhin rin chen de dag kyang // kha dog dag ni rab gsal bas// nyin mtshan dag ni med par yang /
299a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'od zer rab tu gtong // 'od zer de dag re res kyang // dpag tshad brgya ni snang bar byed// 'od zer de dag rab gsal bas// nyi zla dag ni zil gyis gnon// gzhan yang rin chen gdug
299a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag/ seng ge rin chen chun 'phyang ni// bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu dang // gser skud rin chen 'phreng ba yang // bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu dag/ ngos bzhi dag ni rab tu brgyan// gzhan yang rin chen
299a5(dkon brtsegs): dum+b+ha pa ni// 'di ltar rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mu tig rin chen dra ba dag/ spel ma dag tu rnam par brgyan// 'di lta bu yi gdugs dag gis// skyed mos tshal ni kun tu g.yogs/
299a6(dkon brtsegs): de yi steng du gzhan yang ni// pad+ma su ma na dang ni// pad+ma a ti mug ta ka/ btang zung zhes ni bya ba dang // pad+ma u dum wa ra dang // pad+ma sngon po la sogs dang // de bzhin rnam pa
299a7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi// pad+ma'i gdugs ni tshad med pa// re re thams cad kun kyang ni// rin chen dra ba 'tsham par byas// gzhan yang gser gyi skud pa las// byas pa'i gos dag gis
299b1(dkon brtsegs): byung na// bla re dag tu rab byas nas// de mi steng du khyab par g.yogs// gzhan yang can dan rin chem bri// gser dag las ni gang byas pa// de yi grangs kyang bye ba zag klu brgyad cu/
299b2(dkon brtsegs): snyed ni rab tu bshams// rin chen khri ni de dag la// zab dang dag las byas pa yi// stan ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu// de yi steng du rab brgyan no// de yi tshe na sems can gyi// rnam
299b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni ji snyed pa// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyang // thams cad der ni 'dus gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa de las ni// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu mnyan// lha dang glu dang gnod sbyin
299b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za yi ni rgyal po dang // lto 'phye chen po lha ma yin// de dag mdo sde 'di thos nas// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes pas// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// de bzhin gshegs
299b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsngags brjod nas// de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang // byang chub chen por smon lam btab// lha dang glu dang lha ma yin// de la sogs pa thams cad kyang // yongs su dang ba'i
299b6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis ni// me tog man+dA ra ba dang // mu tig rin chen la sogs pa'i// char phab mchod pa rab tu byas// de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni// lnga chen mthu dang gzi ldan pa// bye ba phrag
299b7(dkon brtsegs): ni brgyad cu snyed// mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na// rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// byang chub chen por smon lam btag/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe// 'od zer 'di 'dra thob par/
300a1(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas de yi tshe// de yi bsam pa thugs chud pas// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes// byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan/
300a2(dkon brtsegs): yi tshe na gzhan yang ni// brgya byin lnga yi dbang po dang // tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa yang // bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed// 'od zer rab tu ston pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na/
300a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes// byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan// de yi tshe na gzhan yang
300a4(dkon brtsegs): ni// klu ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dgra/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed pas// lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur// de yi
300a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe ni gzhan yang ni// gser 'dab rgyal po bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na// sdom pa lnga ni rab bsrungs te// lung bstan pa yang thob pa
300a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur// de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni// dri za'i rgyal po bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu snyed na 'dus pa dag/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na// rol mo brgya stong rnams byas te// sgra snyan dag ni rab
300a7(dkon brtsegs): byung nas// bcom ldan de la mchod byas pas// lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur// de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni// gnod sbyin rgyal po khrag khrig snyed// mdo sde 'di ni thos pas
300b1(dkon brtsegs): mu/ sangs rgyas ye shes dag la ni// shin tu dad pa skyes par gyur// de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang // byang chub lung bstan thob par gyur// zla 'od 'di ltar shes par gyis/
300b2(dkon brtsegs): de tshe rgyal po sku mos pas// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bcom ldan 'das de la mchod byas pa// gzhan yin snyam du ma~M blta ste// de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no// khyod ni sngon
300b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das dus kyi tshe// mdo sde 'di ni zos pa'i rgyus// de lta bas nu deng 'dir yang // 'di nyid slar yang zhus pa yin// nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og/ gang yang rung ba su zhig gis/
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe// chos kyi bstan pa 'di dag la// dang ba'i sems ni gang skyes pa// 'di lta bu yi mdo sde dag/ rgya cher yang/
300b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ston par nus// ma 'ongs mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa// des ni nga yi chos 'dzin srung bar byed// de ni 'gron mang ded bya'i ded dpon 'dra// rin chen gter 'dzin srung ba zhes
300b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bya// ma 'ongs dus tshe mdo 'di gang thos nas// skad cig tsam du mos pa skyed byed pa// de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yin// 'jam dpal byin gyis brlabs
300b7(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya// des ni sangs rgyas mang po mthong 'gyur bas// gsang ba'i chos gtad shes rab rno bar 'gyur// gang dag sems drang mnyen la rab des shing // rtag tu sangs
301a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rim gro byed la brtson// bdag med sgom zhing byams dang bzod skyed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la myos par 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu mi dge sems 'chang
301a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing // rnyed la gdu zhing chog mi shes pa dang // rab dben rnams la mos par mi 'gyur ba// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod
301a3(dkon brtsegs): dang // dam chos zab mo legs par rtogs pa dang // sangs rgyas yang dag ye shes yid ches pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig sems g.yeng dang ba'i
301a4(dkon brtsegs): sems med cing // rtag tu srog gcod gdul bar rab dka' dang // 'dod pa'i yul rnams kyi ni bran byed pa// des ni mdo sde 'dri la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu dgon
301a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas rab mos shing // gcig pu dben par 'dug cing sems zhi dang // rnyed dang gnyen la mngon par zhen med pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig grogs
301a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan dag gi rjes 'brang zhing // bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba 'jig byed dang // tshul khrims ting 'dzin dag ni cher nyams pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig yid mos
301a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam dag cing // rtag tu shes rab chos rnams rab 'byed dang // dge ba'i bshes dag gis ni rab bsrungs pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig gnyen gyi
301b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim la rab chags shing // me tog 'bras bu byin nas dpa' byed dang // sems la drang po mang cing sgyu 'chang ba// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas drin dran
301b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing // dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog la mos pa dang // byang chub bsngo zhing g.yo sgyu med gyur pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig chung ma bu mo sred chags shing // gos mchog
301b3(dkon brtsegs): tshegs dag gis rab brgyan nas// rtag tu de dang lhan cig rtse sngon pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig sems zab gnas pa med gyur cing // 'dod pa'i yul gyis gos
301b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang // zas skom dag gis g.yo sgyu mi skyed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig skye dgu rnams la 'di skad du// 'dod chags spyad kyang nyes med gang zer
301b5(dkon brtsegs): ga/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la skur ba yin// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig yid ches rtag tu rab brtan zhing // nan tan bskyed nas chos rnams tshol ba
301b6(dkon brtsegs): la// skyo ba med cing brnyas par mi byed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig chung ma bu mo mngon zhen cing // rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul ni rjes dran dang // shes
301b7(dkon brtsegs): rab mi sgom rgya cher phan ma 'dogs// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig ri dang nags khrod rab gnas shing // shes rab bsgoms nas shin tu dag 'gyur dang /
302a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag la 'dod med pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'// rtag tu rmongs nas mi rtogs gang yin
302a2(dkon brtsegs): pa// de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mog gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'// rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa// de ni bdud
302a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcings las grol bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa la// rtag tu rmongs nas khong du ma chud pa// de ni gti mug bdud kyis
302a4(dkon brtsegs): bcings pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa dag rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa// de ni bdud kyis bcings las
302a5(dkon brtsegs): grol bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la// rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa// de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas
302a6(dkon brtsegs): na// de sa ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ rtag tu khong du chud cing rmongs med pa// de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na//
302a7(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ rna ba sna dang lce lus yang dag dang // gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams dang / sa chu ma rlung ngo bo nyid dag dang // dngos po sems can sdug
302b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal phung po dang // khams dang 'jig rten skye sgra ming bden dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal sred// 'chab rgyags ser sna phrag dog g.yod sgyu dang // khro sogs par yang de
302b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rig par gyis// gang zhig mig zad mtha' ni de dag la// rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa// de ni skye bor spyod par ltung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig
302b3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni de dag la// rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la/
302b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa// de ni skye ba'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la// rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med
302b5(dkon brtsegs): pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhing mig gi rab dben de dag la// rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par
302b6(dkon brtsegs): ltung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la// rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni
302b7(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa la// rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi
303a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ang med pa dag/ rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//
303a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas// mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag rmongs pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med
303a3(dkon brtsegs): rab rtogs nas// mig zad ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pas// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs
303a4(dkon brtsegs): nas// bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas// /
303a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyur pa// de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig migazad do ba ma rtogs pa// des ni mi gnas tshul
303a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims bsgrub mi nus// mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi sgrub pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// des ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub
303a7(dkon brtsegs): rab nus// mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa// des ni zag med tshul khrims bsgrub
303b1(dkon brtsegs): mi nus// zag med tshul khrims mngon par mi sgrub pas// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig bang ngo bo rab rtogs pa// des ni zag med tshul khrims bsgrub par rus/
303b2(dkon brtsegs): zag med tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zang ngo ba ma rtogs na// dus ni zag med shes rab bsgrub mi nus/
303b3(dkon brtsegs): zag med shes rab mngon par mi sgrub pas// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub par nus// zag med
303b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mngon par bsgrub par na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa// mig stong nyid la rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur// des ni kun
303b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ye shes mi skyed par// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mes mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur// des ni kun 'dzin
303b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rab skyed pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// des ni kun 'dzin ye shes rab bsgrub na// bla med ma chags ye shes
303b7(dkon brtsegs): rab bsgrub pas// mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ma mos pa// mig zad de ba nyid la rtag tu rmongs// de ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na//
304a1(dkon brtsegs): bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dka'// gang zhig mdo sde 'di la rab mos shing // mig zad ngo bo nyid ni mngon rtogs pa// des ni ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pas na// bla med ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing // bdag med mtshan nyid rab tu shes pas ni// des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos pas ni/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches the tsom med pa 'thob// gang zhig mig zang ngo bo nyid sems shing // nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo med par ni// des ni kun 'dzin spobs pas mngon bsgrubs nas/
304a4(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed pa// 'od zer 'byin pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing // mig stong 'di ni
304a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// gang gis mchod rten brgya stong rab byas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad la ni mchod pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na// 'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par
304a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags// gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na// 'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags//
304a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams// bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par// de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par mchod pa bas// mdo sde 'di bzung bsod nams khyad par
304b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags// gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i// tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na// de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen po yi// gtso ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya/
304b2(dkon brtsegs): nga ni 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong du// srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la// mdo sde 'di yi phyir na rom gro byas// res 'ga' mar me
304b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong tshad med pa// snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam// sbar nas mdo sde 'di la rab dbang dag/ 'thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod// res 'ga' me tog tsam pa
304b4(dkon brtsegs): ka dang ni// sum na dang mya ngan med pa yi// 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas// nga sngon 'khor bar 'bor bar gyur pa'i tshe//
304b5(dkon brtsegs): slong du 'ongs pa dag la sbyin btang ste// res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang // res 'ga' zam pa khron pa chu mig btang // res 'ga' glang po che dang bzhon pa dang // res
304b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang // res 'ga' gser gyi khri dang rin chen gur// res 'ga' se mo do dang 'phreng ba btang // de bzhin bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni//
304b7(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med// / bam po gnyis pa// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bsrungs//
305a1(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgom// sems can rnams la sbyin pa btang // du sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// gtum po dag gis rgyad bkag kyang // de tshe nga ni snying brtse
305a2(dkon brtsegs): bas// de la gnod pa yong ma byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// slong du 'ongs pa dag la ni// ji ltar mos bzhin rab btang bas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar byas// bsngon
305a3(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di yi phyir// gzhal med khang chen rnams la naM/ rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas// sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su phul// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// rin chen rnam
305a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// drin yod rnams ni rtag dran pas// tha na tshig bshad gci/
305a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa// de la yang ni bkur sti byas// da sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// tshul khrims ldan la rab bkur bas// tha na 'chag pa'i tshen yang // de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed/
305a6(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi b+hir// 'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i rtse// drin ni cung zad yod la yang // de la rtag tu dran du gzos// ra sngon mdo sde 'di yo phyir// dUr ba ma be tsam chos
305a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar// thel shes sems can rnams la ni// snying brtse dag ni rab tu babyed// rjon mad sde dis phyim / mang thos legasepa ya ldan pas so// chos la mngon par
305b1(dkon brtsegs): zhen byed cing // bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// mi dge'i sems ni skyes gyur na// myur ba nyid du rab bshags pas// 'phel bar yang ni yod
305b2(dkon brtsegs): ma byas/ ngasngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// rgyal po'i bur ni gyur pa na// rin po che dang byug spos dang // spos kyi phye ma ji snyed pa// dang ba'i sems ni ngas bskyed nas// sangs rgyas
305b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bsngos shing phul// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// khri mon btson la snying brtse bas// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang myong ba// lus kyi basbyin par dang du blangs// nga sngon mdo
305b4(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di yi phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas// rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe// sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms
305b5(dkon brtsegs): pas// tha na chung ma dag la yang // 'dod pa'i ser sna yongs ma bskyed// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// dbul 'phongs dag ni thams cad kun// bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir
305b6(dkon brtsegs): nor dag gis ni phyug por byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// dge slong dang ni bram ze dang // skye dgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun// thams cad dag ni rab tu bsdus// nga sngon mdo sde 'di
305b7(dkon brtsegs): yi phyir// thams cad kun la phan gdags byir// rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas// slong bdag la yongs su btang // res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag/ gzhan dag gcing du
306a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gzhug par// sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing // yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas// nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe// sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas na// tshul
306a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims yon tan ldan pa dang // tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo tsha med// rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pas na// so so'i skye bo'i bar dag la// ngo mtshar bsam pa'i sems bskyed nas// gus
306a3(dkon brtsegs): pas kun la sbyin pa btang // nga sngon sbyin pa'i btang ba'i tshe// sems la mtho dman med pas na// sdug bsngal 'gro ba mi tshol zhing // mdo sde 'di la rtse gcig mos// res 'ga'
306a4(dkon brtsegs): yul khams dag tu ni// phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing // klu rnams kun ni rab btul nas// dus bzhin char ni rab tu phab// zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis// ngas ni tshe/
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rabs dpag med nas// mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir// dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyad// bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ni// brjod kyang mthar thug mi 'gyur ro// yid ches pa la khyod
306a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// yang dag dran pa'i sems bskyed la// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis// ma 'ongs dus ni gsal
306a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pas// spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba// thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa yin// dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis// bla med ye shes btsil ba'i phyir// shin tu dang ba'i
306b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis ni// mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa// gang zag de dang phyogs rnams kyang // thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// mdo sde thos nas gang mos
306b2(dkon brtsegs): pa// bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang // thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas// chos bstan pa la skur
306b3(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang // dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas// shin tu gdung bas du byed
306b4(dkon brtsegs): pa// de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas// rgyal ba gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur// zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gang dag yid ni dag pa dang /
306b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gi ni ma dag dang // tha na mos pa gang yin pa// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// rab zhi dben la rtag mos shing // ting 'dzin
306b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rab gnas nas// 'khor ba dag la ma chags pas// tha na bag chags rnams kyang ni// gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang // de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams/
306b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ mi bden chos la len pa dang / sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas 'kho ba
307a1(dkon brtsegs): mos pa// ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// 'jig rten bde la rab chags pas/
307a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag/ legs pa nyid du mi skyed pa/ rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir// sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur// su yang rung ba gang zhig gis// byang chub sa bon
307a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur na// gang zag de yis nges par ni// rnam dag 'od zer dpag med thob// zla 'od khye kyis 'di lta bur// 'od zer 'ong la sogs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ni re re kun// so so tha dad
307a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid du ltos// khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni// thams cad de ltar rig par gyis// gang zhig mi dge grags spangs te// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas// tshul khrims rnam dag/
307a5(dkon brtsegs): gang srung ba// sangs rgyas 'od zer bsgrub par 'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po rab bsrungs la// ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs// dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms la/ sems can rnams
307a6(dkon brtsegs): ni srung bar gyis// khyod kyis rtsod pa rab spongs la/ stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis// rnyed pa dag la ma gdu bar// mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis// khyod kyis rnyed pa dag
307a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni// mig cad lta bur blta bar gyis// rnyed pa'i dri ma dag gis ni/ rnam dag sems ni sngags ma byed// rnam par grol ba btsal bar byos// ke bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/
307b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos// chos kyi sgron chen rdug sbar la// 'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis// khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar/ mi gso
307b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid du rab tu byos// kha ngan dang ni rdeg pa yang // thams cad bzod pa dang du long // khyod ni sems can rnams kyi phyir// dge ba shes yang dag rab tu byos// dman pa'i sems ni
307b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs spongs la// rnam dag las ni rtag tu sbubs// khyod kyi sems ni brtan byos la// bla med chos ni rab tu ston// mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu// brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis// bla med se
307b4(dkon brtsegs): shes gang tshol ba// 'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed// des na sdig pa rnam spangs nas// phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dper na blo dang ldan pa dag/ me la spyod pa mkhas pa gang /
307b5(dkon brtsegs): ro rnams sna tshogs sbyir byed kyang // mes ni sreg par yong mi 'gyur// gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa// thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas/ me khyer lag mthil gang bzhag pa/
307b6(dkon brtsegs): mes ni rab tu sreg par 'gyur// ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis// sems ni 'khrugs nas myos pa gang // me la rab tu bsros na ni// de yi rgyu yis sos par 'gyur// zla 'od khyod kyis
307b7(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis/ blo ldan pa yang de bzhin du// yod rten yod ni stong par rig/ de phyir 'khor bar gnas kyang ni// mig rten mig ni stong rig pas// mig la mngon par zhen pa med/
308a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te de ltar rab shes na// mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med// gal te mig nyid stong rig na// yang dag ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob pa'i
308a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te mig nyid stong rig na// 'dod chags dag ni gtan nas spong // 'dod chags dag ni med pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni
308a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang // ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang // ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med// mi bzang sems ni mtho ba dang // rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal dang // g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang // gya gyu la sogs rab tu yang // thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs//
308a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thob gyur na// sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas// tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir//
308a6(dkon brtsegs): zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag yeng shes thob gyur na// sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur// thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/
308a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par// sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs shing // 'od zer 'byung ba bsgrub par ni// ngas sngon ma thos ma mthong ngo // yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas/
308b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing // spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing // mdo sde 'di la bslab byas nas/
308b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa// yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur// yang dag ye shes gong bsgrubs pa// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis// 'od zer 'byed pa
308b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur// lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin no// mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa// dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa
308b4(dkon brtsegs): thob mi 'gyur// mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa// dge sbyong chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// mig gi mtha' zad
308b5(dkon brtsegs): gang rtogs pa// rna ba skye ba'i mtha' yang rtogs// rna ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pas// dge sbyong chen po chos shes bya// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni yongs su ma shes
308b6(dkon brtsegs): na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/
308b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni yongs su shes 'gyur na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes pa nyid du 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/
309a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par ma shes na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // legs pa nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od
309a2(dkon brtsegs): zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis
309a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mngon sum nyid du mi shes
309a4(dkon brtsegs): pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mtha' ni mngon sum shes 'gyur
309a5(dkon brtsegs): na// mngon sum nyid du rab shes pas// gang zag de yi de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni legs par ma shes na//
309a6(dkon brtsegs): mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha'
309a7(dkon brtsegs): ni legs par shes gyur na// mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur//
309b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par ma shes na// rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa// legs pa nyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi
309b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par shes gyur na// rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa// legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa
309b3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus// yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang // reg bya chos dang sa chu dang // mi rlung dag gi dngos po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang // khams
309b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten skye mched dang // sgra dang ming la sogs pa yang // thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
309b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing // 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
309b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dang // gnod sems med
309b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang // sems shin tu mnyam pa dang // g.yo sgyu med pa dang // ser sna med pa dang // phrag dog med pa dang //
310a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang / bslu ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / theg pa chen po mdo sde dam pa dag mngon par yid ches pa dang / dbang phyug dang rgyags pa la zhen cing
310a2(dkon brtsegs): sred pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang / smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang / bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa dang // dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'khor rnams/
310a3(dkon brtsegs): la mi rten pa dang // rnyed pa la mi rten pa dang / grags pa la mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
310a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la sgyu med par rim gro byed pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la shin tu bkur
310a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mdo sde 'di'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang // yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams la mi bden pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsam pa la
310a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba dang / bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang / dbang po rnams dam du bsrung ba dang / tshig rab tu
310a7(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa dang gas rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs zad mi shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang // lus dang srog la
310b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs pa med pa dang // 'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su ston par byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcad pa dang / 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do zhes zer ba'i log par/
310b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba rnams spangs pa dang / da dung ma bslabs pa dag la g+ha g+hu'i mtshan ma mi ston pa dang / gang bslabs par gyur pa dag la ci mus kyis rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang / glu dang rol mon
310b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / rgyan dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa
310b4(dkon brtsegs): deng gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas la gus pa dang // byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang // 'jig rten
310b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las yongs su spangs pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson pa dang // chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
310b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang // sdig pa'i las mi spong ba dang
310b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang / dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang / byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med
311a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mdo sde yang dag par gzung ba rnams rjod par byed pa dang / rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang / pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / nges par 'byung
311a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar
311a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang / srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dag la gnyen po rnam
311a4(dkon brtsegs): par gzhag nas ston par byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' yongs su shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la
311a5(dkon brtsegs): mi ltos pa dang yongs su spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dpe byad kyi bkod pa dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa
311a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa brgyang cu zhes bya'o// gzhan sang bla 'di gzhon nu chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
311a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa ga
311b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'o// gzhan yang bla 'od g.yon nu chos lnga po de dag ni gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis kyang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gzugs yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur
311b3(dkon brtsegs): ro// gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par zol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od
311b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod de/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam
311b5(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i tshogs dang / shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
311b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang / tshig mnyen pa dang / dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po yongs su shes pa dang / theg pa chen po
311b7(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par gzhol ba dang // brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang // spyod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang // nyon mongs par lhung ba rnams kyi the tsom rab tu gcod pa dang
312a1(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la
312a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus rab tu rtsom pa dang / bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang / bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang /
312a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag po kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang / the tshom yongs su gcod pa dang // sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang / srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med
312a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang // sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang // 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu
312a5(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang 'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la
312a6(dkon brtsegs): gus pa bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim gro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag
312a7(dkon brtsegs): thag ring du spong ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems
312b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbul bar byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang // spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang
312b2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang / don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang / gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang
312b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes pa med pa dang // spyod pa rnams
312b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa
312b5(dkon brtsegs): mi brjod pa dang / dge ba'i las yang dag par sgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang
312b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dang bskyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / theg pa
312b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par byed pa dang // bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang // 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa dang
313a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol ba la mos pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang // rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang
313a2(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam rnyed pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa
313a3(dkon brtsegs): dang // bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang sems can gyi spyod pa dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas la shin tu dang ba dang // snod ma
313a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa yongs su spong ba dang // mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par stod par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs
313a5(dkon brtsegs): na ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang / rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang / sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni zla 'od
313a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do// de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur
313a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa// de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad mtha' mkhyen pas
313b1(dkon brtsegs): de skad rnam dag ye shes ston mdzad lags// rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas na// rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig bdag med mkhyen
313b2(dkon brtsegs): pas// de skad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags// nam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na// tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa lags// bcom ldan sngon
313b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can phan btags pas// de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags// rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na// 'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/
313b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas// de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags// kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer
313b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag med ston// de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen// mig gi khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma mchis// mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas// de bzhin gshegs
313b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston// sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas// mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen// mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na// de bzhin gshes
313b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'od zer dpag med ston// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs// sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na/
314a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges pa ston// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs rdzogs pas// mig gi 'jig pa dpag med thugs su chud// mig gi 'jig
314a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu mkhyen pas na// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen// ji ltar
314a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce lus yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos// 'jig rten skye dang
314a4(dkon brtsegs): sku dang ming la sogs// thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan
314a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan// ji ltar bcom
314a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan tshul khrims pha rol byen// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/
314a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun
314b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring po mi thogs de bzhin 'gog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// bsam gtan pa
314b2(dkon brtsegs): rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
314b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
314b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po gang gnyis
314b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa// rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po
314b6(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan yid ni yid ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen
314b7(dkon brtsegs): po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog
315a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa// bdag
315a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'ashog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dge sgra ldan pa/
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan
315a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// sems can gdul slad srid pa gsum na bzhugs// ji ltar bcom ldan sems can/
315a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul mdzad pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom
315a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po gang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'dod chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/
315a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las
315b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// gti mug spyod pa dpag med
315b2(dkon brtsegs): dag las 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang
315b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
315b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags gauti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
315b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das// ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyam spyod 'das pa// bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags dag
315b7(dkon brtsegs): las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog
316a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yongs 'das pas// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa/ bdag kyang
316a2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// bdag
316a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/
316a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs
316a5(dkon brtsegs): pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'dod tshogs gti mug spyod 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten
316a6(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ 'dren pa dug gsum cha mnyam spyod 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom
316a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad//
316b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sbyar ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad//
316b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mri kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/
316b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul mdzad cing /
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rdul bum dpag tu ma mchis pa// 'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'o ye shes grub gyur nas// lA mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin
316b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// chos rnams yang dag don ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// yang dag de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin
316b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sdug bsngal zad mtha' mkhyen// skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad la the tsom ma mchis
316b7(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad mtha' mkhyen pas// skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// rgyu zad de la the tsom ma mchis
317a1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa sbyin pa na sa// spyod pa dag yA N+Das D+ha sa kyang 'du sa smye bar+b+ha k+Sha/
317a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod la the tsom ma mchis zlog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ 'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tu mabyeg/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes ba gyur nas/
317a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten las dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i med shes grub gyur
317a4(dkon brtsegs): nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten rab bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
317a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la naM phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// thams cad kun tu 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
317a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
317a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa chog ldan pas// dbang po rnams kyis rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ya she
317b1(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ bdug kyang de 'dra'i ye
317b2(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid dashog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de
317b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan+d+ha bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang/
317b4(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ying shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag
317b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas// 'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen/
317b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ma gas grub gyur nas// 'jig rter thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mkhyen pas// 'jig rten par 'dogs dpe rtswa nang ma/
317b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab banas pas/ khyad par thabs kyi mi shes
318a1(dkon brtsegs): skyed par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/
318a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//
318a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/
318a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/
318a5(dkon brtsegs): bla med byang chub yang dag mngon sangs rgyas// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/
318a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni ban bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mabyin pa mchog ldan pas/
318a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu ston// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas/
318b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dpag med rnams la go bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang /
318b2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/
318b3(dkon brtsegs): yi ge dag dang brjod par rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni pan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas/
318b4(dkon brtsegs): dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs 'dul bas//
318b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phran bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum rab
318b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas// 'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin
318b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen
319a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas// rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye
319a2(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs// lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis//
319a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen
319a4(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'/ bdag kyang de 'dra'o ma shes grub gyur nus/ khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dang ni/
319a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar gzigs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// de skad de la rmongs pa
319a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs mi mngag bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zang nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig gi mtha' mabyon pas// de skad de la rmongs pa
319a7(dkon brtsegs): songs mi mngag/ bdag kyang de 'dram sa shes grub gyur nas/ rig gi de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin pa shegs pa 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas// de skad de la rmongs pa
319b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// de spang slob dpon ma mchis
319b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen// de slad slob dpo/
319b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi
319b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// sde byi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// mig
319b5(dkon brtsegs): gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa
319b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de skad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rdzogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa byed/
319b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig zad dang ma zad ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin
320a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/
320a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen nas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang // g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims
320a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen
320a4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de
320a5(dkon brtsegs): dag tu phan pa dag byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems
320a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te
320a7(dkon brtsegs): gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/ 'brug dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing / ka la bing ka'i sgra byung nas/
320b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnga chen po'i snga 'byin pa// ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags// rnam dag sgra rab dag dang ldan// yon tan pango mtshur rab mnga' ba// ci smad 'od zer
320b2(dkon brtsegs): bkye ba mdzad// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas// thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pa// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad//
320b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbyings mnyes pas// ngag rtsu ba rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nad ni leg gso ba// ci slad 'od zer bkye bar mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/
320b4(dkon brtsegs): mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen// rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas// sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad// rna ba b+hU lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas/
320b5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang // ye shes bzod pa rab de bzhin// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag
320b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no//
320b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos// chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas// bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas// rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsung // res 'ga' rnam grangs
321a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis// sdug bsngal gzhi ni ston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad// res 'ga' tshig
321a2(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med kyis// rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing // gang zag srog dang bdag med dang // sems can med pa nyid du ston// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang /
321a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis// tshogs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan chos// yang dag nyid ni ston mdzad
321a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang // brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas// brjod mdzad tshes kyang yong mi mnga'// bcom ldan yang dag chos gsung zhing // skye dgu rnams ni go mdzad pas//
321a5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/ gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur// lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos pa dag ni rnam par dag/ mi ni mang po tshad med kyang //
321a6(dkon brtsegs): the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig/ sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa
321a7(dkon brtsegs): nas// sdug bsngal phung po la sogs par// thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don// mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs
321b1(dkon brtsegs): pas chos gcig la// sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas// grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston// sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las// de 'dra'i
321b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ni legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang // brjod pa thug pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab
321b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas// ming tshig dang po bar ma dang // mtha' ma rnam 'byeng rab tu mkhyen// tha dang tshig ni sna tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na// don mchog dag
321b4(dkon brtsegs): gya nom pa// ston pa dag la rab tu mkhyen// de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas// lce 'bab zhig la rten pa nas// lus sems par la
321b5(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'ang min// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas// thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na// the tsom dag ni bsal du gsol// de bzhin
321b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas mig zad dang // skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang // 'gro 'de med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mngar bas/
321b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs / bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'// de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'
322a1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang // pad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas// chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub
322a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sngon dang byi mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags
322a3(dkon brtsegs): na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ming ni dpag med dang // brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum
322a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa//
322a5(dkon brtsegs): brnyes// grags pa mchog ni phun tshogs po// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan yun ring bsgom bslabs pas// bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad//
322a6(dkon brtsegs): mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// dri bral rtag tu rnam par dge/ sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams// dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen// 'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/
322a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas// thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben//
322b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gi/ mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni
