322b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chen bzhi// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//
322b3(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
322b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ro la bdag med mkhyen/
322b5(dkon brtsegs): reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen// chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtog/ mi nyid
322b6(dkon brtsegs): stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo ma rtag nyid du rtogs// dngos nyid stong par rab mkhyen nas// ci skad
322b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med ma khyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/
323a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan khams la bdag med ma khyen// 'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs// skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sbru la bdag
323a2(dkon brtsegs): // sa / 'dum pa ma / ba
323a3(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mi khyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/ bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag dang bdag med pa yang ma khyen// mos pa ston/
323a4(dkon brtsegs): par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na// ci skad 'dzum paston
323a5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnams grol// grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang // brgya byin mi mi dbang po dang // glu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod// de bcan
323a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas mig pad dang // skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na// ci brang 'jus pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa// 'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'du/
323a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis// gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags// 'khor 'dun
323b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag slad du ni// 'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad
323b2(dkon brtsegs): las ni yang dag 'das// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni// bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongs pas rab mkhyen gyi// rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs
323b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'di med// rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis// ci srud 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
323b4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi yi
323b5(dkon brtsegs): gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs
323b6(dkon brtsegs): ni dam pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa// mnyam par dga'
323b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas// chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab skyes nas/
324a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal dang /
324a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu dbyangs rab snyan// sku snyan tshad med rang gi ngang gis 'byung // ci spyang 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol// tshogs bshad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yis/
324a3(dkon brtsegs): rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod 'gyur zhing // kun tsi ri yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa// ci snad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i
324a4(dkon brtsegs): smras// 'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa// thugs rjes tshig rtsu ba yang na 'jam ston pa// ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen//
324a5(dkon brtsegs): mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa// ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// mig gi 'byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang /
324a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro 'od ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang // TIg d+hA chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa// rgyu sbyin gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin na pa rtswa lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra
324a7(dkon brtsegs): reg bya chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du no rig par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku// mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs//
324b1(dkon brtsegs): rdul 'phrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlum gang zhabs kyi rting pa ring // byug gi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra/ lte bshin/
324b2(dkon brtsegs): du zab cing rked rgyas pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs// ba s+phu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing
324b3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi ngad ldang ba// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa// dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni
324b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brgyan// gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'// zhing ni brgya stong
324b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag med rgyu bar mdzad// sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad// tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra// ljags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun tu khebs// 'gram pa seng
324b6(dkon brtsegs): ge 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho// thams cad thabs dang rnam dang thugs las skyes// At+pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung // tsan dan dri dag skra ni kun tu khyab// sngon ni byams pa rgya chen
324b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin tu mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po
325a1(dkon brtsegs): che 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal/
325a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dag gis skye dgu phan 'dogs pas// gang gis mthong ba dang bu rab tu skye// sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad// sngon ni dge sbyong
325a3(dkon brtsegs): mang por rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyis bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags// gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yongs ma mchis// zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags/
325a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya dang 'dra// sku dbyibs mi dgu seng ge ji lta bzhin// 'jig
325a5(dkon brtsegs): rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'// phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das/
325a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags// ci skad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing // kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam
325a7(dkon brtsegs): dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis// de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mthar lta
325b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rab sbyangs na// bcom ldan rnam dag sU ni myur thob 'gyur// lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing // ka lan ta ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal// lha yi gru sgra brgya stong mang ldan/
325b2(dkon brtsegs): ba// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba pa byed du gsol// 'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dgu rgyun yang bcad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab
325b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gsungs pa// de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so// khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyan mchog dag
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ni kha dog mthon mthing 'dra// gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong // tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/
325b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med phun
325b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing // 'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can yang dag bsam pa
325b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud// thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas// rig pa gsum dang mngon
326a1(dkon brtsegs): shes drug phun tshogs// rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/
326a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchog pa mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras 'chab ni mi 'tshal ba// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med sbed// ting /
326a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas// mig go skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen na// ci skad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de/
326a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag kun ni rab tu mkhyen// rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po
326a5(dkon brtsegs): mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang sde// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu shin tu legs par nyon// ngas ni deng 'di
326a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub chos// 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyis// ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe// chos 'di rnam par 'jig pa na// khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni/
326a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i// mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la// gang mos gang ni ma mos
326b1(dkon brtsegs): pa// thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing ma khyen// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// byang chub lam 'di rab tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing // mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar
326b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing // 'du 'dzul ni mos gyur dang // nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga yi bstan pa dag la ni//
326b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chung gson 'gyur// 'dus byas rnams
326b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos dag la// nyes dmigs mang bar thos nas ni// 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas// 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams
326b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis smod par 'gyur// chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang // de la shes rab ci yang med// thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi// yang dag dga' ni gang yin pa// shes pa med pas
326b6(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur na// yid ches len par mi 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang /
326b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni// ngas ni rab tu smod par byed// mi lus thob par gyur mod kyi// de ni don med chu/
327a1(dkon brtsegs): zos yin// gal te shin tu zab pa'i chos// 'di dag thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag de
327a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni// sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na// gdon mi za ba kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// skyes bu blun po gang dag gcig/ lta ba ngan byas rab rmas nas// shes rab srog/
327a3(dkon brtsegs): ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i// bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni// brten cing gus pa bskyed
327a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya// 'jig rten dag ni thams cad na// nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod pa// sems can ngan song gsum por ni// rtag tu byung bar gang bzhed pa// thams cad gti mug rmongs
327a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na// nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing // rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed// de lta
327a6(dkon brtsegs): bas na rmongs pa yi// skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya// ji ltar kha lo sgyur ba yis// rang gis srog shing bcag pa bzhin// mi dge las ni byas pas na// sems can dmyal bar skye bar
327a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa// ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'i
327b1(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rjes su ni// rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par// de ltar khong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la brten nas// dge ba'i grogs po yin snyam sems// de nas rang nyid 'di
327b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang sgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas// chad par lta ba skyed par byed// lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur
327b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes// phal cher bkyal pa'i tshig dag la// mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing // 'di la mngon par zhen pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci yang med// gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis//
327b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang // nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed// blun po gang zhig chos ston pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas// skye dgu mang po
327b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa// 'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis// deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon nu
327b6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dug pa// 'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi// sangs rgyas dgra ni bcom ldan 'das// tshad med gad+hA'i klung ji snyed// mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing // shin tu brtan
327b7(dkon brtsegs): par yongs bsgoms nas// bla med ye shes btsal bas na// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med// mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni/
328a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag par shes pas na// spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon par zhen pa ci yang med// sems can dag ni tshad med la// phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir//
328a2(dkon brtsegs): bla med 'od zer ston pa yi// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di slob par mi nus pas// rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni// skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed//
328a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na blun po dag/ zag ring por ni yongs spangs nas// de dag la ni brten mi byed// de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas
328a4(dkon brtsegs): na// rtsod smre med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la ni// tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med// de lta bas na de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi
328a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba sngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// le lo snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi// mi dge'i las ni spyad pas na// de la tshul khrims
328a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci 'dra yang // rtag par 'dod pa'i yul sems shing // 'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/ khyed kyis 'di ltar thun po de/ rigs dang rus dang /
328a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing // byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la// gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang // lus ni rtag tu ma rabs
328b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas// yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur// blo gros dag dang mi ldan pas// tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus// rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang /
328b2(dkon brtsegs): de la mos pa skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'o// tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/
328b3(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bos 'di dag la// shin tu zhen cing chags pas na// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du yang // rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur// tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang //
328b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed// kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang // lus kyis chos min spyod par byed// rang gis 'dul ba sngon byed kyang // rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed/
328b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang // nga rgyal dang ni bkra
328b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i/ sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ni zos pa// thu lum 'bar ba med pa 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas// 'dod pa lnga yi bde
328b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang med// gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas// spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa/
329a1(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni ngag mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang // dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/ seng ge'i khyur ni
329a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi// chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang // de kho na dang stong pa'i don// rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas/ 'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags
329a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang // khengs par sems ni skyed par byed// ston pa chen po ma dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang // yid bzhin nor bu rdob pa bzhin/
329a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas// sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed// 'di lta bu yi ma rabs dag/ khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni// spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang // chos gos lhung bzed
329a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin byed kyang // cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med// kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing // dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos// log lta/
329a6(dkon brtsegs): dag tu lhung 'gyur na// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon du bya ba yin// 'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur// ma rig nyon mongs rnams
329a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang ni// rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro// grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing // rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang // skyes bu blun po blo med pas// yang dag bzod pa shes mi 'gyur//
329b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dge yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa rgyu yi phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu// bsgrub pa'i byin ni ma yin
329b2(dkon brtsegs): no// rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag/ bsgrub pa la ni mos par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// lo nam
329b3(dkon brtsegs): por gnas byed kyang // phyin leg lta bar gyur pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das lam stor bas na// nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi/ 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag lta ba rab
329b4(dkon brtsegs): nyams shing // tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan par// de la shin tu sred par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni// rtag tu sred pa
329b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed// gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang // nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kyi las ni mi srung bas// spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas
329b6(dkon brtsegs): ni// rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu// ri bug dag ni gang yod pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te// mtho dman/
329b7(dkon brtsegs): ran par lta ba dang // 'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes// tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de// dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas// khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun du ni 'di
330a1(dkon brtsegs): skad du// dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na// gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe// gal te gzhan dag
330a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs gyur na// 'di lta bur ni ston par byed// bdug ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce'am// yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer/
330a3(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas// khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe// g.yo sgyu nan tan 'di skad du// bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam// rgyal po chom
330a4(dkon brtsegs): rkun la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed// res 'ga' chags pa'i sems dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu// thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan
330a5(dkon brtsegs): rjod par byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi// bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed// bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas// rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin// btsun mo dang ni sras
330a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang // mtho ris skyes par gyur ces zer// de dag de skad thos nas ni// shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de// gos zas dang ni btung ba dag/ sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par
330a7(dkon brtsegs): byed// btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing // bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing // nyes dmigs rnams ni mi shes pas// bdud kyis
330b1(dkon brtsegs): glags kyang rnyed gyur nas// rus sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang // rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la// brnyas shing skur pa
330b2(dkon brtsegs): 'debs par byed// rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs pas// yang nas yang du zhen pa skyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo sgyu skyed pas na// lus dang ngag gi mi dgra'i
330b3(dkon brtsegs): las// yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang // le lo snyom las dbang gis ni// de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed//
330b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dge 'dod skyed pas// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la// rjes 'thun bzod sems 'thob mi 'gyur// gang dag nga yi bstan pa las// nyes dmigs de dag
330b5(dkon brtsegs): rab spangs nas// nan tan bag yod sgrub byed no// chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur// rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang // bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs// 'jig rten chos kyis mi
330b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yos pa// chos 'di thos pa dka'i mi 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang // phung po rma yi 'du shes dang // zas ni rmi bskus 'du shes na// chos 'di thos pa dka' mi 'gyur//
330b7(dkon brtsegs): gos gtsang dag ni thob gyur kyang // dregs pa dag ni mi skyed cing // ngo tsha dag phyir gos gyon pa// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing // zas la
331a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa dang // srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// srid pa'i 'di ni stong shes nas// 'dod pa dag la blang dor med// rtag
331a2(dkon brtsegs): tu stong dben gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du// gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam gzhag cing // 'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/
331a3(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di 'thob par dka' mi 'gyur// mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang // mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing // mig gtsang lam ni rab bsgrub pa// chos 'di thos par dka' mi
331a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad kun yang de bzhin no// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// dge slong dag ni/
331a5(dkon brtsegs): tshed med snyed// btsun pa dang ni le lo can// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dag grogs po dag/ bsgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// yid ches pa dang yid mi ches/
331a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ mig zad lam ni gang yin pa// bsgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang
331a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig byang chub rab mos shing // zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni// dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur
331b1(dkon brtsegs): nas// mos pa'i sems ni gang bskyed pa// gal te nyams par gyur na yang // slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bag med spong bar mi byed pa/
331b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo 'di sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba// dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos la ma mos pa// mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshel/ grong khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing // gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang /
331b4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang // de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba// brjod pa dang ni rtog byed
331b5(dkon brtsegs): pas// stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// tshe zad bar du don med 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba// de ni tshul khrims bgegs byas
331b6(dkon brtsegs): pas// mnar med dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// nams kyang mtho ris yong mi skye// gang gis skad cig gcig la ni// mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/
331b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshigs cad
332a1(dkon brtsegs): sems pa 'phags// gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/ gang+gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas// glang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs
332a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya// me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// chos gos 'bum phrag brgya meng po/ sangs
332a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dga' phags// mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med/
332a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spun ni thob par 'gyur// 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med de// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung // nga ni bram ze khye'ur gyur tshe// me tog
332a5(dkon brtsegs): thogs nas mchod pa byas// shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// nga la byang chub lung yang bstan// khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur
332a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur// nga lung bstan pa thos gyur nas// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te bram ze khye'u 'di ni// mngon par rdzogs par/
332a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas che// bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing // srung bar shog ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas
332b1(dkon brtsegs): mar me mdzad de yis// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe// bram ze khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis// legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung // nga sngon 'das//
332b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe// me tog ut+pa la dag gis// sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas// de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga yi bstan pa tha ma la// mdo sde
332b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rab gzung nas// rgya cher ston par shog ces smras// gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed par// gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa// de ni skyes bu dam
332b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// thos dka'i chos 'di rab gzung nas// sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya tshor dbye zhing bstan par bya// ngas kyang 'dras pa'i dus kyi tshe// yang
332b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// sems can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la skur pa 'debs par byed// ngas ni de skad thos
332b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed// ngas ni rtag tu bzod bsgom nas// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed// bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang dpe byad dag
332b7(dkon brtsegs): gis brgyan// gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nom yongs su rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags// bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos// nga yi zhabs//
333a1(dkon brtsegs): ni sa reg nas// zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnams nyi mi ltung ba// thams cad bzod pa'i stobs las skyes// nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni// 'od
333a2(dkon brtsegs): zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// srog chags gzi byin 'brog
333a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// nga la rtag tu gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa// sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang /
333a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ 'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa// thams cad bzod mchog
333a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung // klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag/ rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba// sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po gnod
333a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin la sogs pas// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong thogs// 'ongs nas nga la mchod byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par// bzhugs
333a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas/
333b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa// bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams// 'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa// thams
333b2(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni// mA na pa ga la sogs pas// mu tig dmar pos nga mchod po// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / du
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong snyed
333b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus gyur nas// me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi rgyal// lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas// thal sbyar ba la
333b5(dkon brtsegs): gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lus phyed sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya stong snyed// drang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad
333b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las
333b7(dkon brtsegs): byung // sa ma mu tra dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni// spos kyi char phab pa mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lha yi 'khor ni brgya stong
334a1(dkon brtsegs): dag/ lha yi me tog gtor mchod de// sred spang sangs rgyas sten byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang /
334a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas// thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa// bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos// phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang // bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis/
334a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kun tu go mdzad pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // dA yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mtha' dag dang // rab zhi sgra ni thos gyur te// skye ba'i
334a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yang de bzhin no// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen// de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//
334a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las mig zhi rdzogs byed na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas//
334a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad
334a7(dkon brtsegs): du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig skye mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul
334b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni// mtha' las mig 'jug rab zhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mi skye zhi bas//
334b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mi// mkha' las mig dben rab zhi pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de sbyad
334b3(dkon brtsegs): du ni thos par 'gyur// rna ba sno lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang /
334b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang // khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa// rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa
334b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor mang po dang bcas
334b6(dkon brtsegs): pas gdugs chod la spyan 'dren na thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / de skad ces gsol pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam
334b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par dag pa dang // sems can tshad med pa rnams la'ang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas// thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas zla 'od
335a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song
335a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khrang bres te lding
335a3(dkon brtsegs): khang de'ang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun tu khyab pa// gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa nor bu rin po che'i 'phreng ba sbyangs pa/ seng ge'i ba dan dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba la lu gu
335a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'phreng ba'i phung po dang gcal du bkram mo// me tog tsam pa ka dang
335a5(dkon brtsegs): a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa'ang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun tu khyab par sbyangs shing rgyan du bres
335a6(dkon brtsegs): so// gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas/ rin po che'i spos byi li ka dang / du ma tsa dang / tsan dan dang / gur kum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so//
335a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar ro// gzhan yang spos chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab bo// sa gzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs gcal
335b1(dkon brtsegs): du bkram mo// de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa'ang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod
335b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// der 'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan no// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun tu khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa
335b3(dkon brtsegs): dang // gdugs chod la bab par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su
335b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs gzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par
335b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba
335b6(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur// 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/ byang bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byang bzhin bzang po thob par gyur// nor med pa rnams ni nor drang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu
335b7(dkon brtsegs): yod par gyur// gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur// rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur// nye ba shes med pa rnams ni nye ba shes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan
336a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis 'phongs pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang dang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ne tse dang / rma bya dang / ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i
336a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems ni bskyed nas/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa byung ste/ gang gis sgra de dag thos pa'ang yid can
336a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bde bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam paM ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul nas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams ma
336a4(dkon brtsegs): tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so// gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du
336a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mu tig da mar po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor ro// lha ma yin mang po dang gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs
336a6(dkon brtsegs): gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan/
336a7(dkon brtsegs): dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod dang gos la sogs pa'i ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang lo ma phun sum
336b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing rgyas pa// sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa/ rlung gi drud langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi
336b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing tshad med pa rnams kun tu khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to// sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor
336b3(dkon brtsegs): to// de bzhin du sems can dang sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go// gang dag ci dang ci smon par byed pa
336b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa thams
336b5(dkon brtsegs): cad nam mkha' las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang / de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/ tshigs su bcad
336b6(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags zad
336b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod
337a1(dkon brtsegs): chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mtha' las sgra ni 'di skad
337a2(dkon brtsegs): grags par gyur// 'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di
337a3(dkon brtsegs): skad grags par 'gyur// 'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni
337a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra
337a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra na
337a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra
337a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna// g.yo sku khengs dang
337b1(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal mya ngan dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa las sems can// khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni// skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug/ yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang /
337b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams rnams dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin// chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi
337b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun kyang thob gyur na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig la gnas par mos// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom
337b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur//
337b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pos// tshul khrims rnam dge stobs kyis byang chub brnyes// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par
337b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par
337b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas// bcon 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/
338a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan pasam gtan dag la rab mos pas// bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mnga' las s+thA ni 'di ska
338a2(dkon brtsegs): grags par gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas// shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyas par gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon shes yon tan gnas// thabs dang gzugs kyi
338a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang grags pa'i stobs// las dang rten byung yan lag dang dang thos// gtong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs// rab dul yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang dga'
338a4(dkon brtsegs): dang phan 'dogs la mos dang // byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med// stod dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso// yon tan
338a5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa// grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas// lha yi
338a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kun gyis rab tu bkur// nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe// grong
338a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na// ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas// lha mi'i
338b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar gyur// sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na// bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par gyur// bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor los gzhag mo// rnam
338b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar gyur// rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung // bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po yi// lag dang rkang gi gdub
338b3(dkon brtsegs): kor 'phreng ba dang // de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma dkrol bar yang rang nyid sgra snyan byung // so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing // skad 'thun bkra shis mchog gis
338b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod// 'on long dbang po mtshang dbang po thob// thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog
338b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon gtor mchod pa byas// mkha' las kun tu sgra snyan byung bas na// lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar gyur// gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag/ myos 'khrugs rab
338b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod// bud med gang sbru ma mye ngan 'jigs gyur pa// 'od zer byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur// skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas la// dri ma spangs pa'i chos
338b7(dkon brtsegs): dag rab bshad pas// thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de// thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam rab tshol// kha cig byang chub
339a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyan thos tshol// bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs
339a2(dkon brtsegs): pas// 'jig rten rjes 'thun phan pa rab tu mdzad// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin// rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang // bcom ldan grong khyer
339a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha'
339a4(dkon brtsegs): las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig skye mtha' srid pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob// mig
339a5(dkon brtsegs): zad ma thar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yid ches mi 'khrigs 'thob// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba
339a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha'
339a7(dkon brtsegs): sred pa// tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags
339b1(dkon brtsegs): spong bar 'gyur// mig zang mthar ni lta bas na// 'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas
339b2(dkon brtsegs): na// zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas nA// gti mug rgyun ni stong par byed// ga
339b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zed mthar sred pa// byang chub ye shes dag la gnas// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'// 'jug
339b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang // mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang // 'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang // thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig mig zad
339b5(dkon brtsegs): mthar sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar
339b6(dkon brtsegs): the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig ni mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
339b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jug srid pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig dben
340a1(dkon brtsegs): rab sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med//
340a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig med la sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
340a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zhig la sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzug/
340a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri ro reg bye nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig skyed dpag med gang skyed pa// ye shes dpag med skyed par byed// ye shes dpag tu med
340a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no// mig zad dpag med gang shes pa// mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med
340a6(dkon brtsegs): thob/ rna ba sna lde lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems
340a7(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos pas// sangs rgyas yon tan the tsom med// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed//
340b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan stor mi 'gyur// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med ye shes tshol byed cing // ma 'dres chos ni sgrub pa dang / can
340b2(dkon brtsegs): thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // bsam gtan bde la mos pas na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas// dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems//
340b3(dkon brtsegs): byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // mig zad mtha' ye shes med na// bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang // de la rnam grol ci yang med// skye ba len pa thams cad ni// de la zhen
340b4(dkon brtsegs): chags skyed par byed// gal te skye nyid stong rig na// mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur// gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang // mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na// bskal pa
340b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong lon kyang ni// bsam gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur// gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob gyur kyang // zad mtha' shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur// zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir// zag pa
340b6(dkon brtsegs): thob la rtag tu spyod// gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa// 'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med// 'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod// gang zhig 'jig
340b7(dkon brtsegs): rten zhen chags pa// 'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med// 'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas//
341a1(dkon brtsegs): sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med// sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas// chos zad mtha' yi shes/
341a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med// chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod// sbyangs pa'i tshes la gnas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/
341a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dgra sbyangs la gnas pa min// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med ma/ mig zad mtha' ni ma shes byar// yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin//
341a4(dkon brtsegs): rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ye shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin// 'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes
341a5(dkon brtsegs): med na// myur du ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te// 'khor ba dag ni skyob mi nus// sgra yi rig pa mkhos gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// sgra yi rig pa
341a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs ma yin// bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni bzo la mkhas pa min// 'dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing // yi ge
341a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med na// de ni don 'thun bshad ma yin// mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing // mig
341b1(dkon brtsegs): zang mtha' ye shes med na// chos ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// brjod pa sna tshogs rgyung 'ban dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' yi shes med ma// 'bri shing kug po
341b2(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba 'dra// sgra yi rig pa sakhas gyur cing // dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang // tshig 'bru'i yi ge sgra skad dang // grog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes ni//
341b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams ni shes med yin// bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang // tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang // lus mnyes ngal sos chos rnams dang // mkhyud dbyud dag la mkhas gyur kyang //
341b4(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing // yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// bshad pa
341b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni don med yin// de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang // mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//
341b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing // de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma
341b7(dkon brtsegs): shes na// de ni nams kyang dman pa yin// smad gzhig dag ni 'don byed cing // gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zang mtha' ni ma shes na// don nams kyang dman pa yin//
342a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra
342a2(dkon brtsegs): dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//
342a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig zad mtha' ni shes pa thob// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha'
342a4(dkon brtsegs): las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas// thams cad rnam dag mig thob 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra
342a5(dkon brtsegs): dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang // nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas// bag med pa yi bar du yang // de bzhin
342a6(dkon brtsegs): du ni rig par gyis// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni// sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos// kha cig 'dod/
342a7(dkon brtsegs): chags 'jigs pa yi// dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos// kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing // 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing // nga rgyal 'dul ba'i
342b1(dkon brtsegs): ming yang thos// kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni// rab gi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos// kha cig shes rab dgra bstan nas// 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig thabs dag rab
342b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas// sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig bdudu ni rab brtul yang // khon 'dzin med pa'i ming drag thos// kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis// rnam grol bstan pa'i ming
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag thos// kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos gyur nas// thams
342b4(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam dag ming thob gyur// nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu// ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang // thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thug mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad nges pa
342b5(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur na// chos su mngon par grub pa dkar mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos su mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med
342b6(dkon brtsegs): thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par dkar mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na// chos
342b7(dkon brtsegs): sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde
343a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro rag
343a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'i chos dag nas/ sgra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// de tshe sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po
343a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams// thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed// bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas// thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos// lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang
343a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs nas// phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras// 'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na// lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa bA'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas/
343a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa 'jig rten dang byung shin tu legs// 'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad// mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas// thams cad
343a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas// thams cad
343a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgo snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/ sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas// thams cad
343b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/ 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten ban mdzad zer// 'thab bral lnga dag de skad zos nas ni// thams cad dga'
343b2(dkon brtsegs): nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten par mdzad zer// bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ bcom ldan bla med
343b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi// lha mi gtso mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer// dga' ldan lnga rnams de skad zos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin
343b4(dkon brtsegs): tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bskal pa bye bar ni// skyong mchog khyad 'phags
343b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag med mngon bsgrubs nas// sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga'
343b6(dkon brtsegs): nas shin tu dang bgyis// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten par mdzad zer// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga'
343b7(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na/
344a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad// bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas// skye dgu drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams de skad
344a2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin gcig nas
344a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu sgra thos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dgo' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad// bdud de pung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer// srid pa'i rtsa
344a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'i lha yi bar du yang // sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos// de bzhin sgra ni kun tu grags pas na// lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel// bdud kyi khang pa dag ni
344a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs stongs shing // lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par gyur// mi 'jigs stobs kyis log tshogs rab btul nas// byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes// de bzhin skad cig yud tsam
344a6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyis// bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur nas// 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnam dag mig ni sems can byin zhes zer// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs
344a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe// 'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams// mi gtsang bsgoms pa bshad thos pas// 'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// zhe sdang dag gis
344b1(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa rnams// byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang zhi snga ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams// shes rab chos ni
344b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan thos pas// gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams// nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas// nga rgyal zhi sde ma lus spangs//
344b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// brag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams// phrag dog spungs pa'i chos thos pas// phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/
344b4(dkon brtsegs): khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams// khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas// khong khro zhi snga ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/
344b5(dkon brtsegs): ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas// ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs// gang zhig dul ba'i spyod srub pa// dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas// mang du thos pa'i gcor zhugs nas// kun 'dzin sku
344b6(dkon brtsegs): ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas// me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags bsgrub cing // snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston// gzhan yang mkha'
344b7(dkon brtsegs): las sna thos nas// bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang // gdung brgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams// khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang
345a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs bshad// mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang // bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig
345a2(dkon brtsegs): rten 'das pas na// 'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing // gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang // thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin// snod dang snod min de rjes su// mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas/
345a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing // dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la// sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad// gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing /
345a4(dkon brtsegs): lta la brten nas spros dga' ba// bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang // spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad// gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges pa nyid du stong pa dang // 'gro 'ang med cing mtshan med
345a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos// gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag/ mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan// de bzhin chos kyi spyan par du// yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos//
345a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra// rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgo// ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur// sems can dag ni ji snyed pa
345a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rje 'phrul rab bstan nas// ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra sad kyis// yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad// sems can la la gang tshig gis// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos/
345b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra stoH// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// sems can dbang po rje lta bzhin// rtswa cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// len /
345b2(dkon brtsegs): ston la 'god par mdzad// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang // sa ya~M gnas skabs bye brag gis// mtshan nyid ston/
345b3(dkon brtsegs): ba thos par gyur// gzhan yangs dpe ye shes kyi// 'od zer tshad med ston pa dang // nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang // spangs min ston pa thos par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul
345b4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni// lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid// las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas// skye len tha dad thos par gyur// res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu// bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul
345b5(dkon brtsegs): nas// mkha' las skyo ston sgra thos pas// gang thos 'dod chags sel mdzad pas// shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/
345b6(dkon brtsegs): bla med chos ni ston par mdzad// mo'u 'gal dang ni 'od srungs dang // kA bi na dang kun dga' dang // 'od grangs chen po dag dung ni// kun mos ko ru di N+Da la sogs// de dag mos bcwa
345b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du// nyan thos chos ston thos par gyur// lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin// gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // bai ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang // bral bu ma dag ni tshad med rnams/
346a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gzungs sngags sgra ni thos par gyur// i di si/ bi di si/ i ra swa/ i ra/ oM na si/ ma na si/ u byi/ a mo khyi/ a khi tshal
346a2(dkon brtsegs): mang nang yed ra ni shA ni mi/ ta ka ni/ i mi man tra/ ni ha ra/ a bu re/ bud d+he/ ni re/ a khi tsA ra/ bi ya ki ri ya te/ a ki tsha ra ba ra mi te/ ka la ba hi nI/ sarbo bidi sha nir d+he bo na
346a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ra sha sad de/ shes te/ pa ra sha sad ta/ ta ra sad ta b+hu mi/ a ma b+hA ra a ma b+ha rA/ li li b+ha na/ shI tsa/ tsid ta/ bi bA miH/ tsid tA a nan ta/ oM be ra ha ba mi ta b+hU mi na nam
346a4(dkon brtsegs): ka ni a ka ni ba b+ha ming ta/ sha ri bi shwA/ a ma la ni ma la/ bu li te na ra shI tsa/ ha ha ri/ ma ma li/ b+ha ra ni/ ti shwA/ tsakrA nir ha ra/ u d+hi ri ta tsa ba tsi/ an ta ri/ ku ta ri/ ke du su kre
346a5(dkon brtsegs): dusu pa ri/ ka ra ni/ ku su ma ni ye/ ka kA ri/ ka kha ri/ u pa la mu ri/ ti shwA/ da ra ni/ na ga nir ha re/ pa ra lad taM/ a te pa ra ya te/ an ta ra b+han d+he/ an ta ra b+ha ti shi tsa/ ha si ri/
346a6(dkon brtsegs): ma kha li/ i ne sam b+ha re/ ti shwA sit+ta ra nI/ ku b+hu lo tsa te/ gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu// yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas// khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyi// bden pa'i
346a7(dkon brtsegs): sngags tshig rab tu smras// tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang // bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung // rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas// bstan pa dag kyang tshad med do// res 'ga'
346b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas med zhing du// rdzu 'phrul rol par stobs dag gis// 'khor skor sangs rgyas sku ston pas// da ltar mthong ba ji bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu// rdul brgyad
346b2(dkon brtsegs): med ston mdzad pas// bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang // rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang // byang chub snying por srungs rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dgra rab dgongs te/
346b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad dang // mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis// sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams//
346b4(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgom pa bshad bstan pas// byams pa'i sems ni
346b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan pas// bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe
346b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po yis// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bsten pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// gnod sbyin
346b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam 'tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// rnam 'tshe sems ni spangs par gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas/
347a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas// 'gal byas
347a2(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// 'dum pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis// de
347a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lto 'phye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// mu stegs chos la smod mdzad cing // bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod
347a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// 'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/ rgya cher bsngags pa brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
347a5(dkon brtsegs): pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//
347a6(dkon brtsegs): mig skye mtha' ni bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig gi mtha' ni bstan thos pas//
347a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//
347b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig dben bstan pa thos pas na// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/
347b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la skye med bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig
347b3(dkon brtsegs): med bstan pa zos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig ni nyer zhi bstan thos pas// mthar phyir
347b4(dkon brtsegs): don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la bdag med bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen
347b5(dkon brtsegs): pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gang zag med thos pas// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can
347b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la sems can med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la srog med
347b7(dkon brtsegs): thos pas na// mthar phyir don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gso ba med thos pas// mthar phyin don
348a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten shes pa rab smad de// zhen pa mi skyed nyid du mdzad/
348a2(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad do// 'dus ma byas kyi bsngags brjod mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
348a3(dkon brtsegs): pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas shes pa rab skad de// zag med shes rab bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher mi/
348a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de// 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas tshul khrims rab smad de// /
348a5(dkon brtsegs): zag med bslab gnas bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// sems rgya chung ngu'i skyon brjod de// sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags/
348a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med rten pa med pa yi// bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
348a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par lam bsngags shing // spros la dga' zhing zhen pa dag/ sangs rgyas smad par rab tu bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/
348b1(dkon brtsegs): mig chad skyon ni rab 'byed cing // rab zhi mtshan nyid bstan par byed// na ba sA lce lus dang yid// gzugs sna dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/
348b2(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// dar la bab cing gzhon pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
348b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshe rigs dag gis bsnyems pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/
348b4(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rang dbang bag med gyur pa la// nyes
348b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gzugs kyis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
348b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// bud med bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos
348b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gos kyis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/
349a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chang gis bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/
349a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa
349a3(dkon brtsegs): la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes rab bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med
349a4(dkon brtsegs): yod par bstan// de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang // bsam gtan mabs pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor// rol mo klu dang lce rkyang dang // grags pa phun tshogs
349a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa dang // bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang // mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang // ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang // khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no// thugs/
349a6(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig sems dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'drul bstan nas/
349a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang zhig rang zhum zhing // rtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor rnams la/
349b1(dkon brtsegs): chags par gyur pa de dag la// chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang // me tog dag gi gzhal med khang // khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas// sprul
349b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzham yang lha mi bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa'i khang pa \u0f7f// gnas pa lus zed brtan rtul nas// me tog 'phreng thogs mchod byed stan// gtsun
349b3(dkon brtsegs): sang lha min bu mo dag/ me tog ma li'i khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog 'phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu rnams dag/ pad+ma sngon po'i khang
349b4(dkon brtsegs): pa na// gnas pa lus byed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha// gser gyi gzhal med khang pa na// gnas pa lus kun bstan
349b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul nas// sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus brgyan cing // rgyun ni phan tshun reg pa las// sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas/
349b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dres byas rnams kyi chos dag ni// 'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang // byis pa mi bden rtogs pa yis// yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer// rgyan gyi sgra ni de dag kyang // lus dang sems
349b7(dkon brtsegs): las byung ma yin// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// byis pa rnams kyis mi sems
350a1(dkon brtsegs): pas// 'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las// sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni// sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na// sems can tshad med grol bar
350a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur// de lta bas na khyed rnams kyis// 'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang // yon tan dpag med sku dag ni// srid pa'i spros las 'das pa dang // rab dper skyon ni med pa dang // lta bral
350a3(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rab sbyangs dang // mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang // sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos// khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe// gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra// gshegs stangs dang
350a4(dkon brtsegs): pa glang chen 'dra// sems can re bskong bar mdzad// bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs// yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// sems can dag ni thams cad kun// lta bas mi
350a5(dkon brtsegs): ngoms nyid du ltos// khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso bo'i mchog/ thugs rje chen po ldan pas na// dngos po chung ngus mchod byas kyang // yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad pas// sems
350a6(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni mang po rnams// bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par du// rnam smin thug pa med par ltos// khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni// zag med tshul
350a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims rdzogs pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang // lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams// so sor gzhal med khang spangs nas// rtse ba dag la chags
350b1(dkon brtsegs): med par// 'dren pa la ni ston byed ltos// khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor// bcom ldan 'das la dang bskyed nas// gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te// g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod pa
350b2(dkon brtsegs): dang // bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis// lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas// de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas// bla med ye shes tshol la ltos// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni/
350b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na// deng ci bcom ldan phrad byur nas// so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin// spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod/
350b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu// sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba// thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas// mig zad mtha' ni shes par gyur// mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na// rab zhi mtshan
350b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu rtogs// gzhan yang mig zad la sogs pa'i// ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs// des na tshig mkhas dag gis ni// sems can rnams la yang dag bstan// ming
350b6(dkon brtsegs): dang don rnams la yang ni// zhen dang the tshom med pas na// 'gro 'od med par rab rtogs shing // blang dor med pa nyid du gyur// rang bzhin dag ni stong dben pas// yi ge rnams
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ni spangs pa dang // len dang gzung dang klog pa dang // kha ton 'don cing sgrub byed rtogs// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan// btags pa'i
351a1(dkon brtsegs): ming tsam yin pas na// yang dag brjod du ci yang med// rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni// phung po khams dang skye mched 'das// brdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med//
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang gnas pa yod pa min// tshig gis smra ba'i lam chad cing // sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi// skye bo'i mtshan ma zhen pa'i phyir// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa mthong /
351a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang // byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// de ni mtshan mar rtog
351a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste// mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa// grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur// gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/
351a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab 'thob// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // des na grong khyer gshegs pa mthong // skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dgu la// rnam par rtog pa skye
